original: There is a dangerous Trotskyist plot brewing among the officers; even in the highest ranks. Though Trotsky's personal involvement remains unknown, the threat is great. The USSR could even be thrown into another civil war... unless we are prepared to break some eggs.
translation: 在我们的官员当中有一个危险的托派阴谋；甚至在最高级别的官员中也有。虽然托洛茨基本人是否直接参与尚不清楚，但是威胁还是很大的。这可能导致苏联再次陷入内战……除非我们准备杀几只鸡给猴看。

original: A series of §Yshow trials§! will be held to purge suspected Trotskyite ministers and leaders.\n
translation: 一系列§Y公审§!将会“公正”宣判一些苏联高层。\n

original:
The number of purges completed will affect the likelihood of renewed §Ycivil war§! and scale the effect from §HOfficers Purged§!.
Not picking this focus will lead to §Ycivil war§! and the potential return of §YLeon Trotsky§! from exile.
translation:
大清洗的数量会影响§Y内战§!的可能性并增强§H军官被肃清§!的效果。
不选择这个国策则会导致§Y内战§!，同时流亡海外的§Y列夫·托洛茨基§!有可能会回归。
永远的革命
托洛茨基回来了
§Y托洛茨基§!得到了一个更好的领袖技能。

original: The oppressive demagogue is gone! True power has been restored to the people of our nation. All are now able to pursue their interests independently and without compromise. We are forever changing. The permanent revolution is a triumphant revolution.
translation: 压迫人民的煽动者已经死了！权力重新回到了人民的手中，人民现在可以追随自己的意志而不需要妥协什么了。我们永远都在改变，永远的革命是胜利的革命。
改造军队

original: With the taint of Trotskyism finally cleansed from the officer corps, it might be possible to allow the military some freedom from political interference again.
translation: 随着托洛茨基主义的污渍终于从军官中清除干净，军队终于有点不再受政治干预的自由了。
军事重组

original: The Purge has not left the military in a good state. The new leadership is green and ineffective, and no work has been done to develop our doctrines. We must rectify this situation immediately!
translation: 大清洗给军方留了一个烂摊子。新的领导班子青涩无力，并且也没有发展我们的学说。我们必须立即纠正这种情况！
内务部为主

original: The military has shown that it can never be trusted. Therefore, the NKVD will need to be expanded and given greater powers, with more political commissars to keep an eye on the officers.
translation: 已经证实军队不值得信任。所以，内务人民委员部将需要扩扩编和更大的权力，用更多的政委去监视军官。
内务部队

original: The NKVD should be given some divisions of its own to act as Internal Troops, protecting railways and important installations.
translation: 应当给予内务人民委员部一些部队作为内务部队，保护铁路和重要设施。
战争的教训

original: With the experiences gained fighting limited wars, we should be able to make some breakthroughs in armored warfare, and perhaps even finally whip the depleted officer corps into shape!
translation: 通过有限的几场战争的经验，我们应该能在装甲战中有所突破，甚至还有可能调教出来一些军官补充不足！
施密尔舒

original: SMERSH, or 'Death to Spies', is a proposed counter-intelligence initiative that would serve a dual purpose; rooting out enemy spies and executing deserters and partisans within the ranks of the Red Army.
translation: 施密尔舒，亦即“间谍之死”，是为了双重目的而提议设立的反情报机构；既铲除敌方间谍，又处决红军队伍中的逃兵和反抗者。
§Y抵消政变的风险。§!\n
镇压游击

original: SMERSH should be expanded to better be able to infiltrate and ruthlessly suppress all forms of partisan activity in occupied territory.
translation: 施密尔舒应当扩编，以便于更好的渗透和残酷镇压占领区的任何形式的游击队。
对德战争

original: The German threat continues to grow. We can and must destroy the German army and make them bow to their new overlords.
translation: 德国的威胁正在持续增长。我们能够而且必须要消灭德军，使他们屈服于他们的新主人。

original: Molotov Ribbentrop Pact not in effect
translation: 莫洛托夫-里宾特里甫协定已经无效了
对日战争

original: Does not have national spirit §YOfficers Purged§!
translation: 没有国家精神§Y大清洗§!

original: It seems the Japanese have no plans to back down. The only effective deterrent is going to be war. They will regret having resisted our demands when The Red Army tramples them down.
translation: 看来日本不打算退缩。唯一有效的威慑将是战争。当红军把他们踩在脚下他们就知道后悔拒绝我们的要求了。
对英战争

original: The imperialistic British have never had any respect for us. There is no doubt that they will turn to The Soviet Union when they are finished with the rest of the world. There is only one way to prevent their aggressive expansion. War!
translation: 英帝国主义从未尊重过我们。毫无疑问当他们拿下世界的其余部分后就该把枪口对准苏联了。只有一种方法可以阻止他们的侵略扩张。那就是战争！
索取黑海出海口

original: The straits leading from The Black Sea to the Aegean Sea is a key strategic point. We cannot allow this territory to be controlled by foreign powers. To ensure relevance of The Red Fleet we need to secure the straits.
translation: 从黑海到爱琴海的海峡是一个战略要地。我们不能允许这片区域被外国势力把持。为了确保红海军连为一体我们必须拿下海峡。
对希腊最后通牒

original: The Aegean Islands is the last strategic piece we need to make sure The Red Fleet can operate freely. The Greeks are pressured from all sides and will most like give up a little territory to avoid an all-out war.
translation: 爱琴海群岛是我们确保红色舰队能自由行动的最后一块需要拿下的战略要地。希腊人现在受到各个方面的压力，他们会放弃这一小块领土避免全面战争的。
多元化进程

original: We have learned much from the last years and progress have been made in fields of traditional warfare. We are a nation of great scientists who have the capacity to uncover methods of war giving tremendous advantages. We must make sure they have the best conditions to work under if we want to see results.
translation: 在传统战争领域我们已经在过去几年学习了很多进步了很多。我们国家的科学家有能力发现新的作战方法中获得巨大优势。如果想要看到结果我们就得确保他们有最好的工作环境。
科研城市实验

original: One of our foremost scientists, Kurchatov, has noted that when breaking up of kernels in a kilogram of uranium, the energy released must be equal to the explosion of 20,000 tons of trotyl. We need to harness this power before our enemies to ensure the survival of the Motherland.
translation: 我们的最重要的科学家之一库尔恰托夫已经注意到，一千克铀原子核裂变放出的能量相当于20000吨TNT。我们必须在我们的敌人之前掌握这种力量来确保祖国的安全。
封闭的城市网

original: We should set up closed cities for research that require more space than we have available in our military bases. Restricting access to the cities ensures that our research remains secret, while giving our scientists plenty of space for large scale experiments.
translation: 我们需要建立一些封闭的城市，比我们的军事基地有更多的空间。限制通行到这些城市可以让我们的研究保密，同时又给科学家们足够的空间做大型实验。
袭击美国！

original: The perfidious Americans have us at their mercy, controlling our supply of oil and other desperately needed resources. Their industry is vastly superior to ours, so if we strike, we had better strike hard! We cannot hope to win a prolonged war against the USA...
translation: 背信弃义的美国人让我们任其宰割，控制我们的石油和其他紧缺资源的供给。他们的工业远比我们的强大，所以要攻击美国，就要一击致命！我们可不能指望跟美国打赢一场长期战争……
蚕食中国

original: China has proven that it seeks to avoid war with us. Perhaps their leaders consider the internal divide a greater threat. We could offer them our protection from communists and warlords, as subjects in the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere.
translation: 已经证实中国人对我们畏战如鼠。也许是因为他们的领导人认为攘外必须安内。我们可以给他们提供保护，不受中共及军阀的侵扰，在大东亚共荣圈当个附庸国。
对华战争

original: The Marco Polo Bridge incident proved that the Chinese are not interested in cooperation. With increasing tension threatening the ensuing ceasefire, war may be the only means to bring the order to the Chinese nation.
translation: 卢沟桥事变证实中国人对合作不感兴趣。随着停火后日益紧张的局势，战争可能是给中国带来秩序的唯一手段。
消灭中国割据势力

original: The Chinese have allowed their once proud empire to be shattered, brought to pieces by radicals and military cliques. The Empire of Japan will not stand for such divisions, even of its subjects.
translation: 中国人允许他们的骄傲的帝国被激进分子和军阀化为碎片。但是大日本帝国不允许这种分裂存在，即使成为附庸。
破坏中德合作

original: German military advisors have been present in China since at least the twenties, providing critical support to the Kuomintang. This can no longer be tolerated. We are within our rights to demand the immediate withdrawal of all German support to the Chinese. It is time for the Germans to choose sides.
translation: 自从二十年代德国军事顾问就在中国给国民党提供关键支持。这事不能再被容忍下去了。在我们的权利范围内，我们要求所有德国对中国的支持立即撤出。现在是时候叫德国站队了。
建立我们的阵营

original: We have already made efforts towards the creation of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. To ensure lasting victory, Japan must be is strong enough to lead alone, in Asia and beyond.
translation: 我们已经朝着大东亚共荣圈努力进发。为了确保最终的胜利，日本必须足够强大，独领亚洲乃至世界风骚。
加入轴心国

original: We have many interests and values in common with the new Germany, which is building a power base in Europe. Joining them as allies would give us a powerful friend distant enough not to rival our rule of Asia.
translation: 我们和在欧洲建立权力根基的新德国有很多共同利益。跟他们成为盟友能给我们强力的帮助，他们还足够遥远而不会威胁到我们在亚洲的统治。
印度国民军

original: If Britain judges our efforts to build an empire, we will show them that their own is already crumbling. Indian prisoners of war and expatriates will form the foundation of a movement that can overthrow the British Raj.
translation: 如果英国人对我们建设大日本帝国的努力说三道四，我们会让他们发现自己的帝国已经摇摇欲坠。印度战俘和海外印度人将会形成足以推翻英属印度统治的运动基础。
改善民族意识

original: Nationalist pride and support for the war overcomes every subject of the Emperor, driving them to ever-greater heights of devotion!
translation: 民族骄傲和对战争的支持激励了每一个天皇的子民，驱使他们达到为国献身的新高度！
对暹罗友好

original: Siam has avoided European colonization and is not used to being a subject nation. Instead of subjugating them, we should convince them to cooperate with us for it to stay that way.
translation: 暹罗避免了欧洲殖民，并且也不习惯于做一个附庸国。不必征服他们，我们应该说服他们保持这种与我们合作的状态。
陆军为主

original: Of the two main service arms, it is truly the Army which is the strong right arm of the Empire! Its ability to take and hold ground far outweighs the minor services the Navy can provide. By recognizing this simple, self-evident fact and devoting more resources to the Army the possibilities are limitless.
translation: 作为两大军种之一，帝国陆军真称得上是帝国的得力左膀右臂！它可以征服和控制大片土地，比海军的小小贡献大多了。通过承认这一简单的、不言自明的事实并投入更多资源到陆军，我们将获得无限的可能。

original: Not enough building slots for §YMilitary Factories§! in home area.
translation: 本土没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y军用工厂§!
日本——暹罗外交

original: Japan has focused its diplomatic efforts on improving relations with Siam.
translation: 日本一直专注于外交努力改善与暹罗的关系。
海军为主

original: Not enough building slots for §YNaval Dockyards§! in home area.
translation: 本土没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y海军船坞§!

original: Of the two main service arms, it is truly the Navy which is the strong right arm of the Empire! Its ability to control the seas far outweighs the minor services the Army can provide. By recognizing this simple, self-evident fact and devoting more resources to the Navy the possibilities are limitless.
translation: 作为两大军种之一，帝国海军真称得上是帝国的得力左膀右臂！它可以征服和控制大片海域，比陆军的小小贡献大多了。通过承认这一简单的、不言自明的事实并投入更多资源到海军，我们将获得无限的可能。
陆军改革

original: Now that the Army is the recognized premier service of the Empire, it behooves us to devote more resources to the study of Land Doctrines.
translation: 现在陆军已经被认可，给了帝国最重要的贡献，我们应当投入更多资源研究陆军学说。
陆航改革

original: The Air force's primary mission must be the support of our vaunted Army!
translation: 空军的首要任务是支援我们引以为豪的帝国陆军！
陆军摩托化

original: A greater focus on motorization will increase the speed at which for Infantry can reach the battlefield, in areas with good roads at least.
translation: 更加专注摩托化可以增加步兵投入战场的速度，至少是在较高的道路上。
空军基地扩建

original: To better support out Army, the Air force requires larger Air bases.
translation: 为了更好的支援帝国陆军，空军需要更大的空军基地。
装甲部队改革

original: With our Army ascendant, some Generals have suggested we invest in a number of modern armored vehicles.
translation: 随着帝国陆军的兴起，一些将军提议我们可以投资一些现代装甲载具。
海军改革

original: Now that the Navy is the recognized premier service of the Empire, it behooves us to devote more resources to the design of new ship classes.
translation: 现在海军已经被认可，给了帝国最重要的贡献，我们应当投入更多资源研究新型船只的设计。
海航改革

original: The Air force's primary mission must be the support of our vaunted Navy!
translation: 空军的主要任务必须是支援我们引以为傲的海军！
运输护航

original: Although a cowardly and dishonorable tactic, it is possible that enemy nations might target the merchant ships that move supplies and resources around our Empire. We must study how best to protect these ships, should this come to pass.
translation: 尽管这是一项懦弱而且无耻的策略，敌军还是很可能会瞄准那些在我们的帝国内运输资源和补给的商船。如果这种事情真的发生，我们必须研究如何更好地保护这些船只。
先进鱼雷

original: By using compressed oxygen rather than compressed air in the propulsion systems our torpedoes will be able to travel further and carry a larger warhead than any previous types.
translation: 相较以前的型号，在推进装置中使用压缩氧气而非压缩空气将能够使我们的鱼雷射程更长并携带更大的弹头。
超重战列舰

original: In the short term it is unlikely we can out-build either Britain or the United States in numbers of Battleships, but perhaps we do not need to. Instead, it may be possible to build vastly more powerful Battleships than the Westerners Washington treaty allows them to construct.
translation: 就目前而言，我们不太可能造出比英美更多的战列舰——但是我们似乎也不必如此。作为替代，造出比西方基于华盛顿海军协定建造的条约舰更大的战列舰似乎是一个更合理的选择。
扩建海军基地

original: Naval expansion requires more Naval bases.
translation: 海军的扩张需要更多的海军基地。
重视航母

original: Japan requires a powerful navy, and the Aircraft Carrier must be the core of our Fleet's strength. The day of the Battleship is at an end, as our enemies will soon discover!
translation: 日本需要一支强大的海军，而航空母舰必将成为我们舰队力量的核心。很快，我们的敌人就会切身领悟：战列舰的时代正在迎来终结。
重视战列舰

original: Japan requires a powerful navy, and the Battleship must be the core of our Fleet's strength. Let other nations waste their wealth on untested Aircraft Carriers, only Battleships can dominate the seas!
translation: 日本需要一支强大的海军，而战列舰必将成为我们舰队力量的核心。让其他国家在未经战火洗礼的航空母舰上浪费钱财去吧，唯有战列舰能够统治海洋！
国民精神总动员

original: Our entire nation, not only our soldiers, need to be spiritually prepared for war. To this end, nationalists have been brought together in the National Spiritual Mobilization Movement to boost patriotism and support for the government.
translation: 不仅仅是我们的士兵，我们的所有国民都需要在精神上做好战争的准备。为了这个目的，所有的民族主义者都被集中到了国民精神动员大会上来宣扬爱国主义、支持政府。
武士传统

original: Throughout history, Japan has retained a unique set of traditions among the warrior class. These values must be revitalized and treasured by every soldier, regardless of rank.
translation: 纵观历史，日本保留了武士阶级的一套独特的传统。不论阶级高低，每个军人都应在心中复活武士精神之魂，并将之良久珍视。
神风特攻

original: Fearlessly facing the prospect of death is expected of any soldier, but our people must go beyond this, preparing to sacrifice themselves with no hope of survival for the glory of the emperor and the nation.
translation: 勇敢面对可能的死亡是对每一个军人的要求，但我们的人民必须更进一步，哪怕是十死无生也要时刻准备为天皇陛下和大日本帝国捐躯。
帝国荣耀
允许建造§H横须贺MXY7 樱花§!

original: Kamikaze, the tactics of the Special Attack Unit, have changed suicide attacks from an improvised last measure to an established doctrine. With new planes, essentially manned missiles, these attacks will be unstoppable.
translation: 作为一支特攻队，神风突击队将自杀式攻击由最后时刻的突发奇想变作了既定的教条。在新式飞机——一种有人驾驶的飞弹——的协助下，这种攻击将不可阻挡。
学生运动

original: The Ministry of Education is as important a part of the Spiritual Mobilization as any other, and having educators and students rally behind the nation will build a lasting military-oriented education system.
translation: 文部省在精神动员中的作用不可或缺，而让教育者与学生会支持国家将能够建立一个可持续的军事化导向教育体系。
增加科研槽
合成油料

original: Our own oil production is very limited and importing oil puts us at the mercy of foreign interests. The safest solution would be to perfect our synthetic oil technology.
translation: 我们自己的石油产出很有限，而进口石油使得我们不得不受外国利益的摆布。最为安全的解决办法是完善我们拥有的油料合成技术。

original: Idemitsu Kosan available as industry concern
translation: 工业企业增加：出光兴产
先进武器

original: As an island Empire we must ever be at the forefront of Naval research, but long-range rocketry cannot hurt either.
translation: 作为一个海洋帝国，我们必须时刻站在海军研究的最前沿，但远程火箭也不坏。
厉行节约

original: Every subject of the Emperor must sacrifice for the good of the Empire.
translation: 每一个天皇子民都必须为大日本帝国的利益作出牺牲。
重视工业

original: Japan is newly industrialized, and is not yet as powerful as some Western nations. We must take steps to close the gap between our capabilities.
translation: 日本刚刚完成工业化，暂且无法与西方国家的强大相比较。我们必须采取措施缩小与他们之间的差距。
重视基建

original: It has not been easy to build Infrastructure in our mountainous country, nonetheless efforts must continue.
translation: 在我们这样一个多山的国家建设基础设施并非易事，但我们还是必须继续努力。
本土决战

original: Should our enemies ever overwhelm our Navy, our fortifications will make any attempted invasion cost far more than most nations can afford to pay.
translation: 一旦我们的敌人击垮了我们的舰队，我们的防御工事将使得任何企图侵略我们的国家付出无法承受的代价。
密码炸弹

original: The Poles have been developing a brilliant machine they call the 'Cryptologic Bomb' which can break the German Enigma ciphers. We have the resources to develop it further at our Bletchley Park facility.
translation: 波兰人正在开发一个名为“密码炸弹”的绝妙机器，它能够用来破译德国的恩尼格码密码机。我们可以提供资金，在布莱切利园中继续这项研究。
蒂泽德代表团

original: We have produced many breakthroughs in technology that we cannot fully exploit ourselves due to our lack of resources and industrial capacity. Henry Tizard would like to head a delegation to negotiate a technology sharing treaty with the USA.
translation: 我们在技术研究方面完成了许多突破，但由于我们在资源和生产能力上的缺失而无法进一步拓展。亨利·蒂泽德希望率领一支代表团与美国商谈一个技术共享协议。
MAUD委员会

original: The 'Military Application of Uranium Detonation' committee is convinced that it is theoretically possible to construct a bomb of unbelievable power by employing uranium to achieve an uncontrolled nuclear fission reaction. However, we might not be able to develop this technology in time on our own. We should speak with the Americans.
translation: “核裂变军事应用”委员会相信，使用铀来实现不可控裂变反应，以此来制造一个威力令人难以置信的炸弹，在理论上是可能的。然而，仅靠我们自己恐怕无法及时地完成这项技术。我们需要跟美国人谈谈。
常规军事重组

original: It is starting to look like another Great War is inevitable. If it isn't Hitler it will be the Mikado, or even the Soviets... Public opinion has swung enough that we can initiate a program of general rearmament.
translation: 看起来，又一次世界大战似乎将要重演。挑起者如果不是希特勒，那么就是日本天皇，甚至是苏维埃……公众意见的转向已经足以让我们开启常规军事重组的项目。
空军防御
在§Y东盎格利亚§!，§Y萨塞克斯§!和§Y康沃尔§!增加§Y防空火炮§!的最大值
没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y防空火炮§!

original: There is no question of where the enemy will be coming from; we must protect the coast with extensive anti-air batteries.
translation: 无需多想我们的敌人会从哪里入侵，我们必须用大量的防空炮台把海岸线保护起来。
雷达

original: The ability to detect enemy bombers will be crucial to the war effort. We should spare no resources in further developing Radar technology and constructing a network of detection stations along the coasts.
translation: 探测敌军轰炸机的能力对战争的进程至关重要。我们应该不惜一切进一步开发雷达技术，并沿海岸线建立一个监测站网络。
皇家兵工厂

original: The Royal Arsenal at Woolwich is woefully insufficient to produce all the munitions and small arms we need. We should establish many more factories around the country, preferably in relatively safe areas.
translation: 很不幸，伍尔维奇的皇家兵工厂生产的军需品和轻武器不足以满足我们的需求。我们需要在全国组建大量的工厂，尤其是相对安全的地区。
影子计划

original: The Air Ministry has come up with a brilliant suggestion for easier conversion of civilian factories into military ones. With the appropriate grants and loans to various key companies, their factories can be extended and adapted in advance to make the transition to military applications much smoother.
translation: 航空部提出了一个天才的构想，能够将民用工厂转为军用的过程变得更容易。在给各个门类的关键企业提供了足够的津贴和贷款后，他们的工厂能够提前进行扩大和改造，使得其转变至军事用途的过渡更为平顺。
伯明翰轻武器公司

original: The Royal Ordnance Factories are not producing enough small arms, but, like we did in the Great War, we could contract the Birmingham Small Arms Company and expand their capacity.
translation: 皇家军械公司无力生产足够的轻武器，但一如我们在一战中做的那样，我们可以与伯明翰轻武器公司签订单，增加他们的生产量。
秘密武器

original: We now possess the knowledge and the infrastructure to focus on the development of various secret weapons projects that used to belong in the realm of science fiction.
translation: 我们现在已经掌握了必要的知识和基础设施，能够集中精力去开发许多种过去仅存在于科幻小说中的秘密武器。
重整空军军备

original: In any war with a continental enemy, the Royal Air Force will prove the key to victory. First, we must ensure that our airbases can support our rearmament plans!
translation: 在任何一场同大陆上的敌人进行的战争中，皇家空军都被证明是胜利的关键。首先，我们必须确保我们的空军基地能够支持我们的整备计划！
战斗机司令部

original: Our first priority must be to control our own skies! It is hard to discern a more important area of military research than fighter development.
translation: 我们的第一要务必然是控制我们自己的天空！很难找到一个比战斗机的开发更加重要的军事研究领域。
轰炸机司令部

original: Like Giulio Douhet always said; 'The bomber will always get through!'. Advances in radar technology and anti-air defenses notwithstanding, we should prioritize the development of better bombers.
translation: 就像朱里奥·杜黑经常说的那样：“轰炸机不可阻挡！”尽管雷达技术和防空火炮取得了一些发展，我们还是应当重点发展更好的轰炸机。
沿海司令部

original: Our industry is driven by resources shipped to Britain from many distant parts of the Empire. Our convoys are our lifeblood and must be protected by both the Royal Navy and the Royal Air Force. We should set up a special RAF formation to protect the approaches to our ports!
translation: 我们的工业依赖于大量的资源，这些资源都是经船队由帝国辖下的各个边远地区运至不列颠的。我们的运输船队是我们的生命线，必须由皇家海军和皇家空军戮力合作，共同保护。我们必须组建一个专门的空军编队来保护通往我们港口的航线。
飞机生产集团

original: Aircraft production remains our highest priority. The London Aircraft Production Group (LAPG) should be created to manage and coordinate all available aircraft related production.
translation: 飞机的生产是我们的重中之重。我们应当组建伦敦飞机生产集团，以此来管理和整合所有与飞机相关的产业。
喷气式飞机

original: It seems almost certain that the Jet engine will come to replace propeller engines on airplanes. The potential is enormous, and we must not allow Britain to lag behind in this crucial area of research.
translation: 看起来，喷气式引擎势必将取代螺旋引擎，成为飞机的动力源。它的潜力很大，我们绝不能容忍英国在这个重要的研究领域上落后。
重整海军军备

original: Though we tried to prevent a naval arms race with the Second London Naval Treaty, even the signatories are mostly ignoring it. The Royal Navy must never lose its global supremacy. We must always ensure that it remains the largest in the world.
translation: 尽管我们已经通过第二次伦敦海军协定去尽力阻止海军军备竞赛了，然而，即使是当初的签约国，大多数也已无视了这个条约。皇家海军必须时刻保持全球霸权，我们必须一直确保拥有世界上最大的海军。
重视驱逐舰

original: Modern battleships are marvels, but we must not neglect the critical role of the humble destroyer in the protection of our convoys.
translation: 现代战列舰令人惊叹，但我们绝不能因此而忽略小小的驱逐舰在航运保护中所起到的关键作用。
重视护航运输

original: It cannot be stressed enough, our convoys are our lifeblood. We must do everything in our power to protect them and to replace lost tonnage quickly.
translation: 无需赘述，我们的航运线即是我们的生命线。我们必须尽一切努力去保护运输船队，并尽快补充损失的船舶。
不列颠统治海洋

original: In the long shadow of the Royal Navy, other naval powers are forced to come up with innovative new doctrines to compensate. We must not grow complacent and rely solely on the quantity and quality of individual ships.
translation: 在皇家海军的庞大阴影之下，其他国家的海军不得不尽力提出新的学说以补偿军力上的不足。我们绝不能滋生自满，不能仅仅依靠单体舰船的质量与总数。
重视航母

original: There is an intense argument among naval theorists about the continued viability of the battleship. There are those who argue that modern air power will come to dominate naval power, and that the aircraft carrier will replace the battleship as the king of the oceans.
translation: 在海军学说的讨论中，有关战列舰的存续方面有着一个巨大的分歧。一部分人主张现代空军将成为凌驾于海军之上的统治力量，因此航空母舰将取代战列舰成为新的海洋之王。
威胁西班牙

original: The Spanish know better than most the power of the Royal Navy, but perhaps a reminder is in order...
translation: 西班牙人比大多数国家更了解皇家海军的威力，但是，可能些许暗示没什么不合适的……
重视战列舰

original: While the theorists bicker about air supremacy or naval supremacy, no one wants the guns of a battleship pointing at their palace. Even if the carrier enthusiasts prove right in the end, battleships will still dominate the oceans for years to come.
translation: 尽管理论学家们在为海军和空军的优先度而争论不休，但是没有人希望一艘战列舰上的火炮瞄准他们的宅邸。就算航母的拥趸们最终被证明是正确的，战列舰也依旧将继续统治海洋很多年。
威胁土耳其

original: They don't have to love us, but Johnny Turkey should know enough to fear our battleships...
translation: 他们不需要爱我们，但是土耳其小子必须足够了解我们的战列舰的可怕之处……
两栖作战

original: Ruling the waves is fine, but sometimes you need to get your feet wet. We must not neglect our ability to land invasion forces in hostile territory.
translation: 统治海洋固然很好，但有时你还是要从实践中吸取教训。我们绝不能忽视在敌方领土上进行登陆作战的能力。
新加坡战略

original: Singapore should remain our primary naval base in the East. Hong Kong may fall to the Japanese, but Singapore must remain impregnable until the Main Fleet can arrive to decisively defeat the enemy.
translation: 新加坡应该继续作为我们在东方的重要的海军基地。香港或许会被日本攻陷，但新加坡必须坚守，直到我们的主力舰队抵达并痛击敌军。
岸防工事

original: The current defenses on Singapore Island are inadequate. We must focus our efforts on beefing up the fortifications!
translation: 当前我们在新加坡岛的防卫很不完善。我们必须集中全力去增强那里的防御工事！
半岛战争

original: We should preempt and slow down an enemy coming down from the north through Malaya before they even reach Singapore.
translation: 在敌人抵达新加坡之前，我们应该抢先占据马来半岛并延缓敌军南下的脚步。
控制香港

original: The Singapore Strategy is obsolete. Our plan should be bolder and rely on a base much closer to Japan. With sufficient fortifications and facilities, Hong Kong will serve perfectly!
translation: 新加坡战略已经过时了。我们的计划应该更为大胆，立足一个更加靠近日本的基地。只要有足够的防御工事和辅助设施，香港将能够起到非常完美的作用。
岸防工事

original: Hong Kong will have to become a fortress city in order to withstand a sustained attack from mainland China.
translation: 为了抵御来自大陆地区的进攻，香港将不得不转变为一座要塞城市。
对空防御

original: We must expand and improve the anti-air emplacements in Hong Kong greatly.
translation: 我们必须大幅度增加并改良在香港的防空炮阵地。
禁运政策

original: The best way of defeating dictators - whether red or brown - is to simply starve them of the resources they need to wage war. The problem is just to browbeat the bankers and corporations who do business with them...
translation: 不管是红色的独裁者还是褐色的独裁者，最好的击败他们的方式就是简单的让他们得不到发动战争所必须的资源，解决这个问题只需要恫吓下和他们有业务关系的银行和大公司就行……
制裁意大利

original: Mussolini dreams of a new Roman Empire and, absurd as it may sound, might someday attack us to achieve his dream. We should do what we can to prevent this before it comes to war.
translation: 尽管听起来荒谬无比，墨索里尼还是有可能为了实现其建立一个崭新的罗马帝国的幻想而进攻我们，我们应该在战争到来前尽其所能的阻止其实现。
制裁日本

original: The Japanese seem committed to creating their 'Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere'; under their hegemony, of course. The British Empire is the primary obstacle, together with the colonies of other Western powers. They must be denied access to the resources they need.
translation: 日本还在继续建立他们所谓的“大东亚共荣圈”，当然这个共荣圈必须在他们的霸权领导下。大英帝国和其他西方势力的殖民地是其主要绊脚石，必须阻止日本人获得他们所需的的资源。
滇缅公路

original: We should aid the Chinese in their struggle against Japan by constructing a road - and associated infrastructure - between Burma and China where supplies can be reach them overland, safe from Japanese predation.
translation: 我们应该建设公路及配套基础设施来帮助中国抗击日本侵略者——这条公路应该连接缅甸和中国使补给可以在通过陆路运达的同时避开日本人的劫掠。
干涉斯堪地纳维亚

original: Scandinavia would have little strategic import if it were not for one thing; Swedish iron exports. We must put pressure on both Sweden and Norway in order to prevent this vital resource from reaching Germany. If they refuse, we might have to be prepared to invade...
translation: 要不是因为瑞典的钢铁出口，斯堪的纳维亚的战略价值并不算大，我们必须向瑞典和挪威施压以保证德国无法得到这些重要资源，如果他们拒绝，那么我们可能需要为入侵做好准备……
伊拉克安全保障

original: We granted Iraq independence in 1932, but considering the current global situation, that might have been a mistake. Iraqi oil must never be allowed to reach our enemies...
translation: 我们在1932年保证了伊拉克独立，但是考虑到现如今的全球局势，那或许是一个错误。我们绝对不能让敌人得到伊拉克的石油……
伊朗安全保障

original: Iran is not just rich in oil that must be denied our enemies; it is also the strategic nexus between India, the Middle East and the Soviet Union.
translation: 伊朗不仅有决不能让敌人获得的丰富石油；它还是连接印度，中东和苏联的战略要地。
印度独立

original: Japan is actively fomenting rebellion in India and has even formed a 'National Indian Army' composed of Indian recruits. The situation could grow dangerous if nothing is done to prevent it. We can either defeat Japan quickly, or promise the Indians independence in a few years.
translation: 日本正在印度煽动叛乱甚至组织了一支由印度人组成的“印度国民军”。这种情况如果不加以阻止可能会变的十分危急，我们要么在短时间内击败日本，要么向印度承诺同意其在几年后独立。
鼓励殖民地精英

original: Our vast, sprawling empire houses some of the greatest minds in the world, but its size prevents many of them from ever meeting. By encouraging them to work together on our most important projects, we can achieve results faster.
translation: 我们广大的帝国里拥有着许多世界上最杰出的大脑，但是帝国辽阔的疆域使他们中的大多数不能聚在一起。如果鼓励他们一同为我们最重要的计划工作，我们就可以更快的达到目的。
强化东亚

original: Many of our old colonies in the east are threatened by civil wars and imperial ambitions of local countries. We must not neglect our remaining outposts, but continue to develop these regions to secure our global presence.
translation: 我们在东方很多古老的殖民地处于连绵内战和当地国家野心的威胁，我们决不能忽略这些已经存在的前哨，并且应该持续开发这些区域以巩固我们的全球影响力。
影响中国

original: Although the Chinese nationalists have called themselves enemies of our colonial efforts, they are trapped between enemies with too few allies. If we reach out to them, they may be willing to shift their policies.
translation: 尽管中国宣称自己是我们殖民政策的敌人，但是他们却拥有太多的敌人而没有几个盟友。如果我们向其伸出橄榄枝，他们有可能愿意转变他们的政策。
英联邦关系

original: United by common allegiance to the Crown, the nations of the British Commonwealth are the first we can count on in the event of another global conflict. Securing our diplomatic administration there will be of the essence.
translation: 基于对皇室的效忠而团结在一起的英联邦成员国是我们在一场全球冲突中最先能依赖的盟友。保证我们在这些国家的外交影响至关重要。
发展拉贾斯坦

original: The state of our colonies in India remains controversial both abroad and at home, but whatever is in store for them, strengthening their industrial capacity is a priority at the present stage.
translation: 印度殖民地的地位不论在国内还是海外仍然充满争议，但是不论将来发生什么，现阶段的首要任务都是强化当地的工业能力。
向北扩张

original: The Northern Expansion Doctrine, which has the support of the Imperial Army, recognizes that the Soviet Union poses the greatest threat to Japanese ambitions. With tensions rising in Europe, a favorable moment to attack the Russian Far East is bound to present itself. We must strike quickly.
translation: 向北扩张的策略由帝国陆军支持，认为苏联对日本的野心威胁最大，现在欧洲局势紧张，一个绝佳的攻击俄国远东地区的时机浮现了出来。我们必须尽快发动攻击。
向南扩张

original: Add §Ynon-aggression pact§! with §YSoviet Union§! when selected\n
translation: 选择后会添加与§Y苏联§!的§Y互不侵犯条约§!\n

original: The Southern Expansion Doctrine, favored by the Imperial Navy, dictates that Japan must expand south into Southeast Asia and the Pacific. The rich colonies of the European powers have resources critical to Japanese industry, but this path will lead to conflict with the United States. A preemptive strike is in order.
translation: 向南扩张的策略由帝国海军支持，认为日本必须向南扩张进入南亚和太平洋。欧洲列强富裕的殖民地拥有对日本工业至关重要的原材料，但是这条道路会导致与美利坚合众国的冲突。先发制人的打击正在进行中。
新企业/顾问可用。\n
启用§Y政治顾问§!：\n
启用§Y陆军部长§!：\n
启用§Y海军部长§!：\n
启用§Y空军部长§!：\n
启用§Y总司令§!：\n
启用§Y理论家§!：\n
启用§Y制造商§!：\n
可作为§Y工业企业§!：\n
移除§Y政治顾问§!：\n
移除§Y陆军部长§!：\n
移除§Y海军部长§!：\n
移除§Y空军部长§!：\n
移除§Y总司令§!：\n
移除§Y理论家§!：\n
美利坚国策
发行战争债券

original: With war bonds, we rely on the people's support of the war effort and patriotism to finance military expenses.
translation: 通过发行战争债券，我们可以依赖民众对战争的支持和爱国主义为军事开支筹集资金。
战略情报局

original: Forming a dedicated intelligence agency will not only aid the war, but future operations abroad. British intelligence services can serve as a model.
translation: 组建战略情报局不仅可为战争提供帮助，同时也有利于未来的海外行动。英国情报局可以作为一个模范样本进行服役。
战时工业

original: We have a strong industry, but not all of it is well adapted for production of war materials. Finding efficient processes to facilitate this change will be key to utilizing our resources.
translation: 我们的工业十分强劲，但是并非全部可以很好地适应战争物资生产。找出有效的措施使军事工业转化更加容易将是高效利用我方资源的关键。
第一特殊任务部队

original: Operations behind enemy lines in inhospitable territory will be part of any global conflict. Forming commando units to fulfill these roles is essential to our future warfare.
translation: 在不友好的敌后区域行动是所有全球冲突的一部分。组建特殊任务部队来胜任这些角色对我们未来的战事十分重要。
橡胶储备公司

original: With the eruption of war, we have lost almost all our sources of imported rubber.\n\nWith an enormous coordinated effort, the rubber companies in the United States can cooperate to find better means of producing synthetic rubber, possibly even meeting the demands of the war effort.
translation: 随着战争的爆发，我们失去了所有的进口橡胶资源。\n\n通过巨大的协同努力，美国的橡胶公司可以协同合作从而找到更好的生产合成橡胶的方法，这很可能可以满足战争需求。
昭昭天命

original: The special circumstances around our nation's foundation and history give us mandate to act on injustice and oppression anywhere in the world. To create a safe international community, our primary export must be freedom.
translation: 我们国家特殊的周边环境和历史注定我们要对全世界的不公和压迫做出回应。为了构造更加安全的国际社会，我们最应该输出的乃是自由。

original: §YGives wargoals against all Fascist and Communist nations.§!\n
translation: §Y设定一个针对所有法西斯主义及共产主义国家的战争目标。§!\n
欢迎科学家

original: Having asserted ourselves as guardians of liberty in the world, we can welcome researchers and intellectuals driven out of the oppressive regimes abroad, giving them a chance to succeed and aid our cause in the land of opportunity.
translation: 通过把我们树立成自由世界卫士的形象，我们可以接受那些被压迫性政权驱逐出来的科学家和研究人员，给予他们获得成果机会的同时还能帮助我们在机遇之地的事业。
公共事业振兴署

original: Millions of people are still suffering the unemployment resulting from the Great Depression. An agency to put these people to work on public projects may not fully solve the problem, but the Work Progress Administration is a step in the right direction.
translation: 目前仍有数百万的民众处于由大萧条造成的失业状态，一个让这些人为公共项目工作的机构可能不能完全解决这个问题，但是公共事业振兴署仍是往正确方向前进的一个步骤。
专家委员会

original: We should replace a number of politicians and businesspeople with scientists and engineers. They have the technical expertise to manage the economy and we will see great scientific progress, which will lead to our economy flourishing once again.
translation: 我们应该用科学家和工程师来取代一批政客和商人。他们拥有丰富的科学经验来管理经济，如此我们将能看到巨大的科技进步，这将引导我们的经济再度繁荣起来。
远程火力支援

original: Supporting our brave troops in any way we can is key to victory. Be that by laying down heavy artillery fire from a distance or more direct support on the battlefield. We must make sure our troops have everything they need.
translation: 尽我们所能的支援我们勇敢的军队是取得胜利的关键。这可以通过远距离重型火炮支援或者更多战场的直接支援来实现。我们必须确保我们的军队拥有一切所需的资源。
军事建设

original: With superpowers threatening world peace, our public works projects need to be turned towards military matters as well as civilian ones.
translation: 鉴于几个强权国家正在威胁世界和平，我们的公共工程需要同时转向军事和民生领域。
美国陆军工程兵部队计划

original: The US Army Corps of Engineers will be put to the task of building the foundation for many future military projects the like of which the world has never seen. Essayons!
translation: 美国陆军工程兵将以全世界前所未见的方式完成为众多的未来军事项目建设基础建筑的任务，让我们一起尝试！
民主兵工厂

original: Regardless of whether or not we choose to intervene directly in a war, democratic nations must know that we will arm and support them.
translation: 不论我们是否选择介入这场战争，民主国家必须知道我们会武装并支持他们。
自由轮

original: Mass-production of cargo ships need to accompany our industrial developments to ensure our materials and troops reach the theaters where they are needed.
translation: 需要大量生产货轮为我们的工业发展保驾护航来保证我们的材料和军队抵达需要他们的地方。
战争宣传

original: Our people don't want to send their children to die in another war, but many politicians see a need for intervention. Propaganda to demonize the enemy and call for open conflict may not only be a tool for tyrants.
translation: 我们的人民不希望把子女派到另一场战争中去送死，但是很多政客认识到了介入战争的必要性。恶魔化宣传敌人和呼吁公开冲突或许并不是暴君的专有工具。
黑色战争计划

original: It's plain to see that Germany's politics and expansionism goes far beyond any measure of sanity. They must be stopped before their war machine reaches the point of no return.
translation: 显而易见德国的政策与扩张策略已经走得太远陷入了疯狂之中。在他们的战争机器运转到不可挽回之前一定要阻止他们。
对德禁运

original: Germany is dependent on oil and other natural resources for their war effort. Cutting off their access to these is the least we can do.
translation: 德国依赖于石油和其他自然资源为其战争服务。至少我们可以切断他们获得这些资源的途径。
驱逐舰换基地

original: The UK is in need of ships, and we need to protect our home territory. For the right to set up military bases in currently British territories, we can exchange some Destroyers, which will hopefully be put to good use as well.
translation: 英国需要舰船而我们需要保证家园领土安全。我们可以通过提供一些驱逐舰获得在英国现有领土建立军事基地的权利，这些基地对我们会有很大的益处。
§Y[USA.GetNameDef]§!：\n
白色战争计划

original: The Red Menace cannot be allowed to expand unchecked. Whether from without or from within, there is no greater threat to our nation and the world at large.
translation: 绝不能允许红色威胁不受限制的扩张。不论内外，都不存在一个比它对我们国家或者世界更大的威胁。
对苏禁运

original: Depriving the Soviet Union of trade opportunities with us will both keep us from aiding their military efforts and prove our economic model as superior.
translation: 剥夺苏联和我们贸易的机会不仅能保证我们不会资助他们的军事企图还能证明我们的经济模式的优越性。
红色战争计划

original: After appearing to be on the path to respecting the people, our old oppressors are now at odds with the winds of change we've accepted. The British Empire is showing its true colors. We must let them know where we stand.
translation: 过去的压迫者们撕下了尊重人民的伪装，开始反对我们所接纳的改革风潮。大英帝国已经显出了自己的真面目，我们必须让他们知道我们的立场。
对英禁运

original: Despite having enjoyed good relations for a long time, the British have betrayed the ideals we hoped they learned to live up to. It's time to let them know the consequences.
translation: 尽管和他们在很长时间内保持良好的关系，英国还是背弃了我们希望他们能学会与人共存的理想。是时候让他们自食其果了。
橙色战争计划

original: There is no greater threat to us than Japan's imperialistic ambitions. Their efforts to expand into Asia and the Pacific will put them at odds with our interests quickly.
translation: 对我们来说再也没有比日本帝国主义野心更大的威胁了。他们向亚洲和太平洋扩张的企图将很快与我们的利益发生冲突。
对日禁运

original: We must show Japan that their aggression will not be accepted or aided by the USA. An embargo will be the first step to thwarting their designs on the Pacific.
translation: 我们必须向日本表明美国绝不支持或者帮助日本的侵略行径。禁运是挫败他们在太平洋上的企图的第一步。
准备干涉

original: Through diplomatic and trade decisions, our position on the international scene has shifted from neutral and isolationist to taking a stance on foreign aggressions. Our military policies will reflect this in in the future.
translation: 经过一系列的外交和贸易决策，我们对国际事务的看法已经从孤立主义转变为要对其他国家的挑衅行为表明立场。未来我们的军事政策也将变成这样。
扩大科研团队
曼哈顿计划

original: Development of Substitute Materials, an innocent-sounding USACE project, will eventually be known as the Manhattan Project. One of the most secretive and dangerous undertakings in military history, its goal is create the first atomic bomb.
translation: 代用材料项目发展，一个听起来无害的美国陆军工程兵部队项目，最终被称为曼哈顿计划。一个军事史上最秘密和危险的任务之一，它的目标是制造第一颗原子弹。
邪恶同盟

original: Sometimes, we have to choose our enemies. Often, the choice is not easy. The future may judge us for standing side by side with one tyrant, or praise us for saving it from the other.
translation: 有时，我们不得不选择我们的敌人。这个选择常常不容易。未来将会审判我们是与暴君为伍还是赞扬我们拯救了世界。

original: Boosts opinion and trade opinion with the Soviet Union or Germany if they are at war, siding with the defender.
translation: 如果苏联或德国处于战争，则同他们促进和交换意见，支持防御者。
有限干涉

original: It would take extraordinary aggression to draw us into a war at full force, but after recent developments, many people are freely willing to assist in conflicts abroad.
translation: 这会使我们获得非凡的侵略性从而使我们卷入全面战争，但经过最近的调查，许多人民表示愿意支持海外冲突。
巨人的觉醒

original: Nations turn to us to protect the values of democracy and liberty. The world where non-interventionist America was born no longer exists and we must adapt accordingly.
translation: 国家们求助于我们保护民主和自由的价值。那个不干涉主义美国诞生的世界已经不复存在了，因此我们必须适应。
珍珠港策略

original: The naval base in Pearl Harbor is an easy target for the Japanese. By basing a fleet there, we will demonstrate our power in the Pacific. Will they dare challenge such a bold move?
translation: 珍珠港基地对日本来说是个简单的目标。通过驻扎一个舰队，我们将展示我们在太平洋上的力量。但他们敢于挑战我们英勇的行为吗？

original: §YWhile the focus is running, Japan will have the opportunity to launch an attack.§!
translation: §Y当我们执行此策略时，日本将会获得发动进攻的有利条件。§!
放弃珍珠港策略

original: Stationing a fleet in Pearl Harbor endangers the lives of our sailors. We will not risk them to provoke a war with Japan.
translation: 在珍珠港驻军将使我们水手的生命遭到威胁。我们不能冒冒险激怒日本开战。
空战计划部

original: To make the right priorities in aviation as well as aircraft production will require long-term planning. The AWPD will ensure we have materiel, organization and strategic plans.
translation: 为了确保航空的优先权和飞机的制造，需要长期规划。空战计划部将会确保我们有原料、组织和战略计划。
空中支援

original: Aerial warfare must first and foremost be used in conjunction with other military operations.
translation: 空战必须首先和其他军事行动联结起来。
战略轰炸

original: The capacity to execute precision bombing will allow us to stop the war machine of any nation in its tracks.
translation: 执行精确轰炸可以让我们阻止任何国家的战争机器。
重视战术轰炸机

original: Constructing planes built to attack tactical targets will make way for our troops to advance more safely.
translation: 建造飞机以攻击战术目标可以让我们的军队更加安全的前进。
轰炸机联合进攻

original: With another Great Power on our side, we have unexpected advantages in researching and applying large-scale offensive bombing.
translation: 和我们盟友中的另一个列强联合，使我们在研究和应用大规模攻击性轰炸中有意想不到的优势。
建造海军

original: We must be able to adapt to anything new our enemies throws at us. Increased funding to navy exercises will lead to a more efficient navy that can tactically outperform our enemies.
translation: 我们必须适应任何敌人针对我们的变化。增加海军训练的投入可以让我们的海军更富经验并在战术上超过敌人。
海军船务局

original: We will combine the Bureau of Construction and Repair and the Bureau of Engineering into one entity to oversee future naval developments.
translation: 我们将合并建造修理局和工程局来监督未来的海军发展。
战列舰为主

original: With the Japanese denounciation of the Washington Naval Treaty, we may face another arms race on the oceans. We will ensure we have both the most and best battleships.
translation: 由于日本谴责华盛顿海军条约，我们可能面临另一场海洋军备竞赛。我们要确保拥有最好和最多的战列舰。
先进马汉学说

original: The influence of Alfred Thayer Mahan on naval warfare can hardly be underestimated. Building on his work will allow us to make good use of battleships, which he considered a decisive factor.
translation: 阿尔弗雷德·赛耶·马汉在海军战争的影响不可能被低估。以他深思熟虑的决定性因素为基础会让我们更好的使用战列舰。
航母为主

original: Air power will be needed in battles to come, and the most practical means of extending its range is the use of aircraft carriers. We must create more advanced and specialized models.
translation: 空军力量在未来战争是必须的，而最实用的扩大作战半径方法就是使用航空母舰。我们必须建造更高级更专业的航母类型。
海军航空局

original: To meet the needs for naval aviation development, the Bureau of Aeronautics, which has been responsible for these matters for decades, will have to be expanded.
translation: 为了达到海军航空发展的需要，美国航空局已经着力发展了几十年并且必须扩大了。
重视护航

original: Submarines constitute a danger to our merchant convoys. Focusing on development of new destroyer models will allow us to wage anti-submarine warfare efficiently.
translation: 潜水艇对我们的贸易护航造成了危险。重点发展新型驱逐舰可以让我们更有效地发动反潜战。
护航策略

original: Protecting our trade vessels is not just about escorts and effective intelligence, but also tactical choices in how to arrange our trade routes and routines.
translation: 保护贸易船只不仅需要护航和有效的情报机构，还要有策略的安排我们的贸易路线和习惯。
两栖作战

original: Unless our worst nightmares come true, this war will not be ended on American soil. Well-executed landings will need to be part of the path to victory.
translation: 除非最可能的梦魇变成现实，这场战争不会在美国的土地上结束。干净利落的登陆是通向胜利不可或缺的一部分。
扩建海军陆战队

original: The United States Marine Corps have been a decisive force in many past wars and may be more relevant than ever for our amphibious campaigns. Semper fidelis!
translation: 美国海军陆战队在过去很多战争中已经起到了决定性的力量而且可能在两栖战役中起到更大的作用，“Semper fidelis（永远忠诚-美国海军歌曲）”！
重申门罗主义

original: Dating over a 100 years back, the Monroe Doctrine codified US intervention in the case of European attempts to colonize the Americas, but stay out of European affairs. Strengthening our role as peace-keepers on these continents will improve our influence in the region.
translation: 往前数100年，门罗主义确立了美国干涉欧洲在美洲殖民的情况，但游离于欧洲事务之外。加强我们在这些大陆上和平卫士的角色可以增加我们在地区内的影响。
加勒比海势力范围

original: The Caribbean islands offer the perfect location to launch strikes against our Eastern coast or the Panama canal, so of course we must make it clear that no hostile takeovers of the area will be permitted.
translation: 加勒比诸岛有着向我们东海岸和巴拿马运河发起攻击的完美位置，所以我们必须确保任何敌对势力都不可能控制这片区域。
中美洲

original: It would be unthinkable to let any foreign power take control of, or even be able to threaten, the Panama canal. As such, we shall guarantee the independence of all the Central American nations.
translation: 让外国势力控制或威胁巴拿马运河是不可想象的。同样地，我们应保证所有中美洲国家的独立。
邻国

original: We must first and foremost see to the safety of the countries closest to us. Rather than having the enemy cross our neighbors to get to us, they'll cross us if they cross our neighbors.
translation: 我们必须首先确保最靠近我们的国家的安全。不然我们的敌人会穿过我们的邻居到达我们的领土，并穿过我们到达下一个国家。
南美洲

original: Colonial empires must never again be able to expand into South America, we shall guarantee the independence of our Southern brothers to keep them safe.
translation: 殖民帝国再也不允许踏足南美洲了，我们应该保证南方兄弟们的独立来确保他们的安全。
美式和平

original: The peace in America must be kept. We have the strength to ensure that petty squabbles between neighboring nation do not escalate. A war at our doorsteps is exactly what our enemies want, and we must do everything we can to prevent it.
translation: 美洲必须和平。我们有足够的力量来确保邻国的争吵不会升级。家门口的战争正是我们敌人所期望的，而我们必须竭尽一切来阻止战争。

original: @USA §YUnited States§! can intervene in wars between American countries
translation: @USA §Y美利坚§!可以介入美洲国家的战争
暗箱操作
§R机密§!

original: We have information of political activities in a number of American countries that does not align with our interests. Fortunately we have established a underground propaganda network and are ready to push these countries in our direction. This is something we must do to ensure that we are not under threat at home.
translation: 我们有许多不与我们利益一致的美洲国家的政治活动信息。幸运地是我们已经建立了一个地下广播网络并准备好了推动这些国家向符合我们利益的方向前进。为了没有后顾之忧，我们必须这么做。
主动干涉

original: We can no longer sit idly by and watch neighboring countries build tool of war meant to suppress us or our allies. We must intervene for the greater good of our mighty country and the world.
translation: 我们不能再坐看邻国建造战争工具企图围剿我们和我们的盟友了。为了我们强大国家和世界的未来，我们必须干涉。
建造科技加成
空中优势学说加成
战场破坏学说加成
轰炸机型号加成
海军轰炸机型号加成
战略摧毁学说加成
陆军学说加成
电子学加成
中型坦克型号加成
坦克型号加成
雷达科技加成
机械化部队加成
奇迹武器加成
驱逐舰型号加成
巡洋舰型号加成
航母型号加成
战列舰型号加成
战列巡洋舰型号加成
潜艇型号加成
主力舰型号加成
贸易封锁学说加成
特种部队加成
空军型号加成
舰船型号加成
战斗机型号加成
护航防御学说加成
合成资源科技
海军学说加成
译码加成
战略轰炸机加成
喷气式飞机型号加成
海军陆战队加成
运输船型号
炮兵科技加成
空军学说加成
潜艇行动学说加成
步兵武器加成
摩托化自行加成
步兵武器及炮兵加成
特种部队加成
近距支援机加成
喷气式引擎及火箭引擎加成
存在舰队学说加成
工业加成
核研究加成

original: §YThe NKVD§! is now more tightly integrated in our army, making sure soldier morale and faith in the Party is high.\n
translation: §Y内务部队§!现在与我们的军队更紧密地结合在一起了，他们将保证士兵们的士气以及对党的忠诚。\n

original: This will disband [Root.GetFactionName] and create the §YBerlin-Moscow§! faction.\n
translation: 这将解散 [Root.GetFactionName]并创立§Y柏林—莫斯科§!阵营。\n

original: §RIf the Soviets accept our offer we will suffer some loss of National Unity due to this change of policy. Needless to say, our fellow Fascists and the Democratic powers will also be upset by this turn of events.§!\n
translation: §R如果苏联人接受了我们的要求，那我们会因为政治变动而损失一些国家凝聚力。不言而喻的是，国内的法西斯主义者以及民主国家同样不会对形势的这一变化感到高兴。§!\n
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被斯大林清洗
被托洛茨基清洗

original: Has had a war since completing The Great Purge
translation: 大清洗结束后已经进行了一次战争。
法国本土

original: Not enough building slots for §YInfrastructure§! in Metropolitan France
translation: 法国本土没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y基础设施§!

original: La Métropole should always come first. We can start by improving our infrastructure to create jobs and enable faster troop deployment.
translation: 本土永远是第一位的。我们可以从改善基础设施开始，这能够提供工作机会并提高部队部署速度。
法属阿尔及利亚

original: Not enough building slots for §YInfrastructure§! in Colonial France
translation: 法国殖民地没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y基础设施§!

original: Europe is facing dangerous times. We should focus on improving our lands to the south and ensure we can always support the mainland.
translation: 欧洲正处于一个危险的时刻。我们应该专注于改善南边的领土，以保证我们可以一直对本土提供支援。
工业扩张

original: Not enough building slots for §YCivilian Factories§! in Metropolitan France
translation: 法国本土没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y民用工厂§!

original: We need a stronger industrial presence at home. We have plenty of labour ready, but need more factory lines.
translation: 我们需要在本土建立强大的工业存在。我们已经有了足够的工人，但我们需要更多的生产线。
殖民地工业

original: Not enough building slots for §YCivilian Factories§! in Colonial France
translation: 法国殖民地没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y民用工厂§!

original: We should focus our industry in Algier. Should tensions increase in Europe we will still have an industrial capacity outside the reach of enemy bombers.
translation: 我们应该专注于阿尔及尔的工业。这样我们可以在欧洲紧张度不断上升的时候，使一部分工业能力留在敌人的轰炸范围之外。
军用工厂

original: Not enough building slots for §YMilitary Factory§! in Metropolitan France
translation: 法国本土没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y军用工厂§!

original: Our war-machine is falling behind in capacity. We need to focus on production of military equipment at home soil to make sure that our borders are constantly given new equipment.
translation: 我们的军事机器因为生产能力不足而落后了。我们需要专注于本土的军事装备生产，以保证边境上的部队能不断得到新装备。
殖民地军用工厂

original: Not enough building slots for §YMilitary Factory§! in Colonial France
translation: 法国殖民地没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y军用工厂§!

original: Placing our military production outside Europe ensures that even if the enemy gains control of our airspace, we will maintain a constant flow of equipment to our front-line troops.
translation: 把军用工厂部署在欧洲以外，可以使我们在失去制空权的情况下，依然为前线的部队源源不断地提供装备。
增加科研槽

original: Promising young minds are popping up everywhere. We need to supply them with facilities to conduct their research. Advances in technology can give us the edge where we most need it.
translation: 有前途的年轻思想家在各地不断涌现，我们需要为他们提供便利，让他们开展自己的研究。科技的进步可以让我们在最需要的地方取得突破。
重视核研究

original: Initial tests in nuclear science has shown promising results. Harnessing its power can give us a weapon unlike anything mankind has seen.
translation: 核能科学的最初实验展示了很有潜力的结果。掌握核力量将是我们拥有一件人类历史上前所未有的武器。
重视喷气式引擎

original: Air combat is all about mobility. The Jet engine is such a powerful advance that the enemy pilots will seem to stand still while we rip them out of the sky.
translation: 空战中最重要的东西就是机动性。喷气引擎将是一个巨大的进步，它将使我们可以像对付静止目标那样把敌人的飞行员打下来。
增加科研槽 II

original: Promising young minds are popping up everywhere. We need to supply them with facilities to conduct their research. Advances in technology can give us the edge where we most need it.
translation: 有前途的年轻思想家在各地不断涌现，我们需要为他们提供便利，让他们开展自己的研究。科技的进步可以让我们在最需要的地方取得突破。
重视防御

original: In times like these, it is best to strengthen our defenses. If there are threats, let them come to us so that we can deal with them on our own land. We have a perfect candidate to lead our army, all we need is your word.
translation: 在如今的时代，最好的手段就是加强防御。如果外面有威胁，那就让他们来进攻，这样我们就能在自己的地盘里消灭他们。我们拥有一个完美的候选人来领导军队，现在就等你的命令了。
重视进攻

original: We cannot sit idly by as enemies move in on our borders. And we cannot leave our allies to fend for themselves in a war scenario. Prepare our army! Gamelin is the man for the job.
translation: 我们不能眼睁睁地看着敌人逼近我们的边境。而且我们也不能在战争中抛弃盟友，让他们自生自灭。整备我们的军队！甘末林才是合适的人选。
重视防御工事

original: As critical as our forts have been, we need to find ways to construct them more efficiently. The Maginot line has been a powerful deterrent of enemy forces, we could use the security of more defenses like it.
translation: ，我们的要塞依然和以前一样至关重要，我们需要更有效地建设它们。马奇诺防线对敌方部队来说是一个巨大的威慑，我们应该建造更多这样的防线来保证我们的安全。
阿尔卑斯堡垒

original: The Italians won't cross the border so easily once we finish covering the Alps with our newly planned line of defense. We will have time to respond and reinforce our position.
translation: 当我们完成在阿尔卑斯山脉的新防线后，意大利人就没那么容易跨过来了。我们将有足够的时间来作出回应并巩固我们的地位。
延长马奇诺防线

original: We cannot count on Belgium to hold their ground, if they let enemy armies through we might be in trouble. Extending the Maginot Line is crucial to keeping unwanted armies out of France!
translation: 我们不能指望比利时守住自己的领土。如果他们没能挡住敌军，那么我们就有麻烦了。延长马奇诺防线对阻挡意料之外的敌军有着至关重要的作用！
全民动员

original: All men and women who can fight will do so. Producing weapons in mass will lower the cost. We will put a rifle in the hands of everyone.
translation: 所有能够战斗的男性和女性都将被动员。大规模生产武器可以降低成本。我们要给每个人都发一把步枪。
大炮阵

original: Our Artillery will form a single powerful unit to focus fire on specific points. One volley at a time and we will weaken the enemy line and punch our way through if we have to!
translation: 我们的炮兵将组成一个单独的单位，以集中火力炮击特定目标。让所有大炮在同一时间进行齐射可以削弱敌人的阵线，如果需要，我们将不得不砸出一条通道！
主战坦克

original: Battle Tanks are the way forward in military industry. We want to control the battlefield and for this we will need new powerful Tanks!
translation: 主战坦克是军事工业发展的方向。我们必须控制战场，为此我们需要新的更强大的坦克！
重视摩托化

original: Finding better ways to build our infantry vehicles will help our ability to support and reinforce the front lines.
translation: 为我们的步兵建造更好的车辆可以提高我们支持和增援前线的能力。
重视机械化

original: Armored vehicles play an increasingly important role in the war. While slightly less intimidating than your average tank, they give us an edge in communication, command, transport and urban warfare.
translation: 装甲车辆在战争中的作用越来越大。尽管它们的威慑力比普通的坦克略低，但是却能在通讯、指挥、运输和城市战斗中发挥出自己的优势。
装甲战斗车

original: By law, the Infantry control all tank forces. The lighter, faster cavalry 'vehicles' or Automitrailleuses are better suited for travel and can still deal some damage with their mounted weapons.
translation: 按规矩来说，所有的坦克部队归步兵管控。 更轻更快的装甲车辆或骑兵坦克可以更适合于行军，并且可以用搭载的武器对敌人造成一定的伤害。
陆军改革

original: No infantry unit or high tech tank alone will win us the war. We must put our efforts into developing both our tactical and strategical capabilities. With the right people on the job we can evolve as an army.
translation: 单独使用步兵或高科技坦克并不能让我们赢得战争。我们必须努力改善自己的战术和战略能力。让合适的人来做这项工作，可以使我们真正变成一支军队。
重视海军

original: Not enough building slots for §YNaval Base§!
translation: 没有足够的建筑位来建造§Y海军基地§!

original: If we plan to expand our navy the first step is to improve and expand our naval bases. Our unique ships require constant attention to stay combat ready at all times.
translation: 如果我们打算扩大海军的规模，那么第一步就应该改进或扩大我们的海军基地。我们独特的舰船需要持续的照顾才能一直保持战备状态。
改进屏卫舰

original: Destroyers and Lighter Cruisers play a key role in defending our heavier Battleships or Carriers. If we lose our line of defense at sea we risk all ships and men. We must make sure our ships are built with the latest technology.
translation: 驱逐舰和轻巡洋舰是我们保卫重型战列舰和航空母舰的重要力量。如果我们在海上的防线失守，那么我们所有的船只和人员都将陷入危险之中。我们必须保证所有的舰只在建造时都采用了最新的科技。
重视主力舰

original: Improving the design of our Battleships would lead to great tactical advantages. With their range and power uncontested, no one will be able to outrun their guns.
translation: 改进战列舰的设计可以为我们在战术上带来极大的优势。在它们无可抵挡的火力和射程之下，没有人能够逃脱。
重视航母

original: Naval theorists have directed our attention to our outdated Carriers. They have suggestions on how Carriers can be further utilized if development is pushed in the right direction. Real progress cannot be made without our full support.
translation: 海军理论家让我们把注意力转到了我们已经过时的航空母舰上。他们的建议指出了当发展方向正确时，我们应该如何更好地利用航母的性能。但真正的进展离不开我们的全力支持。
政府改革

original: The world has grown dangerous. We can no longer be tied down by our own petty squabbles. It is time to empower our politicians and move forward for the sake of France.
translation: 世界已变得越来越危险。我们不能再沉沦于琐碎的争吵了。是时候授权我们的政治家去为法国争取利益了。
支持左翼

original: The Comintern is growing stronger. It is time to show that our interests can be aligned, and support our communist organizations.
translation: 共产国际越来越强大了。是时候协调我们和他们的共同利益并支持我们的共产主义组织了。
左派言论

original: The goal is clear. Equality for all. We do not want capitalist interests in french politics. It is imperative that we give optimal conditions for our communist organizations to flourish.
translation: 目标很明确。那就是人人平等。我们不希望法国政治为资本主义的利益服务。 我们有必要为共产主义组织的崛起提供最佳的条件。
支持西班牙共和军

original: Republican Spain needs our help! \nAnyone willing to fight for the cause should be allowed to. We cannot allow another fascist regime to gain ground.
translation: 西班牙共和国需要我们的帮助！ \n任何愿意为此而战的人都可以前来。我们不能再让另一个法西斯政权上台统治。
国民动员

original: We finally have a government capable of taking action. Now it is time to strengthen our army and be prepared to fight for France.
translation: 我们终于有了一个有能力采取行动的政府。现在我们应该增强部队的战斗力，准备为法国而战了。
人类团结

original: The fat bankers and the powerhungry demagogues are strengthening their bloody grip on the world. With each passing day we see free men enslaved and the world plunged further into crisis, created by the greed of the individual. French ideals are needed more than ever! Humanity needs us and we need to unite humanity!
translation: 肥头大耳的银行家和渴望权力的煽动者正逐步攫取这个世界。每一天我们都能看到自由的人被奴役，而世界慢慢地陷入由个人私欲而引起的危机之中。我们比以往任何时候都需要法国的理想！人类需要我们，我们应该团结全人类！
加入共产国际

original: With enemies everywhere we turn, we need to strengthen our position with some powerful allies. Our ties with the Comintern has grown stronger and it is time to dedicate ourselves fully to their cause.
translation: 我们在各处都遇到了敌人，我们需要和一些强大的盟友联手来加强自己的地位。我们和共产国际之间的联系愈加紧密，是时候全身心地投入到共产主义事业中了。
维持现状

original: France is the cradle and protector of liberty and should remain so. If we ever wish to achieve unity again, then we must stabilize our democracy before it dwindles.
translation: 法兰西是自由的摇篮，也是它的保护者，这将一直持续下去。如果我们想要再度实现团结，那我们就得在民主制度衰落之前巩固它。
小协约国

original: The Little Entente, an alliance formed after the Great War to prevent aggression from Austria and Hungary to their neighbors, was supported by France, but has now began to fall apart. Instead of securing ties with Britain, we should take initiative to restore and consolidiate this faction, starting with its founders in Czechoslovakia.
translation: 小协约国是上一次世界大战后成立的一个组织，它的目的是阻止奥地利和匈牙利被它们的邻国侵犯，这个组织得到了法国的支持，但现在开始崩溃了。我们与其巩固与英国之间的纽带，不如主动恢复并强化这一阵营，就从创始国捷克斯洛伐克开始。
跟进英国

original: With Russia forever changed, only France and Britain remain of the old Triple Entente. If history is doomed to repeat itself, we must ensure that these two nations, bastions of democracy and liberty in Europe, remain Allies.
translation: 在俄国永远改变后，旧的三国协约之中只剩下英法两国。如果历史注定要重演，我们必须确保这两个作为欧洲民主和自由的大本营的国家，继续保持同盟。
强化政府

original: We have made plans for the following year that will meet the wishes of people in all parts of France. Show them that we are capable of action and worthy to rule France, so we can once again stand united.
translation: 我们已经做好了下一年的计划，以满足法国各地人民的需求。我们要向他们展示我们有能力采取行动并统治法国，我们将再次团结起来。
防御战略

original: If we want the people of France to fight a war for us it is more important than ever that we have a clear direction. We must stop fighting amongst ourselves and fight for France and "Liberté, égalité, fraternité" instead.
translation: 如果想让法国人民愿意打仗，最重要的是需要给他们一个明确的目标，我们必须停止内耗而为法兰西的自由、平等、博爱而战。
邀请南斯拉夫

original: Yugoslavia has enough concerns without having to worry about expansionist neighbors. Bringing them back into the Little Entente would be a great service to both them and ourselves.
translation: 南斯拉夫是一个有足够分量而且没有扩张野心的邻居，邀请他们重回小协约国对于双方来看是一个很好的建议。
邀请罗马尼亚

original: The Romanian democracy is fragile, caught between its internal fascist factions and Soviet communism. Bringing them into the Little Entente will allow them to retain stability with our backing.
translation: 罗马尼亚国家的民主局面是不稳定的，其内部的法西斯主义者和共产主义者相互斗争，在我们的支持下加入小协约国将保持他们国内的稳定。
保证波兰独立

original: Polish diplomats have expressed concerns about the tension on their borders. A guarantee from our mighty nation should deter anyone planning an invasion.
translation: 波兰外交官对边界的安全感到很担忧，我们强大的国家将保证它免受任何国家的入侵。
保证捷克独立

original: Tension is rising at the Czech border. We cannot allow expansive nations to take over a free and democratic nation. The Czechs must remain a free people. With a guarantee from us anyone planning an invasion will think twice.
translation: 捷克边境局势紧张，我们不会允许一个自由民主的国家被吞并，捷克必须属于自由的人民，在我们强力的安全保证下任何入侵行为将三思而后行。
修订凡尔赛条约

original: The Germans are already ignoring the reparations stipulated by the Versailles Treaty, showing that France no longer inspires respect. If anything, we have the right to demand more for the lives lost in the Great War, but a just treaty would require a strong France, a new France, to enforce it.
translation: 德国佬明确不再遵守《凡尔赛条约》，法国已然不再受人敬畏，如果可能，我们要为在一战中牺牲的生命要求更多权利，但这个条约需要一个新的法兰西、强大的法兰西来执行。
支持右翼

original: France has always been a strong and proud nation, but the lack of government action has divided the people. We must unite France and assert our superiority and strength to avoid succumbing to decay.
translation: 法兰西一直是一个强大骄傲的国家，但是政府一些决策的过失已使人民分裂，我们必须使法国团结起来以维持我国的优势国力，避免国家走向衰落。
右翼言论

original: We must focus on reaching every French and lift their national spirit. Show them that we can be the powerful leaders they need and they will become proud citizens of our glourious nation.
translation: 我们必须培养每一个法兰西人民的民族精神，让他们明白我们是他们所需要的伟大领导人，他们也将为自己法兰西国民的身份感到自豪。
支持西班牙国民军

original: The Nationalists are finally gaining ground in Spain. Their cause is a righteous one and anyone willing to fight for them should be allowed to.
translation: 西班牙国民军的战争终于取得了一定进展，他们的事业是正义的，应该允许任何志愿者为他们而战。
进攻部队

original: We can no longer sit behind an obsolete wall, while our enemies run rampant across Europe. It is time to strengthen our army and push our borders to ensure France continues to be a grand nation.
translation: 我们再也不能故步自封， 现在我们的敌人在整个欧洲横行无忌，是时候该加强我们的军队打败敌人，确保法兰西依然是欧洲大陆第一强国。
法兰西万岁

original: We are France! Victors of the Great War! Saviours of Europe! We are home of the greatest thinkers this world has seen. Too many nations seek to plunge the world into chaos. We are needed, and we will heed the call. We will take the helm, weather the storm, and steer humanity to safety under our rule!
translation: 我们是伟大的法兰西! 一战胜利者! 欧洲的救星! 我们这是世界最伟大思想家的故乡，太多国家试图将世界搅得一团混乱，对此我们时刻关注着，如有需要我们将挺身而出带领人类在我们的旗帜下渡过难关！
亲近意大利

original: Italy has the potential to become a powerful nation. Thanks to the strong leadership of Mussolini the people of Italy are united and ready to fight for the right cause. Let that cause be ours.
translation: 意大利有潜力成为一个强大的国家，由于意大利有强力的领导人墨索里尼，意大利人团结在了一起并为他们认为正确的事业而奋斗。
摧毁民主国家

original: The new [GER.GetAdjective] democratic alliance in central Europe is threatening our new-found position. We must take action now, before they grow more powerful.
translation: 新[GER.GetAdjective]在中欧的民主联盟正在威胁我们的新地位。在他们变得更强大之前，我们必须现在就采取行动。
加入轴心国

original: The German Reich is becoming a force to be reckoned with. Their vision of a better future can be aligned with our interests. We should support them and once the dust settles France will get its rightful piece of Europe.
translation: 德国已经成为欧洲霸主，他们所主导的未来更符合我们的利益，我们应加入轴心国，尘埃落定，法国会在未来的欧洲获得一席之地。
海军学说

original: Recent progress in ship designs have opened up new options in tactical and strategical maneuvers. Before we take chances with these new theories we need to have them properly tested and plans solidified.
translation: 船只研发的最新进展使我们有了新的战略和战术选择，对这些新的理论我们需要有新的计划和实验来验证。
重视空军

original: Not enough building slots for §YAir Base§!
translation: 没有足够的建筑位可以用于建造§Y空军基地§!

original: Time has come to expand on our Airforce! Plans have already been made to start construction of new Air Bases to support a big increase in both personnel and aircraft.
translation: 我们需要时间来扩建空军! 计划开工建设新的空军基地来支持更大规模的空军。
重视近距支援机

original: Planes which provide support for our land forces and ships have been a very efficient addition at a relatively small investment. These planes now have several suggested improvements. Our engineers can develop the next generation of support aircraft.
translation: 为我们的船只和地面部队提供近距离空中支援计划投入小但效果极佳。这些计划现在得到了一些改进的建议。我们的工程师可以以此设计下一代支援飞机。
重视战斗机

original: Some revolutionary civilian engineering can be applied on our Fighters to improve their speed, range and max altitude. We need to focus on this if we want to keep up with the advancements made by others.
translation: 一些革命性的技术可以用在战斗机上改善它的速度、航程和最大攀高，如果我们想要在战斗机技术上保持前沿就需要重视这点。
重视轰炸机

original: Air support is an important part of both our defensive and offensive capabilities. If we focus our efforts on developing fast, more agile and accurate bombers we will maintain an edge in any land battle.
translation: 空中支援是战斗中无论进攻还是防守都不可或缺的一环，如果我们重点发展这点， 将有更强大、更精准的轰炸机使我们在战场上保持优势。
重视重型战斗机

original: Our Heavy Fighters must be able to support the more vulnerable bomber airplanes. This requires heavier armament and longer range at the cost of some speed.
translation: 我们的重型战斗机必须能更有效的打击轰炸机，这需要更强的火力、更快的速度和更远的航程。
空军学说

original: We have gained enough experience to test new theories in air warfare at a faster pace. This will allow us to explore new tactical and strategic possibilities. Air combat is the key in modern warfare.
translation: 我们已经积累了足够的经验来测试空中作战的新理论，现代战争中空战是关键，而这将允许我们探索新战术和战略的可行性。
重视重型轰炸机

original: Modern heavy bombers will be armed to handle lesser aerial skirmishes on their own. If we allow our engineers to focus on developing the newest technology we will have a better chance of destroying enemy production facilities.
translation: 现代化重型轰炸机将拥有一定的空战能力，如果允许我们的工程师重点开发最新的重型轰炸机技术，我们将拥有一个更好的轰炸机来摧毁敌人的设施。
重视海军轰炸机

original: Ships have proven exceptionally vulnerable to aircrafts. We should keep improving on their technology to ensure we stay ahead of any countermeasures.
translation: 船只已经被证明特别容易受到空中打击，我们应该重点关注这方面的技术研究，以保持这方面技术的优势。
有限的军备重整

original: The recent stirrings from Germany and other Fascist powers around the world suggest that we may not enjoy peace in our time. In preparation, we should begin to set the pieces in motion for our own rearmament if the situation gets any worse.
translation: 最近从德国等国萌生的法西斯主义表明，我们这个时代可能并不和平，目前这种情况有可能会变得更糟，我们必须至少进行有限的军备重整。
摩托化部队

original: Recently the Army has been experimenting with fully motorized infantry units. As yet, they have not formed any fully motorized divisions, but with with right words to the Secretary of State for War this could soon be possible.
translation: 之前军队准备将步兵进行完全摩托化，目前为止尚无完全摩托化的部队， 但是战争大臣认为这很快将会实现。
皇家坦克团

original: Britain invented the tank, and so the Royal Tank Regiment should be equipped with the world's best tanks, but this is not currently the case. The Special Vehicle Development Committee proposes to research and develop a modern design to keep Britain at the forefront of tank development.
translation: 英国发明了坦克，皇家坦克团也应配备世界上最好的坦克，但现况并不如此，特殊车辆发展委员会提出研发一款新的现代化坦克以保持英国坦克依然走在世界的前沿。
强化不列颠帝国

original: Our Empire is vast, and despite our power, weakly defended. To combat this we need to encourage Imperial Patriotism throughout the realm.
translation: 我们的帝国太庞大， 我们相对贫乏的力量无法防御好每个地区，为了解决这一问题，我们必须激起每个地区人民的帝国至上主义。
海外服役

original: By rotating armed forces personnel to colonial stations and back home again they can learn about the conditions on different fronts, gain experience, and share it with their comrades back home.
translation: 通过将军队部署在海外领土轮流服役， 他们会在各方面获得不少经验， 并在回国后与国内军队分享经验。
地中海堡垒

original: The route through the Mediterranean is a vitally important shortcut to and from India. As such, it is of utmost importance to keep it open and in our hands.
translation: 地中海是通往印度的捷径和重要航线，因此它非常重要，必须要掌握在我们的手中。
防御直布罗陀

original: As well as controlling the entrance to the Mediterranean, Gibraltar provides a strongly defended harbour from which ships can operate in both the Atlantic and the Mediterranean. As such, it is imperative that it is strongly guarded.
translation: 控制在地中海与大西洋进出口位置的直布罗陀港口非常重要，因此，当务之急便是加强直布罗陀的防御。
威胁希腊

original: It is in our interests to have basing rights in Greece, and frankly the Greeks are in no position to refuse us.
translation: 我们与希腊政府有密切利益关系，希腊是不会拒绝我们的。
防御马耳他

original: Malta commands an excellent position in the central Mediterranean, a vital way station along our lifeline through Egypt and the Suez Canal to India and the Far East. Time spent fortifying it more strongly could never be wasted.
translation: 马耳他位于地中海中部的一个关键位置，这个据点扼守着大西洋通过苏伊士运河通往印度洋的生命航线，时光荏苒，我们需尽快加强当地防御。

original: We can now deploy Motorized Infantry Divisions.
translation: 我们当前可以部署摩托化步兵师。
开发加拿大

original: An investment in Canada's Industry and Shipyards will provide a boost to their economy and allow them to provide a greater contribution in the event of war.
translation: 在加拿大投资工业和造船业可以刺激当地经济，并且如果战争爆发，他们可以为战争做出更大的贡献。
开发澳大利亚

original: An investment in Australia's Shipyards and Industry will provide a boost to their economy and allow them to provide a greater contribution in the event of war.
translation: 在澳大利亚投资工业和造船业可以刺激当地经济，并且如果战争爆发，他们可以为战争做出更大的贡献。
保护苏伊士运河区

original: Controlling the Suez channel is part of the means by which the British Empire retains its command of the sea. Losing this region would be disastrous. Measures must be taken to fortify it.
translation: 控制住苏伊士运河对制海权是至关重要的，而如果失去这一地区会有灾难性的后果，我们必须尽快采取措施加强当地防御。
巴尔干战略

original: Many of the nations in the Balkans are pro-British and see the same threat from central Europe as we do. If we seize the opportunity and support them early, we can secure their loyalty, although at the expense of angering their revengist neighbors.
translation: 巴尔干半岛许多国家和大不列颠一样受到来自中欧的威胁，如果我们抓住机会早点支持他们将会获得他们的忠诚，尽管这样做会激怒那个小胡子。
开发新西兰

original: New Zealand retains a strong connection to our nation and has warned against the fascist threat. Their contribution in the event of war is certain, and we should aid them in preparing accordingly.
translation: 在反法西斯方面新西兰一直和我国有密切的联系，如果发生战争他们必将站在我们这边，所以我们应该帮他们做好相应的准备。
开发南非

original: The political situation in South Africa is uncertain. We cannot fully trust that they will support our war effort, but by aiding them in strengthening their industry, we can hope to increase support for the British cause.
translation: 南非的政治局势依然不明朗，我们不能确定他会在战争中支持我们，但如果我们协助开发他们的工业，他们支持我们的可能性会大很多。

original: 'Strengthen Government Support' idea has run its course.
translation: '强化政府'的决议已结束。
在非洲的胜利

original: Failure in the first First Italo-Ethiopian War has been a stain on Italian honor for 40 years, by achieving victory now that stain will be removed and the strength of the Iron will of Fascism will be proven!
translation: 第一次意埃战争的失败让意大利一直颜面无光， 如今的胜利让意大利拿回曾经失去的荣耀同时证明钢铁铸成的法西斯主义是不可战胜的！

original: Increases Trade Opinion with all American nations.
translation: 与所有美洲国家加强贸易往来。
近期的法西斯扩张
反帝国主义

original: America has always been an enemy of imperialistic oppressors, but it's plain to see that most so-called democracies are willing to keep these institutions alive as long as they benefit from them. The revolutionaries of the Soviet Union are better allies.
translation: 美国一直都是帝国主义暴君的敌人，但显而易见的是那些所谓的民主国家更希望长久地保持这个体系从而获益，苏联革命者才是我们更好的盟友。
普鲁士的威胁

original: The Versailles Treaty and economic sanctions haven't stopped Germany, and Prussian militarism is once again rearing its ugly, aggressive head. Germany must be defeated again and brought under our control, at least for the time being.
translation: 《凡尔赛条约》和对德国的经济制裁并没有成功消除威胁，而普鲁士军国主义再次抬起其丑陋、好斗的脑袋，德国必须再次被打败并将其处于我们的控制下。
对抗共产主义

original: The Red Terror is by far the worst menace this world has ever faced. By any means necessary, the destructive ideology emanating from the Soviet Union must be cut off at its origin, and we will be the ones to do it.
translation: 红色恐怖是当前世界所面临的最大威胁，我们必须不择手段消除这种来自苏联的邪恶思想并摧毁它的来源，我们将为此奋斗。
摧毁殖民主义

original: The true threat to liberty in the world is the colonial empires built by European superpowers. They must be crushed and their populations freed, starting with the British Empire we once freed ourselves from.
translation: 世界上真正威胁到自由的是那些欧洲大国建立起来的殖民帝国体系，从大英帝国开始，他们这种殖民体系必须被摧毁，人民必须自由。
太平洋防御

original: The Japanese government is beyond hope, its expansionism threatening both our people and its Asian neighbors. The nation must be brought under American administration to reform it and prevent it from ever repeating its mistakes.
translation: 不能对日本政府抱有希望，它的扩张已经威胁到了亚洲诸国和我们的人民，国家政府对此必须有所准备防止不幸再次发生。
本土防御

original: A vast empire is of no use if we cannot protect the British people. We should focus our efforts on keeping the British Isles safe.
translation: 如果不能保护好我国人民，一个再庞大的帝国也是无能的，我们应该努力保持不列颠群岛的安全。
防毒面具提议

original: The world is groving more dangerous every day. We should protect the civilian popupulation from any poisonous gas attacks. Britain shall breathe easy.
translation: 现如今的世界像丛林一样处处隐藏危险，我们应该让人民佩戴好防毒面具免遭毒气攻击，这样不列颠人民才能放心呼吸。
军事训练法案

original: The Great War has left our people with an impression that they would not have to fight again. As the world grows dangerous, we must ensure that all capable young men receive basic military training.
translation: 一战的结束让我们的人民以为今后不会再有大战，但随着世界局势越来越紧张，我们必须确保所有健壮的年轻人获得基本的军事训练。
对德禁运

original: German rearmament is an insult and a great threat to world peace. We will not be supplying the resources they need to fuel their war machine.
translation: 德国重整军备对我们是一种侮辱，对世界和平是一大威胁，我们将不会提供他们所需的任何资源来推动他们的战争机器。
对德战争

original: The Germans have left us with no other choice. For the sake of the free world and the future of our children. It is time for war.
translation: 德国人让我们没有选择余地，为了自由的世界和我们的孩子，是时候战斗了。
干涉瑞典

original: Swedish movements against democracy have gained a worrying amount of influence. We cannot risk swedish steel ending up as guns in the hands of our enemies. The Swedes shall remain free, but we need to secure a certain degree of influence over their country.
translation: 瑞典的法西斯倾向让我们感到担忧，我们不能冒险让瑞典的钢铁落入敌人的手中，瑞典人应当保持自由，所以我们必须对这个国家施展一定的影响力。
干涉挪威

original: Norwegian movements again democracy continues to gain ground. We should ensure that their politics stay aligned with our own interests, even if we need to use force.
translation: 挪威的法西斯倾向进一步加重，我们必须确保自己的政治利益，哪怕使用武力。
干涉丹麦

original: Danish support for the enemies of world peace have continued to grow. There is only one way to ensure they stay on our side. We should use Denmark to establish a strategic foothold in the region in case a land invasion in Europe becomes necessary.
translation: 丹麦支持法西斯主义的人越来越多，只有一种办法确保他们站在我们这边，我们必须将丹麦变成一个防御来自欧洲大陆入侵的战略支撑要点。
干涉比荷卢

original: The political environment in the Benelux Region is growing hostile towards us. We should send a clear warning that any enemy of democracy will not be tolerated and we are ready use force if necesarry.
translation: 比荷卢地区的政治环境对我们越来越敌对，我们应该明确的发出警告，任何民主的敌人都不会被容忍，如有必要我们将动用武力。
比利时安全保障

original: A warning was clearly not enough. If political tendencies continues as they have this far, Belgium will pose a direct threat to our waters. We must intervene and establish a strategic foothold on mainland Europe.
translation: 一个警告显然是不够的，如果比利时继续越走越远，将直接威胁到我们的水域。我们必须进行干预，在欧洲大陆上建立一个战略支撑点。
荷兰安全保障

original: Political movements in The Netherlands continues to support our enemies. The Netherlands will have to be subdued in order to ensure a free Europe.
translation: 如果荷兰的政治环境继续支持我们的敌人，那么荷兰必将被制服以确保一个自由的欧洲。
对日战争

original: All other options are exhausted and the Japanese refuse to give up their expansionist ways. For the safety of the British Empire and the people of Asia, we must subdue the Japanese.
translation: 别无选择，日本拒绝放弃他们的侵略扩张。为了大英帝国的安全和亚洲人民，我们必须征服日本。
对意战争

original: The Italians refuse to give up their plans for a new Empire and have proven willing to go to war in order to expand their borders. We must do what we can to eliminate this threat before it is too late.
translation: 意大利人拒绝放弃他们的要求，新的意大利帝国已经证明他们要通过战争来扩大领土。我们必须消除这个威胁以免为时过晚。
对苏禁运

original: The Soviet Union is growing powerful and using British resources to fuel their military efforts. We should deprive them acces to our trade.
translation: 苏联的实力依赖着英国的资源而日益强大，我们必须停止相关贸易。
对苏战争

original: The threat of the Soviet Union continues to grow despite our objections. We cannot tolerate an aggressive Soviet Union and are left with no other choice than to go to war for a better tomorrow.
translation: 尽管我们反对，但苏联的威胁还在继续增长。我们不能容忍一个咄咄逼人的苏联，别无选择，为了美好的明天而战。

original: Allows §YKamikaze Strike§! air missions, suicide attacks against enemy ships.\n
translation: 允许空军任务§Y自杀式攻击§!，自杀式袭击敌人的船只。\n
加强民兵训练

original: Much of our militia is unfit for service - either sick or underequipped. We are taking steps to remedy this oversight in a dangerous world.
translation: 我国一大部分民兵并不适役——困于身体障碍或装备不整。世道险恶，我国将采取行动亡羊补牢。
澳大利亚皇家炮兵团

original: Artillery is the queen of the battlefield, and we must expand our access to heavy guns.
translation: 炮兵是战场女王，我军须扩大可入手的重型火炮数量。
转化后备部队

original: Though we need a home defense force, promoting militia and reserves into the regular army will give us a needed boost in available soldiers and experience.
translation: 虽然我国仍需要一支本土卫戍力量，但将民兵与预备役转入现役部队会给我军急需的兵源与陆军经验带来提升。
戴姆勒澳洲野狗型

original: This British-made armored car will improve our mobility on the battlefield. And, after all, it is named for our national canine.
translation: 该型英产装甲车将提升我军战场机动性。以及，毕竟它得名于我国国犬澳洲野狗嘛。
突击号训练基地

original: War in the Pacific will be an amphibious war, so the construction of a naval base specialized in training marines how to take a beach is imperative for the war effort.
translation: 太平洋战争将以两栖作战形式开展，因此建立一个海军基地专供陆战队进行抢滩训练，对战备工作必不可少。
特化装备

original: Not all of the British-made equipment we use is effective for our unique combat situation. Special and custom tools have become necessary.
translation: 并非所有我国采用的英式装备皆在我国独特的战斗环境中卓有效用。特殊化与定制装备已成必须。
澳大利亚女性服役

original: Every man is needed at the front, so driving, signal and maintenance jobs will be handled by thousands of Australia’s women.
translation: 前线需要每一个男丁，因而驾驶，信号与整备工作将转交澳大利亚成千上万的女性。
澳大利亚陆军炊事部队

original: The Australian army is being poorly served by the quality of its food, largely because of the quality of its cooks. By reorganizing this process, we can boost morale and effectiveness.
translation: 就膳食水平的角度，澳大利亚陆军的供应乏善可陈——这很大程度归咎于炊事员水准。通过重整该环节，我军能振奋士气，提高效率。
资助“欧文枪”研究

original: Evelyn Owen has developed a new submachine gun that can withstand the harsh pressures of jungle warfare. We should put government resources into production and improvement of this weapon.
translation: 埃韦林·欧文已开发出一款足以承受丛林作战严峻考验的新式冲锋枪。我国应将政府资源投入到该型武器的生产与改进工作。
哨兵式坦克开发项目

original: Australia should develop its own homemade armored vehicle. Based on German and American ideas, the Sentinel program should be advanced.
translation: 澳大利亚应发展国产装甲车辆。以德国与美国设计思路为基础，哨兵式的研发应当推进了。
对空防卫

original: We must protect the skies over Australia by investing in air defense, including interceptors and anti-air.
translation: 我军必须捍卫澳大利亚领空，而途径是投资对空防卫力量，包括截击机与防空炮。
引入非传统战争

original: The jungles of the Pacific will require a new kind of warfare. We must learn to move quickly and quietly through the dense cover - ambush our enemies and expect the same from them.
translation: 太平洋上的丛林呼唤着前所未有的作战方式。我方必须学会悄无声息地高速穿梭于掩体间——伏击敌军，同时对敌军偷袭有所戒备。
Z特种单位

original: Z Special Unit will be our commando team, specializing in reconnaissance and sabotage behind enemy lines. This will require brave men willing to undergo the most serious training.
translation: Z特种单位是我军突击队，侧重渗透敌后，侦查破坏。它呼唤着愿意忍受最艰苦训练的勇士。
M特种单位

original: M Special Unit will be our advance scouting and reconnaissance arm in the war, sending back up to the moment intelligence about enemy dispositions and placements.
translation: M特种单位是我军战争中的前沿侦查力量，它为后方传回关于敌军配置部署的即时信息。
扩充澳大利亚皇家空军

original: Our air force needs to grow, so we are investing in more bases, more training and more production.
translation: 我空军有发展需要，因此我国将加大投入到更多基地，训练及生产中。
联邦飞机公司 回旋镖型

original: The Boomerang will be Australia’s contribution to fighter design and an insurance policy against the loss of imported aircraft. We need to compete with Japanese and American planes.
translation: 回旋镖型将是澳大利亚对战斗机设计工作的添砖加瓦，同时亦为进口战机战损后的一道保险。我国战机要与美日比肩。
扩大北部军事存在

original: With our cities mostly on the east and west coasts of the island, Australia’s northern frontier lacks the proper defense or preparation in case of invasion or attack. New military structures in that area will be welcome.
translation: 我国城市主要遍布澳洲东西部，北澳前线缺乏妥善的防卫准备以应对侵攻袭击。区域内新建军事设施将是我方所乐见的。
联邦飞机公司 乌梅拉型

original: Australia will develop its own bomber arm. The Woomera is only a light craft, but will be adequate for protecting our homeland and light combat air support.
translation: 澳大利亚将开发国产轰炸机。乌梅拉型仅是轻型飞机，但足以胜任本土防卫及轻量空中支援任务。
志愿防空观测部队

original: Keep your eyes on the skies! We call on Australians to learn the silhouettes of common aircraft and notify the government of any suspicious or enemy planes that near the Dominion.
translation: 注意天空！我国呼吁澳大利亚人民了解常见飞机的轮廓，并在任何可疑或敌对飞机靠近时通知政府。
海上轰炸机

original: We are surrounded by water, so we should look into planes and training that will allow us to intercept and attack enemy fleets. Naval bombing is a specialized skill and should be a focus.
translation: 我国四面环海，理应摸索合适飞机与相应训练以便拦截阻击敌方舰队。海上轰炸是一门独活，应当作为关注焦点。
致命防空网

original: No bombers will damage our ports and cities once we have upgraded our air defense system, through better understanding of air power and the brute force of anti-air weapons.
translation: 透过加强空军及防空火炮完成我国防空系统升级后，不会再有任何轰炸机能对我国城市与港口造成损失。
澳大利亚妇女空军辅助部队

original: A full half of our population is better used in the war effort than sitting at home. Aircraft maintenance, the signal corps and other related tasks will be turned over to women.
translation: 女性群体占我国人口整整一半，与其让她们待在家中不如将她们投入战备工作。飞机维护，通讯及其他相关工作将转交女性。
完全制空

original: Australia is far from many enemy air bases, so it should be our goal to have total air superiority in our corner of the globe.
translation: 澳大利亚相距大多数敌军空军基地甚远，我国应当将取得澳洲大陆完全制空权视作目标。
鹦鹉岛造船厂

original: The expansion and improvement of the Cockatoo Island Shipyards is a major priority for our government. Sydney Harbour has the best access to manpower and resources and that is where we should focus our naval construction efforts.
translation: 鹦鹉岛造船厂的扩建改建工作是我国政府重中之重。悉尼港有最畅通的人力与资源供应，它是我国应集中投入海军建设的地点。
保护海外贸易

original: An island nation relies on the supplies it can bring in from others across the waves. Defending the convoy lines and trade routes is not simply a strategy - it is a necessity.
translation: 岛国依赖来自他国的跨洋物资供应。保卫运输线与贸易线不仅仅是一项战略高度的事务——而是生死攸关的。
海贼旗飘扬

original: From our island stronghold we can send forth packs of submarines to harass and destroy the enemy trade and supply that passes by our shores.
translation: 从岛屿据点中，我军可派出潜艇群去袭扰、摧毁途径我国海岸的敌军贸易补给线。
废铁舰队

original: Until we can upgrade our fleet, we will make do with the aging vessels we have. Our enemy may refer to our older destroyers as a Scrap Iron Flotilla, but it will do us proud.
