translation: 在我国能升级舰队之前，只能以现有的老旧舰船凑合将就。戈培尔可以把我国老旧驱逐舰称作“废铁舰队”，我方就昂首挺胸地使用这个名字吧
澳大利亚皇家潜艇

original: Submarines are the sea weapon of the future, and a crucial component of our allies’ forces. We must embrace this way of war.
translation: 潜艇是海上武器的未来走向，也是我国盟邦海军的必备组成。我军也应顺战争的潮流。
辅助海上巡逻

original: The many harbors of our great land are inviting targets for stealthy submarine attacks. An auxiliary force of coastal patrol ships will alert us to any danger.
translation: 遍布澳洲大陆的大量港口对敌方隐匿的潜艇如同盘中餐一般。一支海岸巡逻舰船的辅助力量将为我方预警任何危险。
巡洋舰

original: We can leave the battleships and carriers to the big dogs, since a mass of cruiser-sized ships will more than meet our needs.
translation: 战列舰和航母还是留给大国，巡洋舰为主干的舰队满足我国需求已绰绰有余。
太平洋局域舰队

original: Though His Majesty fights for survival in Europe, our immediate priority should be a navy that can fight our enemies here in the Pacific. We must develop strategies that are in line with that objective.
translation: 纵然英国仍在欧洲为生存苦苦挣扎，我国当务之急仍是打造一支在太平洋上对抗敌军的舰队。
标准轨距铁路

original: For decades, Australia has had competing railway gauges, making a mess of our transportation and shipping needs. The time has come to finally standardize railway gauges around the country.
translation: 数十年来，澳大利亚铁轨轨距相互冲突，给陆地与海洋运输带来巨大混乱。现在终于到了在全国范围设立标准轨距的时候。
工业扶助组织

original: The recent global economic dislocation has discouraged investment and entrepreneurship in Australia. The Industries Assistance Corporation will advise and finance small business around the country to get the economy moving again.
translation: 近年来脱轨的全球经济状况抑制了在澳大利亚的创业与投资。工业扶助组织将对全国小型企业提供咨询与融资服务以再次带动经济。
西澳国有铁路

original: The state-owned railways in Western Australia should be given a greater priority than road construction at this point. Geography favors the train in the West - we should take advantage of that.
translation: 西澳国有铁路在当前应取得比道路建设更高的优先权。西部地理环境更适宜火车通行——我方最好利用这点。
南澳房地产信托

original: South Australia needs more industry and investment, so it will dedicate resources to a series of planned communities and housing improvements, especially around Adelaide.
translation: 由于急需更大规模工业与投资，南澳将集中资源投入到一系列新建社区与房屋改善工作，特别是阿德莱德周边区域。
后勤供应部门

original: In wartime, we need a special department to handle logistical and supply matters - ammunition, fuel supplies and everything necessary to keep an army on the move.
translation: 战时，我国需要特别的部门以处理后勤补给事务——弹药，油料及其他任何保持军队运转的必需品。
扩大利思戈轻武器工厂规模

original: Our Vickers and Brens come from the Lithgow Small Arms Factory. As it grows, we will find it easier to increase our fighting capacity.
translation: 我国维克斯机枪与布伦轻机枪均产自利思戈轻武器工厂。随着工厂规模扩大，军队战力的提升也容易的多。
联合作业委员会

original: All military construction in Australia will be overseen by the Allied Works Council. This centralized planning will make sure that the government gets the type of productivity it needs.
translation: 澳大利亚所有军事建设工作将由联合作业委员会监督。高度集中的计划模式将确保政府获得它想要的生产力。
扩建北部铁路

original: We have a railway that stretches from Adelaide in the south to Alice Springs in the north. Now we must extend that northern point to other cities in the area, connecting all of Australia.
translation: 我国现有一条铁路从南部的阿德莱德通往北部的艾利斯斯普林斯。如今必须将北端延伸至北部其他城市以连通澳大利亚全境。
澳大利亚武器生产

original: The long convoy times mean that Australia must take a greater responsibility for producing its own guns than other Dominions. We have the factories, and we have the know-how.
translation: 漫长的航运时间意味着在自产武器方面，澳大利亚要比其他英属自治领负担更多。我国有武器工厂，亦对制造流程了然于胸。
铀矿业

original: Over the last decades, we have found large uranium deposits in South Australia, especially around Mt Gee. Uranium is now a vital military resource and exploitation of these reserves should be increased.
translation: 过去数十年来，我国已在南澳发现大型铀矿矿床，尤其是吉峰周边。当前，铀是一项重要军事资源而对这些铀储备的开采力度应当加大。
建立军事咨询委员会

original: Australia’s politicians must put aside ideological and partisan disagreements and come together to consult and advise on the conduct of the war.
translation: 澳大利亚政客们必须放下意识形态冲突与党派争斗，合作一致对战争进行咨询建议工作。
国家安全法案

original: Now that we are at war, the Federal government will assume greater powers to protect Australia. Greater press censorship, suppression of dissident groups and greater ability to tax and seize property for the defense of the Dominion.
translation: 既然我国已被卷入战火，联邦政府需要更大权力以捍卫澳大利亚。更大幅度的媒体审查与压制反对团体，更大力度的税收及征用财产——为了捍卫自治领。
志愿防卫部队

original: A Volunteer Defence Corps has been assembled from older veterans and other citizens not in the regular army. They will serve as a home guard to free up the army to take direct action against its enemies.
translation: 志愿防卫部队吸纳了年迈老兵与不在正规部队中的其他公民。他们将担当本土卫戍职责以解放战力，让正规军正面迎敌。
土木部队

original: We will conscript able-bodied men to serve in a Civil Construction Corps to help in the building of airfields, transportation, forts, and other important military infrastructure.
translation: 我军将征召身体状况适宜者进入土木部队以协助建设机场，交通，要塞及其他军用基础设施命脉。
军事发明理事会

original: Wars spur innovation and creativity and the government needs a way to sort the good ideas from the bad. A new specialized patent office would be dedicated to determining which of the many submissions to the government have any value.
translation: 战争带动了发明创造而政府需要一个去粗存精的途径。特设的新专利局将负责判断递交给政府的大量结果中，究竟哪些确有价值。
向胜利投资

original: By selling war bonds to our population, they can contribute their savings to the war effort.
translation: 透过发售战争债券给民众来让他们贡献个人储蓄于备战工作中。
民间军事力量

original: It is now time to prepare a reserve army to increase our readiness in case of war. We will draft available militiamen into the army for home defense, and then prepare them for service overseas if needed.
translation: 现在应准备预备军力以防战争。我军将征召民兵到正规部队负责本土防卫，并让他们准备好在必要时征战海外。
图卜鲁格之鼠

original: Our brave soldiers have proven themselves adept at desert warfare and scavenging from the battlefield. They harass the enemy, striking from their bases and then retreating before the counterattack.
translation: 我军勇敢战士亲身证明他们适应了沙漠战争并能从战场幸存。他们袭扰敌军并能在敌军作出反击之前打的敌军措手不及。
于图卜鲁格获得精锐部队
于悉尼获得精锐部队
奋战，奋斗或灭亡

original: With our enemy posing an existential threat to the Dominion, Australians must make a choice. They will fight, they will work, or they will perish.
translation: 敌人正威胁着自治领。澳大利亚人民面临抉择：奋战奋斗，或走向灭亡。
科研合作

original: The British showed us the advantage of sharing scientific progress between close allies. Our whole faction will be able to conduct wartime R&D more efficiently if we take the steps necessary to coordinate this.
translation: 英国向我国展示了亲密盟国间共享科研成果带来的优势。我方联盟将更有效率地开展战时研发工作，只要我国能采取必要措施进行协作。
注资澳大利亚国防科研

original: Now that Australia is fully a sovereign nation we are no longer receiving access to advanced prototypes and blueprints like we previously did. We must ensure that we alway stay ahead of our enemies, and do not fall behind in technology.
translation: 澳大利亚已是完全独立的主权国家，不再一如既往地享有自由接触先进原型及设计图的权利。我国必须保障对敌国的领先，不让科研落后于人。
压碎蛀虫

original: Wasteful spending on inflation-affected consumer goods is taking money away from war bonds and the war effort. We need to discourage this appetite for luxury while our army is in need.
translation: 在受制于通胀的消费品上的铺张浪费霸占了应用于战争债券与备战工作的资金。大敌当前之时，物欲膨胀并不值得鼓励。
配给与回收

original: Every resource matters. We will ration food for our citizens, recycle to get as much metal as we can from worn-out goods and promote economies throughout the country.
translation: 一针一线自有价值。我国将对国民采取食物配给，从旧物中尽可能回收金属并振兴全国经济。
识别移民

original: Australia is a nation of immigrants, and as such, may have taken in some with loyalties to their homeland. We will register and track foreign-born Australians.
translation: 澳大利亚是移民国家，自然而然可能接收一些忠心于母国者。我国将注册及追踪非本国出生公民。
加强与英国的纽带

original: Our loyalties lie with the Mother Country. We will go where she follows and commit to fighting her enemies. God Save the King.
translation: 我国忠诚系于母国。我国将追随她的脚步并对抗她的敌人。天佑吾王。
支持绥靖政策

original: The costs of the last war still weigh heavily on the national memory. If making territorial concessions half a world away can keep Australia out of war, then we should certainly consider these concessions.
translation: 上次大战中付出的代价仍铭刻于这个国家的记忆中。如果隔着半个地球的领土让步能让澳大利亚免遭战火，我国当然应当将让步纳入考量。
新加坡防务策略

original: Singapore is too far from London to be secure. Australia will take it upon itself to protect this outpost of empire from aggression from others.
translation: 对于伦敦政府，路途遥远让新加坡的防卫捉襟见肘。澳大利亚将肩负此重担，让帝国的东亚前哨免遭侵略。
沿袭威斯敏斯特体系

original: We embrace the Westminster system that we have inherited from the United Kingdom.
translation: 我国将沿袭继承于英国的威斯敏斯特体系。
科学与工业研究中心

original: The Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation is our government research arm to improve the efficiency of science and production in Australia. By increasing our support for it, we will give further energy to the sinews of war.
translation: 联邦科学与工业研究组织是我国政府的科研分支，旨在提高澳大利亚科研及生产效率。透过对其大力扶持，我国将为战争肌腱注入更多能量。
西南太平洋的捍卫者

original: Australia must assume the primary position as the protector of the South West Pacific Area. The entire sea zone from Indochina through Indonesia to New Guinea should be under our aegis.
translation: 澳大利亚必须确保西南太平洋捍卫者的有力地位。从印尼到新几内亚的整个海域应在我国庇护之下。
帝国空军训练计划

original: It is time for Australia to commit to a proper air training program. With the encouragement and support of the United Kingdom, all of the Dominions will work together to contribute pilots and support crew for the war effort.
translation: 澳大利亚应当设计一套空军训练项目。在英国的鼓励与支持下，英属自治领将彼此合作贡献飞行员与地勤人员以供战争。
联邦飞机公司

original: The Commonwealth Aircraft Corporation is the primary producer of aircraft and aircraft engines in Australia. It has a proven track record, and support for it will give our pilots the materials they require.
translation: 联邦飞机公司是澳大利亚主要的飞机及飞机引擎生产商。它用以往的骄人成绩证明了自己，而给予它支持将为我国飞行员提供他们想要的。
切断与英国的联系

original: The time has come to break from the United Kingdom. Australia can direct her own course without interference from London and stake a claim to its own destiny in its own region.
translation: 和英国划清界限的时候到了。澳大利亚能为她自己掌舵而不用伦敦来指手画脚，也能在她所在的地域把握自己的命运。
捍卫本土

original: Australia is large, but its coasts can be protected. Keeping our own nation safe is the highest priority.
translation: 纵然澳大利亚国土辽阔，但其海滩能够被妥善保卫。捍卫自身安全是我国重中之首。
西南太平洋的威胁

original: Japan is building an empire that threatens the safety of Australia and freedom in the region. We should turn to like-minded nations to be our allies.
translation: 日本正建立着一个威胁澳大利亚国家安全与西南太平洋地区自由的帝国。我国应将持相似立场的国家变为自己的盟国。
加利波利惨剧不能重演

original: The only way to ensure that Australia is not drawn into further costly wars through sentiment is to take complete control of our foreign policy. We need no distant King and cannot afford ancient blood ties pulling us into conflicts that do not serve our interests.
translation: 唯一能确保澳大利亚不昏头昏脑地被拖入代价高昂的战争中的方法是奉行独立自主的外交政策。我国不需要天高远皇帝，也负担不了因为祖先血缘而被卷入却与我国利益相去甚远的冲突。
亲近美利坚！

original: Our true ally is America, another Pacific power with British roots. This rich and powerful land is better able to understand our needs, increase our prosperity and protect us from aggression.
translation: 我国真正的盟国是美国，另一个与英国有渊源的太平洋强国。这片富饶而强大的土地更有能力理解我国需求，促进我国繁荣与保护我国免遭侵略。
捍卫荷属殖民地

original: The Netherlands is a weak and distant master of her Indonesian colonies. It cannot defend them against attacks from Japan, China, or any other potentially hostile nation. We must assume control for the greater good.
translation: 荷兰作为印尼殖民地的宗主国，遥不可及又孱弱无比。它无法为殖民地抵御来自日本，中国或其他潜在敌对国家的进攻。我国应替殖民地的长远利益考虑，取得其控制权。
西南太平洋倡议

original: We have established the power base and credibility to create our own network of alliances, centered on defending the South West Pacific Area from hostile powers. We will seek out like-minded powers and make Australia a major voice in global affairs.
translation: 我国已建立必须的力量基础与信誉以打造自己的联盟并立足于抵御针对西南太平洋地区的敌对势力。我国将寻找类似立场的伙伴并让澳大利亚在全球事务中享有话语权。
预先干涉

original: Japan’s empire building over the last decade poses a threat to every free people in the Pacific. We cannot afford to wait until it turns its hungry eyes in our direction. The time for action is now.
translation: 日本近几十年来建立起的帝国对太平洋地区每一个自由人民都造成了威胁。我国无法置之不理，坐等到它主动把贪婪的目光投过来的时刻。此时不动，更待何时！
研究合作

original: Australians are an intelligent and resourceful people, but we haven't the infrastructure or population for a serious scientific program. We will work with our allies, sharing knowledge and breakthroughs for mutual benefit.
translation: 澳大利亚人天资聪慧亦成就斐然，但我国缺乏困难科研项目必需的基础设施与人才储备。我国将与盟国合作，共享知识与科研上的突破以互惠互利。
废除威斯敏斯特体系

original: Though the Westminster Parliament is our inheritance from Great Britain, it has outlived its usefulness in the modern era. Cabinet disagreements and party rivalries have done little to help stabilize Australia through the recent economic crisis.
translation: 威斯敏斯特体系固然是大英留给我国的遗产，但在当代已过时且丧失价值。内阁冲突与党派斗争对稳定澳大利亚以渡过的近年经济危机可以说毫无建树。
支持中间党

original: In New South Wales, a vigorous anti-Communist movement has arisen. Assisted by its New Guard allies, the Centre Party might hold the key to strengthening Australia.
translation: 在新南威尔士，一场轰轰烈烈的反共运动已经掀起。在其盟友“守新派”的协助下，中间党也许握着复兴澳大利亚的钥匙。
支持印尼民族主义者

original: We should support the people of Indonesia in their fight against their Dutch oppressors. They will need education and training, but with their numerical superiority, victory in this fight for justice is inevitable, as will be their gratitude to us.
translation: 我国应当支持印尼人民对抗其荷兰压迫者的斗争。他们仍需教导与训练，但人数上的压倒性优势意味着正义斗争的胜利必将到来，且他们定会对我国心存感激。
支持印尼起义

original: Now that the Indonesians have taken up arms against the Dutch, they will need more than words. The uprising needs guns and other equipment, as well as full-throated diplomatic support.
translation: 印尼人民已对荷兰人揭竿而起，比起空洞的言语他们更需要实际行动支持。 起义需要枪支与其他装备，和全力的外交支持。
索取新西兰

original: The Kiwis have long been our closest allies and friends. We have fought on the same beaches and died in the same useless Imperial wars. It is time to unite our two countries under one flag.
translation: 新西兰人一直是我国的亲密战友。双方在加里波利海滩上并肩作战，也在帝国主义战争中一起洒下无意义的热血。现在是将两国团结在一面旗帜下的时候了。
保卫西南太平洋

original: It is time to use our regional might to bring all of the South West Pacific into our sphere of influence. Only we can protect the people and resources from outsiders who wish to pillage our heritage.
translation: 现在应当用我国的地域力量将整个西南太平洋划入势力范围。只有我国能从妄图毁灭区域传统的外来者手中保护当地人民与资源。
与日本的交易

original: With the South West Pacific in our orbit, we can reach a rapprochement with the Empire of Japan. If it stays in the North West and leaves our sphere to us, then there will be no reason for us to fight.
translation: 西南太平洋已尽在掌握，我国可与日本帝国和解。只要它留在西北太平洋井水不犯河水，我国也无意挑起战事。
我们的帝国

original: The time has come for the former colony to stand on its own and proclaim an Australian empire. Our benevolence and farsighted planning will be for the good of all in the area.
translation: 旧殖民地独立自主并宣布澳大利亚帝国建成的时刻到来了。我国的仁慈统治与长远计划将是地区内所有人的福音。
日本科技共享

original: Japanese scientists have been able to outpace our own research institutes, but our new harmony with the Empire of the Rising Sun opens up new opportunities for learning and sharing.
translation: 日本科学家的进展比我国科研机构更快，但我国与旭日帝国的新蜜月开启了学习与共享的崭新机遇。
对日开战

original: Japan’s aggression has gone on too long. It has raped and pillaged its way through East Asia and now it has its eyes on the lands and resources further south. We cannot stand aside.
translation: 日本的对外侵略已持续了太久。在东亚烧杀抢掠还不满足，现在它的目光转向了南方的土地与资源。我国已无法袖手旁观。
提升工人权力

original: A nation of convicts, ranchers and dockworkers. That is Australia. It is time to give voice and power to the workers and proletariat of Australia. Long live the Revolution.
translation: 罪犯，牧民与码头工人的国家，这就是澳大利亚。 是时候让澳大利亚的工人与无产阶级发出声音，享有权力了。无产阶级革命万岁！
派遣代表团至中国

original: Long torn apart by Imperial greed, the Chinese people need a friend. And we need a regional ally against Fascism. This official meeting with the Chinese government will bring us closer together.
translation: 被贪婪的帝国主义长期蹂躏的中国人民需要朋友，我国也追求一个地区反法西斯盟友。与中国政府的官方会面将让两国关系更加紧密。
投身共产主义事业

original: The time has come to cast off the shackles of a foreign king and build a Worker’s Paradise free of the Imperialist warmongering that risks all of Australia.
translation: 是时候挣脱外国君主的镣铐，在澳大利亚建立一个没有帝国主义好战性威胁的工人乐土了。
间接支持

original: The People’s Republic of China is at war, but we are in no position to expose ourselves. A small shipment of arms and cautious encouragement is all we can risk at the moment.
translation: 中华人民共和国陷入了战争，但我国并不站在可以让自身被卷入的立场。少量船运武器与谨慎的声援已是我国现阶段能做到的最大限度了。
直接支持

original: To arms, Comrades! Hear the call of our Chinese brothers suffering in the war against Fascism! Sign up and join the global struggle of all workers!
translation: 同志们，拿起武器！倾听中国兄弟们在反法西斯战争中挣扎的呼喊吧！挺身而出，加入全世界工人的斗争中！
加入共产国际

original: Our future lies with Communism, so we must join our Comrades around the world in this global struggle. Papa Joe will show us the way and lead the workers from Australia and everywhere else to a glorious tomorrow.
translation: 我们的未来与共产主义紧密相连，所以我们必须和五湖四海同志们一道，投身这场全世界展开的斗争中。慈父领袖将为我们指引道路，带领澳大利亚及世界各地的工人们走向辉煌的明天！
工人乐土

original: The Stalinist Communist experiment is a failure, but we believe that Socialism is the right path. Australia will strike out on a second path for the workers to follow, free from direction from Moscow.
translation: 斯大林主义者的一国社会主义实验已经失败了，但我们仍坚信社会主义道路的正确性。澳大利亚将为工人开辟另一条道路，无需来自莫斯科的指示。
访问科研城

original: The Soviet Union has built research cities and laboratories throughout its territory and it has invited Australian researchers to come and learn about the glories of Communist science.
translation: 苏联建成的科研城与实验室遍布其国土。它已邀请澳大利亚科研人员前去学习社会主义科研成果。
新西兰傀儡

original: The workers of New Zealand should join with their Australian brothers and sisters. We can protect them, and have offered the gentle hand of friendship, so long as they submit to our direction.
translation: 新西兰的工人们应当加入澳大利亚的工人兄弟姐妹。我们已对他们伸出友谊之手并会负责保护他们，只要他们愿意与我们携手共进。
对人民的威胁

original: The militarist and Fascist power of Imperial Japan is a threat to the well-being of all Australians, and blocks the peaceful coexistence of the workers of the world. Australia will push back this enemy of the people, forcing them to stay on their dismal, rocky islands.
translation: 日本帝国的军国法西斯势力是澳大利亚工人福祉的一个威胁，也阻碍了全世界工人的和谐共存。澳大利亚将击退这个人民的敌人，并将他们遏制在自己贫瘠多山的列岛上。

original: A new §Y3 Skill§! General named §YIven Mackay§! will appear.
translation: 新的§Y3技能§!将军，§Y艾文·麦凯§!到任了。

original: Fortify the Homeland with §Ycoastal forts and land forts§! guarding likely landing sites and ports.
translation: 在本土修筑§Y海岸要塞与陆地要塞§!来防御可能遭登陆的港口与城市。

original: We will enter a §Ytech sharing agreement§! with the US or with other members of our faction.
translation: 我国将与美国或派系内其他盟友签署§Y科技共享协议§!

original: We will propose to transfer overlordship of §YMalaya§! to Japan in return for an alliance. Should this not be possible, we will propose to cede the states of §YKalimantan§!, §YSulawesi§! and §YThe Moluccas§! to Japan instead.\n
translation: 我们会提出将§Y马来亚§!托管给日本来换取同盟。如果这个提议不被接受，我们会把将§Y加里曼丹§!、§Y苏拉威西§!和§Y摩鹿加群岛§!割让给日本作为替代方案。\n
罗威尔-西罗斯委员会

original: The Rowell-Sirois Commission has determined that Canada’s federal constitutional arrangement hinders recovery from the Great Depression. We should equalize the standards of service nationwide.
translation: 罗威尔-西罗斯委员会已经确定，加拿大联邦宪政安排阻碍了大萧条的复苏。我们应该在全国范围内实现服务水平的平衡。
皇家公司

original: To provide essential services and stimulate economic and industrial growth, Canada must create many new Crown Corporations. Where private enterprise will not step in, the government must.
translation: 为了供应必要的服务并刺激经济和工业增长，加拿大必须建立许多新的皇家公司，在民营企业不会涉足的地方，政府必须承担起来。
战争债券

original: We cannot finance the war effort based on our meagre tax base or resource exports. The patriotic Canadian people must invest in their country and support the war effort through War Bonds.
translation: 我们可怜的税基或资源出口无法支持我们的战争。爱国的加拿大人民必须向他们的国家投资，并通过战争债券支持我们的战争。
加拿大防务法规

original: In times of war, civil rights need to be curtailed to prevent subversion of the war effort. This means restrictions on the press, dissident groups and some legal rights.
translation: 在战争时期，公民权利需要被限制，以防止颠覆战争。这将意味着对新闻界、异议团体和一些法点权利的限制。
国家住房建筑法

original: A modernizing Dominion needs to have standardized regulations on housing across the nation. We must improve the living conditions of all Canadians.
translation: 现代化的多米宁需要在全国范围内制定有关住房的标准化法规。我们必须改善所有加拿大人的生活条件。
一年一美元的人

original: Canadian industry has efficiency issues, but a number of wealthy businessmen have offered their service and advice in return for a token sum. This small coterie of counselors will move us forward.
translation: 加拿大工业有效率问题，但一些富有的商人提供了他们的服务和建议，以换取一个象征性的金额。这个小型顾问团将推动我们的前进。
加拿大太平洋铁路

original: The CPR has made all of its resources available to the war effort. Thousands of tonnes of supplies and material will cross our grand Dominion, from sea to sea, without interruption.
translation: 加拿大太平洋铁路公司已将其所有资源用于战争。数千吨的物资和材料将让我们广阔的领土从这片海连接到另一片海。
海洋省殖民铁路

original: Our Eastern provinces have been underserved by rail lines since the sale of the Intercolonial Railway to the Canadian National Railway. We are encouraging and undertaking a new Maritime Colonial Railway to expand connections between the central provinces and the Atlantic provinces.
translation: 自从把加拿大铁路卖给国际市场，我们的东部省份的铁路线就显得不足。我们正在鼓励承办一条新的海洋省殖民铁路，以扩大中部省份和大西洋省份之间的联系。
改革安格斯工厂

original: A modern army needs armor, and the CPR’s Angus Shops are suitable for its construction. Retool and refit this infrastructure to build tanks.
translation: 现代军队需要盔甲，而加拿大太平洋铁路公司的安格斯工厂正适合装甲的制造。改革和改装这里的基础设施来建造坦克。
帝国石油

original: Imperial Oil wants to finance exploration in Western Canada. This will increase our reserves of petroleum and lubricate the war machine.
translation: 帝国石油公司希望为加拿大西部的勘探提供资金。这将增加我们的石油储备，为战争机器加油。
军需供应部

original: We will bring the control and management of Canada’s national resources under C.D. Howe in the Department of Munitions and Supply.
translation: 我们将加拿大的国家资源控制并在C.D.豪的军需供应部。
国家资源动员令

original: Canada is large with its population scattered in pockets across the land. A system should be developed to track employment status, and make sure that anyone eligible for service overseas can be located.
translation: 加拿大很大，其人口零星分布在整个大陆。我们应制定一个跟踪就业状况的系统，并确保能够找到任何适于在海外服役的人。
战时物价与贸易委员会

original: To prevent profiteering and hoarding, price controls have been introduced to make goods available to most Canadians.
translation: 为了防止暴利和囤积，我们已经采用了价格控制，使商品可供大多数加拿大人使用。
碎布头计划

original: The Bits and Pieces Program will mobilize for the war effort a number of small factories that have been dedicated to minor consumer goods. A bicycle factory can find capacity for a number of useful war goods.
translation: 碎布头计划将为战争调动一些致力于小型消费品的小型工厂。例如自行车工厂可以找到制造关于战争物品的能力。
投资国家研究委员会

original: Canada has a history of science and advancement, but the need for researchers is greater than ever. It is time to throw more weight behind the NRC.
translation: 加拿大有科学和进步的历史，但如今研究人员的需要比以往任何时候都更大。现在是时候把更多的精力放在国家研究委员会上了。
采掘地盾

original: The Canadian Shield is rich with nickel, copper, gold and silver. We are given nature’s bounty in minerals. It is time to exploit it further.
translation: 加拿大的地盾富有镍，铜，金和银。我们被赋予丰富的自然矿物，现在是进一步利用它的时候了。
加拿大小麦局

original: The devastation of our western farmers in the Depression can be addressed if we revive and reinvigorate the Canada Wheat Board to set prices for sale of wheat, barley, oats and other crops.
translation: 如果我们恢复和振兴加拿大小麦局，以确定小麦、大麦、燕麦和其他作物的销售价格，我们西部的农民在大萧条中受到的破坏就可以得到解决。
胜利飞机有限公司

original: Victory Aircraft has been tasked with building Canada’s bomber fleet. Lancasters for everyone!
translation: 胜利飞机的任务是建设加拿大的轰炸机编队。为了大家的兰开斯特轰炸机！
艾伯塔煤炭镇

original: There are coal deposits all along the Rockies ready to be exploited. We can promote emigration to these new mine locations and improve employment in the west.
translation: 沿着落基山脉有很多随时可以开采的煤矿。我们可以鼓励移民到这些新的矿区，并改善西部的就业。
承诺战争

original: The world is burning and Canada has a role to play. We vow to protect democracy and the British way of life.
translation: 世界正在燃烧着战火，加拿大可以有着重要的角色。我们发誓要保护民主和英国的生存的道路。
约翰·英格利斯公司

original: John Inglis and Company should be directed to build new machine guns and cannon for the Canadian army.
translation: 约翰·英格利斯公司应该为加拿大军队建造新的机关枪和大炮。
聚合物公司

original: The new crown corporation Polymer Corporation has proven to be exceptionally efficient in the production of new rubber polymers.
translation: 新的国有聚合物公司已被证明在生产新的橡胶聚合物方面非常有效。
国立钢铁汽车

original: Though it has struggled through the Depression, the National Steel Car company has the expertise and experience to help build the vehicles we will need for the expanded railway and army.
translation: 已经挣扎着度过了大萧条的国家钢铁公司有专门知识和经验，可以帮助我们制造车辆，我们满足扩大铁路和军队车辆的需求。
派遣僵尸

original: The time has come to put all of Canada’s eligible men to work in the army. We’ve mobilized a lot of men to work in the industry through the NRMA, but now they should be sent overseas.
translation: 现在是把加拿大所有的合格男人都装进军队的时候了。我们已经动员了很多人通过了汽车协会的检测，但现在他们应该被派往海外。
命若天定

original: Canadians are not taking the threat of foreign domination seriously, so we will simulate a Nazi occupation of Winnipeg to drive the fear home. This will certainly increase sales of Victory Bonds.
translation: 加拿大人没有认真看待外国统治的威胁，所以我们将模拟纳粹占领温尼伯，让恐惧在每个人的家里，这肯定会增加胜利债券的销售。
国防研究津贴

original: Now that Canada is fully a sovereign nation we are no longer receiving access to advanced prototypes and blueprints like we previously did. We must ensure that we alway stay ahead of our enemies, and do not fall behind in technology.
translation: 现在加拿大完全是一个主权国家，我们不在像以前那样接收先进蓝图和原型。我们必须确保我们始终是领先于敌人，并且在技术方面不能落后。
开采铀矿

original: Our allies are working on a secret project that will require uranium. Fortunately, the Eldorado company has discovered the rare mineral and built a town around the mines - Port Radium. The government must seize control of this company and protect this highly sensitive mineral.
translation: 我们的盟友正在开展一个需要铀的秘密项目。 幸运的是，埃尔多拉多公司发现了稀有矿物，并在矿区周围建造了一个小镇-蔚蓝港。政府必须紧握这家公司的控制权，保护这种高度敏感的矿产。
朗布兰奇兵工厂

original: The Long Branch Arsenal in Western Toronto will be our center for rifle production. We need thousands of Lee-Enfields, and the Arsenal’s central location will aid in distribution throughout the country.
translation: 在多伦多西部的朗布兰奇兵工厂将是我们的步枪生产中心。我们需要数以千计的李恩菲尔德步枪，而阿森纳的中央位置将有助于分发向全国各地。
独立指挥

original: In the Great War, Canadian troops were ultimately answerable to British officers, leading to senseless slaughter at the Somme and Passchendaele. This time, Canada will command its own.
translation: 在一战中，加拿大军队最终向英国军官负责，这导致了索姆河和帕斯尚尔的无谓屠杀。 而这一次，加拿大将自己独立指挥。
魁北克强迫征兵制

original: Just like in 1917, our French Canadian citizens in Quebec are resisting the idea of a national draft to bring more men into the army. We will not stand by and let one minority defy the will of Parliament.
translation: 正如1917年一样，我们在魁北克的法裔加拿大公民正在抵制一个使更多的人进入军队的全国草案。我们不会袖手旁观，让一小部分人违背议会的意志。
与魁北克妥协

original: Quebec is balking at national conscription. This issue almost tore the country apart in the Great War, and we cannot afford to disrupt our national unity in a time of crisis. Maybe we can make a deal regarding war service for residents of Quebec.
translation: 魁北克正在阻止全国征兵。这个问题在一战中曾差点分裂国家，我们不能在危机时期破坏我们的民族团结。也许我们可以就魁北克居民的战时兵役达成协议。
战争助燃经济

original: The overseas demand for raw materials and finished goods is lifting Canada out of the Depression. Our natural wealth in forests and minerals can feed the allied war machine and enrich the nation.
translation: 海外对原材料和成品的需求使加拿大摆脱了大萧条。我们来自森林和矿物的自然财富可以支持盟友的战争机器，使我们的国家富裕起来。
军队现代化

original: Too long secure in our fireproof house, far from inflammable materials, Canada has let its army make do with antiquated equipment and training. We must move on modernization before it is too late.
translation: 我们在远离易燃材料的防火屋里安全了太久。加拿大让它的军队装备着过时的装备，进行着过时的训练。我们必须走上现代化，趁着还不算迟。
加拿大步兵军团

original: We now have enough men to establish a corps level formation. The Canadian Infantry Corps is our first corps size group since the last war.
translation: 我们现在有足够的人来建立一个军团级别的组织，而加拿大步兵团是我们自上次战争以来的第一个军团级组织。
加拿大军用卡车

original: Canadian factories are safe from enemy bombing and so can be directed to make transportation for the war effort. Our CMP Truck design is versatile, suited to many climates.
translation: 加拿大工厂安全而远离敌人轰炸，所以可以直接对战争的运输。我们的加拿大军事卡车有多用途设计，适合于多种气候。
加拿大炮兵皇家军团

original: Despite a lack of up-to-date cannon, we must start training our artillery men to fight a modern war, including how to use anti-air guns and new 25 pounders.
translation: 就算没有最新的大炮，我们也必须开始训练我们的炮兵打一场现代战争，包括如何使用防空炮和新的25磅榴弹炮。
机动部队

original: Canada’s experience in manufacturing trucks and engines has given us an edge in the research and development of motorized armed forces.
translation: 加拿大在制造卡车和发动机方面的经验使我们在摩托化部队的研究和发展方面处于了领先地位。
红鹿训练营

original: The Red Deer Training Camp will be the main location for the training of our new army. With a full armory and nearby airfields, Red Deer is ideally situated.
translation: 红鹿训练营将是我们新军训练的主要场所。红鹿拥有完整的军械库和临近的机场，地理位置优越。
对讲机

original: Donald Hings has invented and is patenting a new handheld two way communication device that works on radio waves. This will greatly improve communication and targeting.
translation: 唐纳德·兴斯发明了一种新的手持式双向通信设备，该设备通过无线电波工作。这将大大改善我们的交流和定位。
加拿大第一伞兵营

original: Despite resistance from those that would prefer we focus on home defense, modern airborne warfare needs a dedicated parachute battalion to get the drop on our enemies.
translation: 不要在意来自那些希望我们专注于本土防御的人的反对，现代空降战需要一个专门的伞兵营，降落在敌人的头顶上。
黑恶魔

original: A special commando unit will need to be available for dangerous assignments. Cooperation with our American Allies in the creation of The Devil’s Brigade has been arranged.
translation: 我们需要有一个特别的突击单位执行危险任务。与我们的美国盟友在创建“恶魔旅”的合作已经提上了议程。
瓦伦丁坦克

original: Canada has a license to produce the Valentine Tank, a durable medium tank of British design.
translation: 加拿大有生产瓦伦丁坦克的许可证，这是英国设计的一个耐用中型坦克。
落基山游骑兵

original: Home defense in the west will fall to the Rocky Mountain Rangers, based in Kamloops.
translation: 西部的本土防卫将交给位于坎卢普斯的洛基山游骑兵。
强化与英联邦的关系

original: Our fellow Dominions are our truest friends, and we should all march together in support of His Majesty.
translation: 我们的同胞是我们最真诚的朋友，我们都应该一同行动，支持国王陛下。
影子工厂

original: We need aircraft factories, but it is easier and safer to have the parts manufacture dispersed around other factories, especially near automobile works. This will encourage secrecy and safety.
translation: 我们需要飞机工厂，但是零部件制造分散在其他工厂，特别是在汽车工厂附近更加简易安全。这同时将促进保密性和安全性。
蒙特利尔实验室的合作

original: The Montreal Laboratory has become an attraction for scientists all around the world. French and British scientists have felt especially welcome and are bringing greatly needed expertise to the Dominions’ efforts.
translation: 蒙特利尔实验室已成为吸引世界各地科学家的圣地。法国和英国科学家会特别受欢迎，并为我们的国家带来了非常需要的专业知识。
飞天计划

original: We have joined with our allies to share experience and insight in the training of pilots. The war could be won from the air, so the Commonwealth Air Training Plan could be the key to victory.
translation: 我们与盟友一起分享了飞行员训练的经验和见解。战争可以从空中赢得，所以联邦航空培训计划可能是胜利的关键。
X营

original: Intelligence gathering and spy training will be centralized at a secret location near Oshawa. It is centrally located for signals from both the UK and America.
translation: 情报收集和间谍训练将集中在奥沙瓦附近的一个秘密地点。它位于来自英国和美国的信号的中心。
供给帝国

original: Is there any nation as rich in wood, iron, nickel, and coal? So long as our convoys and railways are safe, we can ship raw materials to our ports and then to our Imperial partners.
translation: 有什么国家拥有丰富的木材、铁、镍、煤吗？只要我们的航线和铁路是安全的，我们可以运送原材料到我们的港口，然后运往我们的帝国合作伙伴。
加拿大铝业公司

original: Aluminum is lightweight and rustproof. By expanding our mining and production of aluminum, we can ensure that our factories and assembly lines will always be fed.
translation: 铝轻质而防锈。通过扩大我们对铝的开采和生产，我们可以确保我们的工厂和装配线将总是供应充足。
特纳峪油田

original: Discovered in 1914, the Turner Valley outside Calgary has become one of the largest oil fields in the Empire. Further development should be a top priority for the industry and the government.
translation: 在1914年被发现后，卡尔加里外的特纳谷已经成为帝国最大的油田之一，其进一步的发展应该是工商界和政府的首要任务。
归国

original: The time has come for Canada to reduce its ties to Mother England. We are a grown nation, with a destiny of our own, looking to the continent and across the Pacific as much as to England and Europe.
translation: 加拿大是弱化与英格兰母亲的关系的时候了。我们是一个成熟的国家，有我们自己的命运，望着大陆，穿越太平洋，视线直抵英格兰和欧洲。
常设联合防务委员会

original: Geography and common heritage ties us to the United States, but the continent is too large for one of us to defend alone. A joint defense board is required for consultation and planning on the protection of North America.
translation: 地理和共同遗产将我们同美国连接起来，但是大陆太大了，我们中的一个人不能单独防卫。需要联合防务委员会进行北美守卫的磋商和规划。
北美联盟

original: The time has come to announce a great and permanent partnership with the United States of America. None can challenge us when we are united in peace and brotherhood.
translation: 现在是宣布与美利坚合众国建立伟大的长期伙伴关系的时候了。没有人可以在我们和平团结的时候挑战我们了。
哈巴谷级航母

original: Project Habakkuk is our plan to build an anti-submarine carrier from a material made of wood pulp and ice. This will free up steel for more important uses, and further Canadian science.
translation: 哈巴谷项目是我们用木浆和冰制成的材料建造反潜舰艇的计划。这将为更重要的用途和加拿大科学的进一步发展省出钢材。
科学家的避难所

original: Far from the tumult of war, Canada has proven to be a promising landing place for scientists that wish to carry out their work free from bombs and bullets.
translation: 远离战争动荡的加拿大，已被证明是那些希望不在炸弹和子弹下开展工作的科学家们最充满前途的落脚点。
卐字社

original: Many Canadians are turning to Swastika Clubs to promote the ideas and ideals of Fascism. Fascinating!
translation: 许多加拿大人正在转向卍字社来明白法西斯主义的理念和理想，有趣！
支持蓝衫党

original: Our nation’s turn to fascism will require a strong paramilitary arm to intimidate and impress our rivals. The Blue Shirts will be our answer to any who defy our new order.
translation: 我们国家的法西斯主义倾向将需要一个强大的准军事武器来恐吓和动摇我们的对手。蓝衫党将是我们对任何违抗我们新秩序的人的回答。
联合德国

original: Hitler has proven to be a reasonable man who is making reasonable demands while making his nation strong. We will join the Reich in solidarity for a new Golden Age.
translation: 希特勒已经被证明是一个合理的人做出合理的要求来使他的国家强大。我们联合德国将成为一个新的黄金时代。
支持共治联盟党

original: To further the spread of conservative nationalism in North America, we should throw our weight behind a Synarchist revolt in Mexico. Once it is successful, we will have two Fascist states ready to spread the words across the hemisphere.
translation: 为了支持保守民族主义在北美的进一步传播，我们应支持在墨西哥的共治联盟党起义。一旦成功，我们将有两个法西斯国家准备把共治的思想向整个半球传播。
绑住老鹰的双翼

original: Our long border with the United States has been undefended for too long. America remains the greatest threat to Canadian security, so action will be taken to make it too difficult and troublesome for the USA to invade.
translation: 我们与美国长长的边界已经太长时间不设防了。美国仍然是加拿大安全的最大威胁，因此我们将采取行动，使美国的入侵变的困难和麻烦。
刺穿老鹰

original: We will form an alliance with our Mexican brothers to surround and contain the American threat.
translation: 我们将与我们的墨西哥兄弟组成联盟来包围并遏制来自美国的威胁。
一号防御计划

original: It is time to dust off Defence Scheme No 1, our interwar plan for a counterattack on the United States in case of war.
translation: 现在是时候使用封存已久的一号防御计划了，我们将在美国战争期间对美国的宣战。
索取拉布拉多与纽芬兰

original: Newfoundland is a failed Dominion that had to return to colonial status. Its proper place is with Canada.
translation: 纽芬兰的治理是失败的，以至于它不得不重新成为殖民地。它最适当的归处是加拿大。
焚毁国王画像

original: No more monarchs! No more shall we submit to the rule of a foreign figurehead and a foreign parliament. Canada will be free and equal. The People will rise.
translation: 没有更多的国王！我们不能再接受外国傀儡和外国议会的统治。 加拿大将是自由和平等的，人民将会站起来。
共产劳工全面战争委员会

original: Canadian Communists are also patriots! In the global war against Fascism, we can work with the bourgeois liberals to mobilize the entire nation for war.
translation: 加拿大共产党人也是爱国者！在反对法西斯主义的全球战争中，我们可以与资产阶级自由派合作，动员整个国家进行战争。
二号防御计划

original: Defence Scheme No. 2 is our contingency plan in case of a war in the Pacific between the United States and the Empire of Japan. Ideally, we will stay neutral in the case of war, but no matter the circumstances, strong defense on our west coast will be established.
translation: 第2号防务计划是美国和日本在太平洋发生战争时的应急计划。理想情况下，我们将在战争中保持中立，但无论何时，我们都将在西海岸建立强大的防御。
输送赤军

original: As the Soviet Union is at war against the enemies of the people, Canada should undertake to assist Moscow with arms and supplies.
translation: 由于苏联正在对抗人民的敌人，加拿大应承担协助运往莫斯科的武器和物资。
团结的加拿大

original: Even though our population is spread in a thin line across the continent, we have come together in this world crisis to stand up for Canadian values and to protect the weak.
translation: 即使我们的人口分布在整个大陆的一条细线上，我们也应该在这次世界危机中团结在一起，从而支持加拿大的价值观并保护弱者。
加入共产国际

original: The Soviet Union has proven its good faith and strength. Canada should join the Soviet alliance.
translation: 苏联已经证明了其的诚意和实力，加拿大应该与苏联联盟。
支持世界革命

original: Do you hear the people sing? It’s the Internationale! Canada will endeavor to liberate the proletariat from their shackles.
translation: 你可听到人民的歌声？是国际歌！加拿大将努力将从枷锁中解放无产阶级。
驻博登加拿大皇家空军

original: Canada’s air corps was born in Borden, Ontario, and that base should be used to train a new generation of pilots.
translation: 加拿大的空军诞生在安大略省的博登，该基地应该用于训练新一代飞行员。
我们有飓风

original: The United Kingdom has given us permission to build a line of Hurricane fighters. These planes will be the core of our air wing.
translation: 英国允许我们建立一条飓风战斗机的生产线。这些飞机将是我们空军的核心。

original: The Pacific Coast Air Defence Radar System
translation: 太平洋沿岸防空雷达系统

original: The coast of British Columbia is rocky and sparsely populated, except in the south. We will have to rely on early warning systems like a chain of radar stations to detect anything unusual coming over the Pacific.
translation: 除了南部以外，不列颠哥伦比亚省的海岸遍布岩石、人口稀少。我们将不得不依赖早期预警系统，比如一条雷达链，以检测任何来自太平洋的异常。
协同航空训练计划

original: Air combat training will be coordinated with our Commonwealth and Dominion allies. This is more efficient, and can be done en masse and safely at our airfields.
translation: 我们的航空训练将与英联邦自治领的盟友协调。这样更有效率，能在我们的机场进行大量安全的训练。
投资仙童半导体发展

original: The Fairchild aircraft factory in Quebec should be given the resources it needs to increase bomber part production. We should be able to increase employment in the plant by thousands.
translation: 在魁北克的仙童半导体飞机工厂应该获得它所需要的资源，以增加轰炸机零件生产。我们应该能够增加数以千计的工厂订单。
饼干携带者

original: The strategic air war requires heavy bombers to drop tasty treats on our enemies.
translation: 战略空战需要重型轰炸机在我们的敌人上撒下美味的食物。
佩刀项目

original: Jet aircraft will dominate the skies of the future, so we should invest in the production of our own variants of foreign jet planes.
translation: 喷气式飞机将主宰未来的天空，所以我们应该投资生产我们自己的国外的喷气式飞机变种。
哈利法克斯船厂

original: Conveniently located opposite Europe, the Halifax docks have been building new ships at a record pace. The Battle of the Atlantic can be won.
translation: 哈利法克斯码头正对欧洲，位置便利，一直以创纪录的速度建造新船。大西洋之战胜利有望。
重视驱逐舰

original: The threat of submarine attacks on supply and troop convoys requires us to focus on the construction of destroyers to hunt and kill these underwater dangers.
translation: 潜艇对补给和部队运输的打击威胁要求我们集中精力建造驱逐舰，从而得以狩猎和击沉这些水下危险。
重视轻巡洋舰

original: We will never be able to build many capital ships, but smaller cruisers, constructed en masse, can still pack a punch.
translation: 我们永远无法大量建造大型船只，但小型巡洋舰仍然可以集中大量建造。
重视重巡洋舰

original: We can build our fleets around heavy cruisers, and have more than enough ports to make this a viable strategy.
translation: 我们可以建立以重巡洋舰为核心的舰队，并有足够大的港口使其成为一个可行的策略。
护航舰队

original: Oceans separate us from most of the world’s tumults, so if our armies are to fight and be supplied, we need to prioritize escort formations and anti-submarine warfare.
translation: 海洋使我们与世界上大部分的动乱隔绝，所以如果我们的军队要加入战斗并获得补给，我们需要优先考虑护航编队和反潜战。
存在舰队

original: By building a large naval force, its mere existence can be a threat to our enemies even if we never deploy it. The very thought of our ships sailing forth and striking at their sea lanes forces them to be cautious.
translation: 通一支庞大的海军力量，即使我们从未部署它，其存在也能对我们的敌人造成威胁。一想到我们的舰队，它们在引人注目的海上航线就必须小心谨慎。
消磁船体

original: We will start to degauss our ship hulls, reducing their magnetic signature. This protects them from magnetic mines and reduces the ships’ electronic profile.
translation: 我们将开始对我们的船体消磁，减少他们的磁性标识。这将保护他们免受磁性地雷的伤害，并削弱船舶的电子轮廓。
贸易舰队

original: Canada is a trading nation. Build more freighters and convoys.
translation: 加拿大是一个贸易国家。我们需要建造更多货轮和护航队
联合造船厂

original: The Montreal dock of United Shipyards has become the primary source for our landing craft and cargo vessels.
translation: 蒙特利尔码头的联合造船厂已成为我们的登陆艇和货船的主要来源。

original: Build §YInfrastructure§! and add §YBuilding Slots§! in occupied states located in southern and mid parts of Africa.\n
translation: 建立§Y基础设施§!并添加§Y建筑槽§!在位于非洲南部和中部地区的被占领国。\n
爱德华国王已被流放
这些选项是互相排斥的。
与下列国策互斥：
$FOCUS|Y$

original: This focus currently has no effect. Changes in the world situation may affect this.
translation: 这项国策目前没有实际影响。但随着世界局势的变化可能会发生改变。
战时经济法案

original: We cannot allow any disruption to the war effort, so we are passing new legislation to enforce total compliance with government aims. This will protect the flow of resources and allow us to focus political energy where it is needed.
translation: 我们不能允许战争时期国家经济体系受到冲击，所以我们正准备起草新法案以保障战时军队和民众的需求都能得到满足，这将保证资源流动不受到破坏并能让我们更好的集中分配资源
紧急工人动员

original: It is time to mobilize more of the South African population for the war effort. Women can be brought into the factories at lower cost, as well.
translation: 现在是动员更多的南非民众为赢得战争而奋斗的时候了，我们的妇女也应该像男人一样进入工厂工作
CSIR

original: South Africa lags behind other Dominions in science and technology, so establishing the Council for Scientific and Industrial Research in Pretoria has become a pressing matter for the government.
translation: 南非在技术和其他人科学领域大大的落后于其他的国家，因此我们的政府需要在比勒陀利亚建立一个科学和工业研究委员会来改善科学技术上的差距
好望角卫戍炮兵团

original: The Cape remains an important sea route for many nations, and is the gateway to the South African heartland. Expansion of the garrison’s coastal defenses and artillery should be at the top of our to-do list.
translation: 好望角对许多国家来说是仍然是一条重要的海上交通线，同时它也是通往南非中心地带的门户，因此当地的卫戍团和炮兵以及防御设施的扩建应该是我们待办事项里的首要目标。
重建好望角军团

original: Historically, we have been able to press some of our Coloured population into service to defend South Africa. This is not popular with everyone in the country, but it will free white South Africans to serve overseas.
translation: 纵观我们过去的历史，我们已经不止一次的把有色人种送去保卫南非的战斗之中，尽管不是每个南非人都欢迎这种做法，但如果让更多的有色人种进入南非军队我们就可以获得更多的士兵来为我们服务
扩张好望角军团

original: Though we reconstituted the Cape Corps as a mostly non-combatant force, the threat of invasion means we must give the Corps greater resources, training and access to weapons.
translation: 我们重建好望角军团时主要把它定义为后勤支援部队，但现在我们面临着的入侵威胁意味着我们必须给予军团更多的资源，更好的培训和更强大的武器
为所有穷人提供的工作

original: Poor rural Afrikaners have flooded into the cities seeking work for the last few years, and we’ve done little to help them. Until now. Industrialization and government protection of their access to work will help this population.
translation: 许多来自贫穷村落的非洲农民在近几年大量的涌入了我们的城市去寻找工作，而长时间以来我们都几乎没有帮助过他们，直到现在，我们的工业化政策和政府支持将会帮助这些农民在工厂里寻找到新的工作
禁止罢工

original: Work stoppages and labor disruption is unpatriotic in times of crisis. Strikes are hereby declared illegal, and the government will force people back to work.
translation: 在危机时期停止工作和中断输送劳动力都应该被视为是不爱国的，因此我们将罢工行为宣布为违法行为，政府将会强迫人们回到工作岗位
支持英法的绥靖政策

original: Germany has legitimate grievances and the Dominions suffered greatly in the last war. We should take advantage of every opportunity for peace in our time.
translation: 德国对莱茵兰地区有着正当的主权，而在结束一切战争的战争中，全世界都受到了极大地打击，因此我们应该支持英法的政策去确保我们的时代有长久的和平
温得和克警察

original: We have had a mandate over the former German colony of South-West Africa since the last war ended. It is vital that we live up to our duty to secure and improve the major city of Windhoek.
translation: 自从大战结束以后，我们就夺取了前德国殖民地西南非洲，但长久以来我们并不关注那一片区域的发展，现在是时候旅行我们的责任了，建立一个高效的警察部门来改善例如温得和克这样的主要城市的治安
联合空中训练计划

original: The Commonwealth nations are pooling their resources and experience to facilitate and accelerate the training of pilots and air crew.
translation: 英联邦国家正一起汇集其资源和经验去开展新的空军训练项目，以改善飞行员和机组人员的能力
沙漠战装备

original: The war in North Africa requires specialized equipment and as our forces could be called to serve on that front, the provision and supply of that equipment will become an important logistical matter.
translation: 如果我们要前往北非作战我们就需要专门的沙漠战装备，因此我们的军队向军需部门提出开发沙漠战的特种装备的要求
打压人民突击队

original: The Fascist pro-German Ossewabrandwag (OB) has a paramilitary wing modeled on similar European groups. They are disrupting government efforts to recruit troops and pursue a secure and united war policy. The Stormjaers must be broken up.
translation: 我们的国家出现了一支效仿法西斯德国的Ossewabrandwag（冲锋队）建立的准军事组织，他们正在破坏政府应征部队以及危害我们的国家安全，这种组织必须被打压下去！
确保我们在非洲的利益

original: The Union of South Africa neighbors a number of British colonies that could be left to our administration. We should also do what we can to permanently secure our Mandate over South-West Africa.
translation: 南非联邦离英国的一些殖民地非常近，因此我们可以向英国请求暂时接管这些殖民地，这样既可以减轻英国当局的压力又可以使得我们扩展自己的势力范围
原住民法修正案

original: To further guarantee work for the Afrikaner population, we must limit the settlement of Black South Africans within the cities. Only those with a long history in the municipality will have residency rights.
translation: 为了进一步确保南非白人的利益，我们必须限制有色人种在南非城市的定居权，只有那些在城市里居住很久的有色人种才有城市的定居权，其他的一律被驱逐到郊区或农村
鼓励隔离

original: We should push harder to legally separate our different ethnic populations to promote the power and unity of our ruling class.
translation: 我们应该努力去合法的分离我们不同的民族的人口，以促进我们统治阶级可以更加稳固
脱离威斯敏斯特体系

original: The replacement of the Cape route by the Suez, as well as the formative experience of the Boer War have helped create a South African identity distinct from that of our Dominion allies. We should distance ourselves from the King, and forge our own path.
translation: 开挖苏伊士运河以替换好望航线，同时又发动布尔战争来深化殖民统治，在经受了这么多屈辱之后南非已经准备好脱离英国的统治了，我们应该驱逐国王并走我们自己的道路
援助白人秘密兄弟会

original: The Afrikaner Broederbond has been agitating for a greater voice for the Afrikaner people and stronger separation of the races. The memory of British policy in the Boer War is still strong, and the Broederbond can help create a new South Africa.
translation: 南非的白人兄弟会一直在为南非白人发声，他们强调要进一步是分离各个种族，英国人在布尔战争时对我们的集权政策依然历历在目，兄弟会可以帮助我们创建一个新的南非
援助人民冲锋队

original: The Fascist Ossewabrandwag paramilitary should be used as a bulwark against foreign agitation and domestic uprisings that target our ruling class.
translation: 例如法西斯人民冲锋队这样的准军事组织应该被我们利用作一个维护统治的手段，他们可以用于防止外国间谍破坏和镇压反对我们统治阶级的起义
庆祝大迁移

original: A century ago, our Afrikaner ancestors separated from the rising British colonial power and built their own Boer nation in the northeast. Their hardy spirit still represents the best of South African virtue.
translation: 一个世纪以前，我们的殖民先驱与英国的殖民统治阶级划清界限，在迁移到东北边建立了自己的布尔民族，他们坚韧不拔的精神代表了如今南非最高的美德
先驱者纪念碑

original: A monument to the Voortrekkers who undertook the Great Trek will strengthen national spirit and unity in these troubling times.
translation: 一个纪念伟大的殖民先驱者的纪念碑将在这令人不安的时刻加强我们的民族团结及鼓舞我们的精神
支持西南非洲的纳粹主义

original: As a former German colony, it is only appropriate that we encourage the growth of German political ideas in South-West Africa.
translation: 作为德国的前殖民地，我们也应该鼓励德国的政治理念在西南非洲的发展
南非优先

original: South Africa is the strongest independent nation on the continent, and therefore can be a lodestone for the future of Africa and former colonies.
translation: 南非如今是非洲大陆最强大的独立国家，因此南非应该成为非洲和各个殖民地未来的领导者！
德国援助政变

original: The German government has long seen South Africa as fertile ground for greater influence, dating back to the last century. Our future lies with the Reich, not the Empire, so let’s move forward with the plan to overthrow the current government.
translation: 德国政府很早就看出了南非是一块沃土，而且有撬动整个非洲的强大影响力，而且这种看法可以追溯到上个世纪，我们的未来在于德国而非软弱无力的英国，所以我们应该向德国请求支援我们的政变
收回布尔殖民地

original: The former Boer territory of Transvaal and other regions rightfully belong to the free heirs of that enterprising people.
translation: 属于前布尔殖民地的不仅仅只有德兰士瓦州，其他的地区都应该回归到布尔人的后裔手中来

original: Commemorate the Battle of Blood River
translation: 纪念血河之战

original: In 1838, a wagon laager of Boer settlers held off tens of thousands of Zulu warriors, dealing a crippling blow to Zulu power in the Natal. This was surely a divine sign of the rightness of our cause.
translation: 1838年，布尔定居者发动的战争击溃了成千上万的祖鲁战士，并在纳塔尔对祖鲁的统治造成了严重的打击，这一战役可以作为肯定我们事业的光辉事迹
德国科学家

original: German scientists are among the best in the world and have much to share with us.
translation: 德国科学家是世界上最好的科学家，而且他们乐于与我们分享科技
支持轴心国的战斗

original: The Axis powers have an energy and ideology that can help South Africa establish its place in the world. We should give them our full diplomatic support.
translation: 轴心国的战斗是充满能量和意识形态的，他们的战斗可以帮助南非在世界上建立起它的地位，我们应该公开为他们的事业提供支持！
我们人民的国王

original: South Africa should have a king, and fortunately there is a Windsor that no one is using right now. The former Edward VIII, Duke of Windsor, can sit on our throne.
translation: 南非的人民应该有一个国王，有一个人民精神的寄托，而现在一个失去王位的温莎家族成员正待在南非，前国王爱德华八世，这位温莎公爵应该坐在我们的王座上去鼓舞我们的人民
解放工人的权力

original: We are a country of miners and farmers. The working people of South Africa are the only true representation of the national will.
translation: 我们的国家是由矿工和农民组成的，因此南非的工人是国家意志的唯一代表
援助西班牙共和国

original: Fascism is on the rise in Europe, and we can stop it in Spain - or at least slow its spread. Men and material should be sent to support the Republican cause.
translation: 虽然法西斯主义在欧洲快速扩散，但至少我们可以在西班牙遏制它---尽管代价高昂且效果不明显，所以我们应该向西班牙共和国派出志愿者和装备去抵抗法西斯暴徒
废除土著代表法

original: Racial discrimination is contrary to the values of popular revolution in South Africa. Blacks should be restored to the general voting rolls and given political rights.
translation: 种族歧视与南非的革命民众的价值观背道而驰，黑人应该拥有投票权，我们会废除这些带有种族歧视的色彩并给予黑人同等的政治权利
烧毁国王的肖像

original: Down with the Royal Family! This symbolic gesture will publicly declare our breach from the foreign throne.
translation: 让温莎家族滚出南非！烧毁国王的肖像将公开宣布我们脱离英国皇室的统治！
加入共产国际

original: The Soviet Union has been in the forefront of the crusade for the workers and against Fascism. We shall join their mighty alliance.
translation: 苏维埃联盟一直走在工人革命和抵抗法西斯主义的前段，我们应该加入他们强大的联盟
援助世界革命

original: The only way for the workers to triumph is to unite the entire globe in a single effort. The Revolution must be universal and, therefore, it must be exported.
translation: 让工人取得胜利的唯一办法是团结起来整个地球的所有工人，因此必须出口革命，让全世界的工人都团结在一起奋斗！
平等就业机会

original: If we are to improve the lot of workers in our nation, we must start with ensuring that all workers are treated equal, regardless of their color of skin.
translation: 如果我们要改善劳动者的工作质量，就必须先确保所有的工人都能得到平等对待，无论他们的皮肤颜色如何
索取马达加斯加

original: With the dramatic changes of the situation in Europe, it is time to reevaluate the whole system of colonialism. Why should Madagascar be shackled to a falling empire?
translation: 随着欧洲局势发生戏剧性的变化，现在是时候重新评估一下殖民主义制度了，为什么马达加斯加要随着一个衰落的帝国一起衰落？
邀请苏联顾问

original: If we are to support the Soviet Union in their struggle to bring freedom to the workers of the world, we need to improve our military by learning from them.
translation: 如果我们要帮助苏联为全世界的工人带来自由而斗争，我们就应该向他们学习并改进我们的军队。
与苏联的研究条约

original: After learning many valuable lessons from our Soviet friends, it is time to deepen the relationship and sign a formal treaty.
translation: 在从我们的苏联同志那里学习了许多有价值的军事思想之后，现在是时候进一步加深合作关系了
反殖民主义十字军

original: Colonialism sits at the heart of the imperialist system that oppresses the workers of the world. We are in the unique position to smash that system and free the African people from the centuries of exploitation they had to endure.
translation: 殖民主义在几个世纪以来作为帝国主义压迫世界工人和核心而让人恨的咬牙切齿，而现在我们的地理环境和意识形态让我们可以打破这一制度，让非洲人民挣脱开几个世纪以来被帝国主义者套在身上的枷锁
非洲人民同盟

original: For the longest time, African people had no say in determining their own destiny. Those days are over. We will create a faction strong enough to withstand any attempt by the revanchionist powers of the world to roll back our achievements. Africa will be free of colonialism.
translation: 长期以来，非洲人民的命运被帝国主义者牢牢掌握在手中，但那只是到现在为止，今天我们将建立起一个足够强大的阵营，让非洲人民重新掌握住自己的命运，没有帝国主义者可以阻挡我们非洲人民挣脱开自己的枷锁，非洲将从殖民主义解放！
解放葡萄牙的殖民地

original: The colonies of Angola and Mozambique sit right at our borders. It is time to end the exploitation of their people.
translation: 安哥拉和莫桑比克这两个殖民地就连在我们的边界上，现在是时候解放那些被剥削着的人民了
解放英国的殖民地

original: The British Empire is the most infamous example of colonialism in history. We will end it.
translation: 大英帝国是历史上最臭名昭著的殖民帝国，他们会结束他们殖民非洲的历史！
解放比利时的殖民地

original: The Belgian Congo is widely regarded as one of the most cruel stories of exploitation and opppression. We will write the final chapter of that story.
translation: 比利时的刚果被广泛认为是剥削和压迫最残酷的地方，但今天这段故事将在我们的手中结束！
投资南非铁路公司

original: The South African Railways company needs to be expanded. Bands of youth can be trained there, and given the necessary skills to both work in the country and serve overseas.
translation: 南非铁路公司需要扩展，我们可以把青年送去南非铁路公司作为实习生以培训他们的技能，并教会他们必要的技能让他们可以在国内和国外都能谋生
发展矿业

original: South Africa’s mineral wealth is legendary, and we’ve only just begun to tap its deep reserves of gold, chromium and platinum.
translation: 南非有着惊人的矿产资源储量，而现在我们才刚刚开始挖掘它丰厚的稀有金属储量
发展重型工业技术

original: It is important that South Africa stay up to date with the latest in engineering techniques. Even though our industrial base is small, we should invest in heavy machinery and engineering to quickly catch up to our peers.
translation: 现在的当务之急是让南非拥有最新，最尖端的工程技术，即使我们的工业基础薄弱，我们也应该投资发展重型工业机器以赶上其他的国家
发展基础设施

original: Much of South Africa remains rural and undeveloped. More roads and railroads can bring the natural wealth of the country to its hungry ports.
translation: 南非的大部分地区任然是落后的农村和欠发达地区，修建新的道路和铁路可以让落后地区的资源和人民来到沿海地区为我们的发展做出贡献
军工业发展

original: South Africa is safe from invasion by any foreign power, but also remote from its allies. It is vital that it develop its own arms industry so that the Union is never undefended.
translation: 南非远离同盟国的管辖，但并不能保证自己不受到外国势力的入侵，最重要的是如果我们发展自己的军火工业就能使南非有自己的抵抗能力
南非的钢铁工业

original: We have the coal and iron. Now we have the reason. Expansion of the Iscor steel works in Pretoria will provide the country with the heavy steel plating necessary for modern weapons.
translation: 我们有丰富的煤和铁资源，所以现在是时候在比勒陀利亚扩大我们的钢铁工业了，扩张的钢铁厂将为我们的国家提供现代武器所需要的钢板
比勒陀利亚军火厂

original: The existing steel works in Pretoria has focused on heavy plate. With some machine tools, however, we can convert some of the factory into a center for small arms production.
translation: 比勒陀利亚现在的钢铁厂大多生产厚重的大型钢材，但如果我们购买一些先进的机床，这些钢板就可以被切割用于制作武器，这样一来一些工厂也就可以变成武器制造厂了
进一步深挖`兰德金矿

original: The Rand Mines are some of the deepest gold mines in the world - and so even with 19th-century technology. We are capable of so much more now. Dig deep! And greedily, even.
translation: 兰德金矿是当今世界上最深的金矿，但它现在居然还在用着19世纪的技术，我们现在可以使用最新的技术去开挖兰德金矿！深入挖掘它！满足我们的欲望！

original: Fund the University of South Africa
translation: 投资南非大学

original: Pretoria’s University of South Africa is one of the best universities on the continent - in the southern hemisphere, even. By investing in it, we can grow our own local talent instead of sending our young people overseas.
translation: 比勒陀利亚的南非大学是非洲最好的大学，甚至可以说是南半球最好的大学，通过投资建设新的校区我们可以培养更多的本地人才，而不是把我们的年轻人送到海外
建立原子能委员会

original: Atomic weapons will be the greatest military breakthrough since gunpowder, not to mention the peaceful uses of this power if we can harness the atom. Gather our top scientists to study this.
translation: 原子能武器将是自火药以来最大的军事突破，但前提是我们可以先用好原子能，召集我们最顶级的物理学家让他们来研究这个新式武器吧
好望角国防研究院

original: Now that South Africa is fully a sovereign nation we are no longer receiving access to advanced prototypes and blueprints like we previously did. We must ensure that we always stay ahead of our enemies, and do not fall behind in technology.
translation: 现在南非已经成为了一个主权国家，我们不再如同以往只是从英国那里接受高级原型机和蓝图了，我们必须自己走在世界的前段
联合研究计划

original: The British showed us the advantage of sharing scientific progress between close allies. Our whole faction will be able to conduct wartime R&D more efficiently if we take the steps necessary to coordinate this.
translation: 英国人向我们展示了国家之间分享科技进步的优势，如果我们也加入到他们的科研合作计划里，我们的整个阵营就可以更有效的进行战时研究
特殊后勤营

original: South Africa is full of young, unemployed men who need to find something useful to do. The Special Service Battalion will instill some much-needed discipline and organization.
translation: 南非充满了年轻而且失业的男人，他们需要找到一份适合自己的工作，而特殊后勤营将教会他们需要的纪律和组织
改进.303口径枪械

original: South Africa’s troops will be fighting in varied climates, and we are fortunate that the Lee-Enfield rifle is easily customized. The .303 cartridge has been modified a number of times by other countries to suit their needs.
translation: 南非的部队需要在多种不同的环境下战斗，但我们很幸运的得到了李·恩菲尔德步枪的设计图，这种使用.303口径子弹的步枪将在稍加改进之后满足我们军队的需求
Q后勤队

original: The Q Services Corps will be the centralized authority responsible for the logistics and supply of the permanent army. It will handle the distribution of oil, rations, ammo and uniforms.
translation: Q后勤队是负责军队物流供应的中央机构，负责处理油料，军粮和支付的分配
南非军事大学

original: South Africa should have a military academy modeled on the lines of West Point in the United States. This will give us a professional officer corps loyal to the Union.
translation: 南非应该仿造美国西点军校建立一个军事学院，这将为我们的军队提供一个专业的军官来源
扩张南非炮兵团

original: The artillery corps was unified in 1934. Now the time has come to increase its size and capacity.
translation: 南非的炮兵团与1934年建立起来，现在是时候扩张其规模和实力了
扩编南非工程兵团

original: The South African Engineer Corps has barely 600 men in uniform. This is unacceptable in a modern army. We need more men and more training for this crucial task.
translation: 南非工程兵团现在有600人处于现役，但这对于现代军队的需求来说实在是太少了，我们需要培训更多的人来加入工程兵团
发展步兵装备

original: We cannot neglect the supply of support equipment needed for our army. Guns and tanks are well and good, but we need uniforms, radios, repair kits and more.
translation: 我们不能忽视军队所需要的支援装备的供应，尽管枪和坦克都是越多越好，但我们也需要制服，无线电和工具包
南非特种部队

original: South Africa needs a home-grown commando squad to handle those difficult jobs in hard-to-reach places.
translation: 南非需要一支突击队，在一些一般部队难以到达的地方进行艰难的作战
发展机械化

original: Motorized and mechanized war is upon us. The Great Trek of the future will be guided by tracked and wheeled vehicles.
translation: 机动化和机械化的战争将成为未来的主流，未来的战争将是由卡车和轮式装甲车为主导
发展坦克

original: Tanks have come a long way from the sluggish beasts of the last war. Our research and training cannot fall behind that of our enemies - or our friends.
translation: 坦克从上一场战争中那缓慢沉重的钢铁巨兽已经变成了火力充足的战场清扫者，我们的对装甲兵的研究和培训都不能落后于我们的敌人，或是我们的盟友
开始五年计划

original: We have developed a Five-Year Plan for the modernization and expansion of the South African air force. The government must publicly commit to not fall behind this schedule.
translation: 我们制定了现代化南非空军和之后扩展的五年计划，政府公开承诺这个计划将会如期完成
改进霍克雌鹿战斗机

original: The Hawker Hartbees we have are not the most advanced fighters in the world, but we will make do. Improved mechanics and training will get the most out of these biplanes.
translation: 我们的霍克雌鹿战斗机并不是世界上最先进的战斗机，但我们会从它身上学习航空学知识，我们会最大限度的利用这些双翼飞机
更换布伦海姆轰炸机

original: The Bristol Blenheim has been a serviceable light bomber for the RAF, and for the Dominions. But it may be time to find something sturdier, with a longer range.
translation: 布伦海姆轰炸机一直是皇家空军中的中流砥柱，但现在可能是时候去研发一些更坚固，航程更远的轰炸机了
完善空中支援及队战术

original: The "Cab-Rank" Technique has a series of bombers strike a target one at a time, in a long row. This maintains pressure on the enemy, but takes a great amount of skill.
translation: '车站'战术是利用让轰炸机队对着一个固定地点以长列的方式投下炸弹，这对于打击敌方车队或造成压力非常有效，但需要大量的练习配合
沙漠空军

original: The desert skies are clear, and the heat and sand mean special attention to the mechanics of our aircraft. There are valuable skills to be learned in this unforgiving environment.
translation: 沙漠中的天空是非常干净的，但热浪和沙子意味着我们需要特别注意我们飞机的维护，在这种艰难的环境下我们可以学习许多宝贵的技能
保护好望角航线

original: If the Suez should fall, the Cape will again be the gateway to the East. Defend it at all costs.
translation: 如果苏伊士运河沦陷了，开普敦将再一次成为通网东方的大门，我们要不惜一切代价保护它
挽留有经验的飞行员

original: Too often our experienced pilots move on to the RAF instead of staying with our own force. The RAF has better opportunities for advancement and combat. But we should endeavor to keep our trained pilots close to home where they can inspire and educate other South Africans.
translation: 我们经验丰富的飞行员经常转去皇家空军服役，而不是留下来训练我们自己的空中力量，我们应该提高他们的报酬，让他们留下来训练我们的飞行员，在这里他们可以启发教育南非的新兵
海岸警卫队

original: The Seaward Defence Force has served as our navy for two decades. Its funding should be increased.
translation: 海岸警卫队已经作为我们海军力量有近二十年了，我们应该对它注入更多的资金
保护航路

original: The last war showed the importance of convoys and escorts. South Africa lies on a major trade route and should make sure that the goods get through to their destination.
translation: 一战的表明了护卫舰和海上护航的重要性，南非正好位于一个重要的海上贸易路线上，我们应该确保货物能安全达到目的地
破交战

original: The last war showed the importance of convoys and escorts. South Africa lies on a major trade route and is ideally situated to intercept and destroy enemy shipping.
translation: 一战的表明了破交战和无限制潜艇战的威力，南非正好位于一个重要的海上贸易路线上，所以我们可以利用这点打击我们敌人的补给线
扩展西蒙镇海军基地

original: Simon's Town on the Cape has been the most important naval base in southern Africa since the 1790s. It should be refitted and expanded to accommodate more and larger vessels.
translation: 西蒙镇自从17世纪90年代以来一直是南部非洲最重要的海军基地，它应该接受现代化改造和扩展以适应越来越大的船只
反潜战战术

original: Submarines threaten the ships that pass through the Cape of Good Hope. We must find and destroy them.
translation: 敌人的潜艇会威胁穿过好望角的船只，我们必须学习如何找到并消灭他们
无限制潜艇战

original: Enemy trade convoys continue to use the pass through the Cape of Good Hope. We will strike them from below.
translation: 敌人的运输队源源不断的穿过好望角进入前线，我们将从水下打击他们
准备海外作战

original: With miles of coastline, South Africa is fit to train its soldiers in amphibious war. This is one of the most difficult of skills, but our boys can handle it.
translation: 南非的海岸线十分宽广，因此我们非常适合训练用于两栖登陆的士兵，这是最困难的训练，但也是我们派往海外作战最需要的技能
强化好望角卫戍炮兵团

original: The Cape Garrison guns must be upgraded and increased to protect the Cape from enemy attack.
translation: 我们必须扩张并现代化好望角的炮兵卫戍团，以保护好望角不在敌人的登陆下沦陷

original: §RA civil war will break out§! between §Yfascist Nationalists§! in South West Africa and §Ydemocratic Unionists§! in the rest of the country.
translation: 一场§R内战§!将在西南非洲的§Y法西斯纯净国民党§!和§Y民主联合国家党§!控制之下的区域爆发

original: We will enter into a tech sharing agreement with Germany.
translation: 我们将与德国签订技术共享协议

original: Spain is in a civil war.
translation: 西班牙在内战中。
调动新西兰师

original: The 2nd New Zealand Division has been mobilized for action, so we should send it where the fighting is. The NZ Division from the Great War was attached to the Mediterranean, and so will the new division.
translation: 第二新西兰师已被动员起来采取行动，因此我们应该把它投入战场。自一战走来的新西兰师曾隶属于地中海战区，新师团也应该如此。
组建新西兰皇家海军

original: Our once small coastal patrol has now grown to include ships that can operate independently from Royal Navy supervision. New Zealand will have its own navy.
translation: 我们曾经小型海岸巡逻队现已发展成可以独立执行皇家海军监督的船只。新西兰将有自己的海军。
扩建德文波特海军基地

original: The Devonport Naval Base will be the headquarters for our navy, but it must be expanded to meet the new demands of total war.
translation: 德文波特海军基地将是我们海军的总部，但必须扩建，以满足全面战争的新要求。
沿海防御

original: New Zealand is an island nation, far from enemies, so we must be prepared for amphibious attack along our coastlines.
translation: 新西兰是一个岛国，并且远离敌人，所以我们必须为敌人可能对我们沿岸地区发动的两栖攻击做好准备。
重视驱逐舰

original: With our small industrial base, destroyers are the most efficient way for New Zealand to project naval power. Patrol the coasts, intercept submarines, and set early warning pickets.
translation: 凭借我们小型工业基地，驱逐舰是新西兰展现海军力量最有效的途径。巡逻海岸，拦截潜艇，设置早期警戒线。
重视潜艇

original: Since any invasion will have to come by sea, the wolves of the ocean can be strong line of defence. Stealthy and hunting in packs, a submarine fleet can protect our sea lanes.
translation: 由于任何入侵将必须经由海路，海上狼群可以是坚强的防线。潜艇同时具备隐身和搜寻能力，可以保护好我们的海路。
重视轻型巡洋舰

original: Mid-size ships are appropriate for a mid-size power. Light cruisers can pack a punch, but have the speed to escape major engagements if necessary.
translation: 中型舰队适合中等国家，轻型巡洋舰可以狠狠打一拳，但又可以极快速度脱离战场，以避开主要交战。
重视主力舰

original: If New Zealand is to have a first rate navy, it has to have first rate ships. We must invest in battleships and heavy cruisers.
translation: 如果新西兰想拥有第一流的海军，它就必须拥有一流的船只。我们必须拨款给战列舰和重巡洋舰。
扩充新西兰常驻空军

original: The New Zealand Permanent Air Force needs new coastal patrol craft and naval bombers. Modern nations cannot neglect the air war,
translation: 新西兰常驻空军需要新的海岸巡逻艇和海军轰炸机。现代国家不能忽视空战。
组建新西兰皇家空军

original: The time has come to make the air force independent of the other combat arms. The Royal New Zealand Air Force will have its own command structure but co-operate closely with the Royal Air Force.
translation: 现在是时候让空军独立于其他战争武器了。新西兰皇家空军将有自己的指挥结构，但与皇家空军保持密切合作。
重视战斗机

original: Fighters are effective at intercepting and escorting the bombers that will be the decisive weapon for our allies.
translation: 战斗机能有效拦截和护送轰炸机，这将是我们盟友的决定性武器。
重视轰炸机

original: Light bombers can effectively protect our coastlines, and will be needed in the fight overseas against our enemies..
translation: 轻型轰炸机可以有效地保护我们的海岸线，并在需要的时候在国外对抗我们的敌人。
保卫我们的岛屿

original: We must be prepared for attack on our island paradise from the sea. Naval bombers can intercept and attack landing craft or even target capital ships.
translation: 我们必须为可能的海上入侵我们岛屿天堂做好准备。海军轰炸机可以拦截和攻击登陆艇，甚至可以攻击目标主力舰。
现代战斗机

original: It is time to upgrade our fighter designs to faster craft with a longer range. Our allies have shown the way with some of the most advanced planes the world has ever seen.
translation: 是时候升级我们的战斗机设计，使其兼备更快的速度及更长的航程。我们的盟友已经展示了一些当今世界上最先进飞机的样式。
重型轰炸机

original: The war can only be won by striking at the heart of the enemy homeland. Heavy bombers are necessary to deal a devastating blow to enemy factories and cities.
translation: 只有通过打击敌人国土的核心区域才能赢得战争。重型轰炸机对摧毁敌方的工厂和城市来说是必要的。
国家公路局

original: New Zealand’s rough terrain has discouraged a coherent road building system, but we need to improve what we have in place. A highway system should be researched, roads should be paved, and new paths cut through the mountains.
translation: 新西兰的崎岖地形阻碍形成一个连贯的道路建设系统，从另一方面说我们需要改进我们现有的道路。应该研究高速公路系统，铺设道路，在山上开辟新的路径。
新西兰钢铁

original: New Zealand has been blessed with abundant stores of ironsand, especially on the North Island. It takes a special process to extract ore from this sand, but it can serve as the cornerstone of our steel industry for years to come.
translation: 新西兰已经拥有丰富的铁矿储藏，特别是在北岛。这需要一个特殊工艺从沙子中提取出矿石，但它可以作为我们钢铁行业多年发展的基石。
塔拉纳基石油

original: The Taranaki region on the the north island is rich in minerals and petroleum. Entrepreneurs have tried to exploit these oil reserves, but more investment is needed in refineries and drilling.
translation: 北岛的塔拉纳基地区富含矿产和石油。企业家试图利用这些石油储备，但炼油厂和钻井需要更多的投资。
怀拉拉帕绵羊农场

original: The wool industry of Wairarapa is one of the cornerstones of the New Zealand economy. As the world breaks out of its Depression, there will be greater demand for our wool.
translation: 怀拉拉帕羊毛业是新西兰经济的基石之一，随着世界大萧条开始，对我们羊毛的需求会越来越大。
工业局

original: New Zealand is an agrarian society, with an emphasis on ranching. The Bureau of Industry must encourage great investment in capital infrastructure and manufacturing.
translation: 新西兰是一个农业社会，经济重点在牧场。工业局必须鼓励大资本投资基础设施和制造业。

original: Department of Scientific And Industrial Research
translation: 科学与工业研究部

original: The other Commonwealth and Dominion nations are investing in scientific and industrial research, so we should do the same.
translation: 其他英联邦和自治领国家正在投资科学和工业研究，因此我们也应该这样做。
工业征兵

original: There is no reason for any able bodied man to not be serving in the armed forces or working in a war related industry. Our new laws will put every shoulder to the wheel of mobilization and production.
translation: 任何身体健全的人没理由不在武装部队服役或从事与战争有关的工业，我们的新法律将使每个人都肩负起动员和生产的责任。
雄心壮志

original: We have become accustomed to see ourselves as a lesser Dominion than our Aussie or Canadian allies. But New Zealand is fully capable of industrial greatness.
translation: 我们已经习惯把自己看作一个比我们澳大利亚或加拿大盟友更小的自治领，但新西兰完全有能力让工业强大起来。
秘密项目

original: Project Seal is a new initiative with the Americans to develop a weapon that can trigger tsunamis to overwhelm our enemies. It is a little fanciful, but the bouncing bomb that has been developed shows great promise.
translation: 秘密项目是一项新倡议，与美国人联合开发一种武器，可以触发海啸压倒我们的敌人。这有点不切实际，但已经发展的弹跳炸弹已经显示出巨大的潜力。
国防研究所

original: Now that New Zealand is fully a sovereign nation we are no longer receiving access to advanced prototypes and blueprints like we previously did. We must ensure that we alway stay ahead of our enemies, and do not fall behind in technology.
translation: 现在新西兰是一个完全主权国家，我们不再像以前那样接受先进武器原型和蓝图。我们必须确保我们总是领先于我们的敌人，不能在技术上落后。
奥克兰大学的扩张

original: The University of Auckland is our most important post-secondary institution. By expanding its facilities, we can try to keep some of our finest minds here at home.
translation: 奥克兰大学是我们最重要的高等教育机构。通过扩大其设施，我们尝试把我们最好人才留在自己的国家。
陆军改革

original: We should modernize our army’s training and promotion system. This way we can be prepared for whatever happens in the ongoing world crisis.
translation: 我们要让军队的训练和晋升制度实现现代化。这样我们就可以为当今世界危机中任何事情做好准备。
查尔顿自动步枪

original: One of our citizens has modified the standard Lee Enfield rifle into a full automatic gun. This is New Zealand ingenuity at its best and we should encourage innovation along these lines.
translation: 我们一个公民已经将标准的李恩菲尔德步枪改为全自动枪。这体现了新西兰聪明才智的体现，我们应该鼓励这些创新。
鲍勃坦克

original: Why shouldn’t New Zealand have its own tank? The Ministry of Works in Temuka is developing a light tank armed with only machine guns. Even if we never get this beyond a prototype, the experience we gain will be invaluable.
translation: 为什么新西兰不应该拥有自己的坦克呢？特穆卡工程部正在研制一种仅装备机关枪的轻型坦克。即使我们永远不会超越坦克原型，但我们获得的经验将具有无可估量的价值。
国内军工业

original: We should turn as many industries as we can over to the production of small arms. We need ammunition, gun parts, support equipment and so forth. These can be made domestically.
translation: 我们应该把尽可能把更多工业转向生产小型武器。我们需要弹药，枪支部件，支持装备等。这些可以在国内生产。
斯科菲尔德坦克

original: If the Semple Tank didn’t meet our needs, maybe a tank with a proper cannon will do the trick. The combined wheel/track system is original and might lead us to new insights into tank design.
translation: 如果森普尔坦克没有满足我们的需求，或许需要谋划设计一种带固定炮的坦克，这种车轮与轨道系统组合系统是原始的，但可能会导致我们对坦克设计产生新见解。
远程巡逻

original: The Long Range Patrol is intended to cover wide expanses of territory in North Africa. This reconnaissance and commando unit will undertake special missions in some of the world’s harshest climates.
translation: 远程巡逻队旨在保护北非广阔的领土。这个侦察和突击队将在世界上一些最恶劣的气候中执行特别任务。
重视火炮

original: Artillery is crucial for the support of any forward movement by our infantry. Expand research into ballistics and larger barrel guns.
translation: 火炮对支援我们步兵的推进运动来说至关重要。必须扩大对弹道学和更大口径炮的研究。
大鲍勃坦克

original: The battlefields of Europe are calling for heavier armor to compete with the super tanks of our enemies. The Big Bob will be New Zealand’s contribution to this design effort.
translation: 欧洲战场需要更重的装甲，以应对与我们敌人的超级坦克的竞争。大鲍勃将是新西兰对这一设计努力的贡献。
研究合作

original: The British showed us the advantage of sharing scientific progress between close allies. Our whole faction will be able to conduct wartime R&D more efficiently if we take the steps necessary to coordinate this.
translation: 英国向我们展示亲密盟友之间分享科学进步的好处。如果我们采取必要的步骤来协调这一点，我们的整个阵营将能够更有效地进行战时研发。
第一工党政府

original: The First Labour Government for New Zealand has the opportunity to pursue a progressive social and economic agenda. Industrial regulation, workers’ rights, social welfare laws and rules for wages are all on the agenda.
translation: 新西兰第一个工党政府现在有机会推行一项渐进的社会和经济议程，工业监管，工人权利，社会福利法律和工资规则都在议程上。
拉塔纳联盟

original: An alliance with the Ratana movement will bring Maori New Zealanders into the government and hopefully begin to heal some of the wounds of British conquest.
translation: 拉塔纳运动联盟将促进新西兰毛利人积极参与政府，并期盼治愈自英国征服带来的社会创伤。
毛利人事务法

original: Much of the land owned by Maori is economically unproductive. If we can consolidate it and bring more under government control, we can turn these barren locations into fruitful sites of industry and commerce.
translation: 毛利人拥有的大部分土地没有经济效益，如果我们能够巩固并带来更多的政府控制，我们可以把这些贫瘠的地方变成富有成效的工商业场所。
社会保障法

original: The unemployed of New Zealand need to be taken care of until the economy recovers and more jobs are available. We started with a Christmas bonus in 1935, but the time has come for a proper social safety net for all citizens.
translation: 新西兰的失业者需要得到照顾，直到经济复苏和可提供更多的工作机会。从1935年开始我们发放圣诞节红利，但现在是时候为所有公民提供社会保障了。
人力法案

original: Ever since the war started, Maori have come to the cities in large numbers. The Manpower Act will lets us steer those energies into New Zealand factories.
translation: 自从战争爆发以来，毛利人大批来到城市。人力法案将允许我们将这些人力引导到新西兰工厂。
修改毛利事务法

original: We must amend the Maori Affairs Act so that it boost the productivity of underutilized lands, but doesn’t needlessly displace our Maori citizens.
translation: 我们必须修改毛利事务法，以提高未充分利用土地的生产力，但没必要让我们的毛利公民迁徙。
怀唐伊法庭

original: British New Zealanders should come to terms with what their ancestors did to displace, disrupt and marginalize the Maori of New Zealand. Bloody wars, land seizures, and natural rights ignored. Recognizing this legacy is a step to healing.
translation: 英属新西兰人应该正视他们的祖先的所作所为：迫使新西兰毛利人迁徙、扰乱和边缘化毛利人。血腥的战争、征地和自然权利被忽视。认识到这个遗留问题是治愈创伤的一个步骤。
征召毛利人

original: The bravery and heroism of the Maori Battalion attached to the Expeditionary Force is a sign that we should make the most of our entire population by drafting even the reluctant Maori into the service.
translation: 附属于远征部队的毛利营的勇敢和英勇主义是一个标志，我们应该充分动员我们全部人力，甚至起草方案让不情愿入伍的毛利人服役。
毛利人志愿军

original: Showing their patriotism, hundreds of Maori are stepping up to volunteer for service in the New Zealand army.
translation: 为了表明他们的爱国主义，数以百计的毛利人正在加入志愿军，在新西兰军队里服役。
强化英联邦

original: As a smaller Dominion, it is important to stick close to our friends and family. We will reinforce our ties to our fellow British territories.
translation: 作为一个较小的自治度，重要的是紧贴我们的朋友和大家庭。我们将加强与英国领土的联系。
威斯敏斯特条例

original: The Statute of Westminster gives us greater independence under the Crown while still keeping us within the Empire.
translation: 威斯敏斯特条例赋予我们在王冠下获得更大的独立性，同时仍然把我们置于帝国内。
第二新西兰远征军

original: Despite the horrors of the last war, New Zealand is ready to march again. The 2nd New Zealand Expeditionary Force is being organized as we speak.
translation: 尽管上次战争还令人感到恐惧，现在新西兰准备再次进军。我们正在组织第二新西兰远征部队。
逮捕和平主义领袖

original: Now is not a time for dissension within the country. Everyone must focus on winning the war, and if that means detaining any who speak against the war, then that is what we will do.
translation: 现在不是国家内部纷争的时候， 每个人都必须专注于赢得战争，如果这意味着扣留任何反对战争的人，那就是我们将要做的。
与英国技术共享

original: Great Britain’s scientific and industrial base far exceeds our own, but since we are family, they are willing to share what they know with us.
translation: 英国的科学和工业基础远远超过了我们自己，但由于我们在一个大家庭里，他们愿意与我们分享他们所知道的技术。
李事件

original: John Lee, MP for Grey Lynn, has been causing problems within the Labour caucus. He is agitating for a more radical agenda instead of the cautious path we are taking. Measures must be taken to quiet his revolt.
translation: 约翰·李，国会议员格雷林恩，已经给工党党团造成很多问题。他正在鼓动一个更激进的议程，而不是我们正在采取的谨慎的道路。必须采取措施消除他的反叛影响。
给予工人阶级权力

original: Labour has championed the working class since its founding, indeed many of our leaders have working class origins. Let’s push for more dramatic protections and powers for the unions.
translation: 工党自成立以来一直支持工人阶级，事实上我们的许多领导人都是来源于工人阶级。让我们推动为工会争取更大的保护和权力。
加入共产国际

original: The time has come to join with our socialist brothers in an alliance. Through the Comintern we will achieve the worker’s paradise.
translation: 是时候加入我们的社会主义兄弟联盟了。通过共产国际，我们将实现工人的人间天堂。
与苏联技术共享

original: The Soviet Union has many of the world’s top scientists and technology innovators. They are generous enough to share what they know with us, their comrades in arms.
translation: 苏联有许多世界顶尖科学家和技术创新者。他们慷慨地与我们分享他们所知道的技术，因为我们是他们的战友。
黑暗中摸索

original: There is a rot inherent in the democratic systems championed by our mother country. True strength cannot be demonstrated through compromise.
translation: 我们的祖国所倡导的民主制度中存在着一种腐败。真正的力量不能通过妥协来证明。
交好日本

original: As a Pacific nation, it suits our security interests to side with the strongest power in the region. Japan and its mighty navies can protect us from the world’s dangers.
translation: 作为一个太平洋国家，与该地区最强大的力量站在一起符合我们的安全利益。日本及其强大的海军可以保护我们免受世界性威胁。
统治他们

original: The anitpodean nations of the South Pacific should be one united power. Australia should consider submitting to our superior ethos.
translation: 南太平洋的反大陆国家应该是一个统一的力量。澳大利亚应考虑服从我们优越的民族精神。
与日本技术共享

original: Japan has many of the world’s top scientists and technology innovators. They are generous enough to share what they know with us, their brothers in arms.
translation: 苏联有许多世界顶尖科学家和技术创新者。他们慷慨地与我们分享他们所知道的技术，因为我们是他们的战友。
宪法修正案

original: The time has come for New Zealand to consider separating itself from British domination. We will amend our constitution to assert greater control over our own affairs.
translation: 现在是新西兰考虑与英国统治分离的时候了。我们将修改我们的宪法，更好地掌控我们自己的事务。
新西兰独立

original: We are now a Republic! New Zealand owes nothing to the United Kingdom but the gratitude any child owes its mother for raising it safely. But we must leave the safe nest of the Commonwealth and view the world with our own interests in mind.
translation: 我们现在是一个共和国！新西兰没有亏欠英国什么，仅仅出于任何孩子都会感激其母亲抚育之恩。但我们必须离开英联邦的鸟巢，并以我们自己的利益出发来看待这个世界。
[ENG.GetNameDefCap]转让§Y2艘轻巡洋舰§!给我们。
省级选举

original: The new Government of India Act mandates elections in the provinces, establishing some measure of local government responsible to the Indian population. We will see what effect this has on the British rule.
translation: 新印度政府授权法案进行省级选举，一定程度上确保当地政府对印度人民足够负责。让我们期待此法案对英国统治者有何影响。
自治权

original: Gandhi’s concept of self-rule - Swaraj - is gaining popularity throughout India. It advocates a total break from British institutions and customs and Swaraj groups are agitating at Indian schools.
translation: 甘地的自治理念在印度越来越受欢迎。他提倡印度完全脱离英国机构和其习俗，同时自治派团体正在印度学校进行积极活动。
印度国民大会党

original: The Indian National Congress has been very successful in elections across the subcontinent. They are a strong voice for an independent India, or at least one with greater autonomy within the Empire.
translation: 印度国大党在印度次大陆中的选举非常成功。此党派能成为印度独立的重要支柱，至少他们在帝国内拥有更大主权。
退出印度运动

original: Gandhi’s campaign for Indian Independence has reached a climax with a call for the British to leave India. It is inconceivable that the Raj can end before the war is over, but the situation on the ground is growing more tense by the day.
translation: 甘地的印度独立运动在要求英国人离开印度的演说中达到了巅峰。难以置信的是印度能在战争结束之前就脱离英国，但当地局势正日益紧张。
全印前进同盟

original: The All India Forward Bloc thinks that British disengagement from India is taking too long. A stronger - even militant - position must be taken.
translation: 全印前进同盟认为英国人脱离印度耗时太久了。应当采取更强硬的——甚至激进的——手段。
向苏联求助

original: The Soviet Union pledged their help
translation: 苏联承诺提供帮助。

original: The Soviet Union is the natural balance to British Imperial power. They claim they are the engine of revolution, and we should encourage them to export their revolution to India.
translation: 苏联与英帝国两方势力均衡。苏联称其为革命的根源，而我们应当积极鼓励苏联对印度的革命输出。
印度人民军

original: The communist supporters start a civil war for freedom. The size depends on party support and autonomy progress.
translation: 共产主义支持者为自由而开始了一场内战。人民军的军力取决于党派支持率和自主权的进展。
[SOV.GetNameDefCap]将支持他们的事业。

original: We should organize a military force that will learn from and be allied with the Communist cause.
translation: 我们应当组织一支学习并与共产主义事业共进的军队。
科研城市远行

original: Soviet Research Cities are a wonder, and India’s population is full of energetic and intelligent minds. Sending our young engineers to these cities will help us develop a domestic research and industry base.
translation: 苏联的科研城市简直是奇迹，而且印度人民也充满活力并且头脑灵活。将我们年轻的工程师送往这些城市能为我国国内研究和产业基地的发展提供帮助。
综合军事学院

original: Soviet military training can be made more efficient through the new Combined Arms Academy. We can get up to date on modern warfare, using air, land and sea power.
translation: 新式综合军事学院使得苏联军事训练拥有更高的效率。利用海陆空三军力量让我们能够跟上现代战争的步伐。
章西女王

original: Rani of Jhansi was a great hero of the Indian Revolution of 1857. Her example of bravery and national pride is a model for all of the women of India who want to take up arms and form a regiment of their own.
translation: 章西女王是1857年印度革命的伟大先烈。她的勇猛和民族自尊心是所有希望武装起来的印度女性的典范。
重建国家

original: With the Imperial oppressor expelled and the Indian population mobilized to action, the time has come to repair the damage of two centuries of occupation.
translation: 帝国压迫者被驱逐后，全体印度人民都被动员起来，是时候修复这两个世纪被占领时造成的伤害了。
向德国求助

original: The German Reich pledged their help
translation: 德意志帝国承诺会援助。
