original: Germany has never harmed us the way that Britain has, and the Reich is the most plausible challenge to British power. We should draw closer to the Axis powers.
translation: 德国从来没有像英国那样迫害我们，帝国也是英国强权最有力的挑战。我们应当进一步加深与轴心国的关系。
印度国民军

original: The fascist supporters start a civil war for freedom. The size depends on party support and autonomy progress.
translation: 法西斯支持者为自由而开始了一场内战。国民军的军力取决于党派支持率和自主权的进展。
[GER.GetNameDefCap]将支持他们的事业。

original: An Indian National Army, distinct from British controlled forces, has been organized. We can build it in regions free from British interference and line up against the Allies, sapping Indian manpower from the Raj.
translation: 一支不在英国控制下的印度国民军成立了。我们可以在没有英国干涉的区域组织国民军并设立对同盟国战线，从英属印度手里夺回印度人力。
自由印度营

original: Italy has formed the Battaglione Azad Hindoustan, a regiment of Indian former POWs. Trained in sabotage, parachuting and infiltration, the BAH could be a big step for national pride.
translation: 意大利建立了由前印度战俘组成的自由印度营。针对破坏行动、空降和渗透进行了训练，自由印度营将是整个民族自豪的一大进步。
[Root.GetGermanTechnologyName]
德国科技
日本科技

original: German scientists are the best in the world, and their military machine is based on the best modern engineering techniques. They are willing to share their advances with us.
translation: 德意志科学家是世界顶尖的，因此其军事器械同样使用了最优秀的现代工程技术。他们愿意与我们分享其先进技术。
[Root.GetJAAFAName]
德国空军训练学校
日本陆军空军学院

original: The Japanese Air Force Academy has decided to welcome Indian recruits that wish to fight against European domination in Asia.
translation: 日本陆军空军学院开始招募愿意与在亚洲的欧洲强权抗争的印度新员。
克利普斯的使命

original: We have to keep India loyal to the Allied and British cause, in spite of the rising nationalist fervor for independence. Sir Stafford Cripps is a skilled negotiator who can assure the nationalist leaders that their demands will be addressed.
translation: 尽管民族主义独立派如日中升，我们必须确保印度忠于同盟国和英国的事业。斯塔福德·克里普斯爵士是一位能够保证民族主义派领导人的要求得到满足的技艺精湛的谈判家。
两国理论

original: Pakistan will be released when India gains freedom.\n
translation: 印度获得自由之时巴基斯坦将被放出。\n

original: Though long ruled as a single territory, it makes sense to see India as two nations - one Hindu and one Muslim. Partition of the country may not be the only answer, but any deal for an independent India must face this dual nature of the subcontinent.
translation: 通过作为单一领土的长时间治理后，将印度视为一个印度教国家和一个穆斯林国家是合理的。分治国家可能不是唯一的办法，但任何促使印度独立的行动都必须面对次大陆的这种双重性质。
土邦捐款

original: The Princely States of India have provided the men that have served as the core Indian army under the British for a long time. Further donations from these local rulers underline their support for the Empire.
translation: 印度土邦提供的人力已经作为英属印度军队的核心部队很长时间了。地方统治者进一步的募捐突出了其对帝国的支持。
帝国军

original: The Imperial Service Troops are recruited by the Princes of India and can number in the hundreds of thousands. In these difficult times, it is great to know that His Majesty can rely on the loyalty of the rajas.
translation: 帝国军由各个土邦招募入伍，数量从上百到上千不等。在这样的艰苦年代，让陛下能够依靠忠诚的印度是一件好事。
皇家空军资金

original: The Royal Air Force of India will be given more funding and assets from the United Kingdom.
translation: 印度的皇家空军将从联合王国得到更多资金和资产。
海军资金

original: §Y2 Light Cruisers§! will be added to your navy if you already have the technology.\n
translation: 如果你已经拥有对应的科技的话，§Y2搜轻巡洋舰§!将加入你的海军。\n

original: The Royal Navy of India will be given more funding and assets from the United Kingdom.
translation: 印度的皇家海军将从联合安慰你改过得到更多资金和资产。
英国陆军支援

original: The British Army knows India well after 200 years of occupation. They know the people and the land, and will be able to support the training of Indian soldiers to fight at home.
translation: 英国陆军在占领印度两百年后已经熟知这片土地和它的人民了，并能协助印度士兵的训练以保家卫国。
红鹰师

original: Gain an elite infantry division in Delhi.\n
translation: 在德里获得一支精锐步兵师。\n

original: The Red Eagle Division will be the first Indian division to be trained to fight overseas, ready to fight in harsh conditions
translation: 红鹰师将是印度第一支为海外作战训练的，能够在艰苦环境中作战的部队。
钦迪特遣队

original: A §Y4 Skill General§! named §YOrde Wingate§! will appear.\n
translation: 一位名为§Y奥德·温盖特§!的§Y4级技能的§!将军将会出现。\n

original: India needs a special forces division so we have formed the Chindits to operate behind enemy lines in the jungles of Asia. This is a risky operation and will have high casualty rates, but could be of great service to the war effort.
translation: 印度需要一支特种部队，因此我们成立了钦迪特遣队来进行亚洲丛林中的敌后作战。这是一项高风险高伤亡的作战，但对战况能有很大帮助。
丛林战训练

original:
Enables §HJungle Training§!
§HMarines
    Jungle§!
      Attack: §G+5%§!
      Movement: §G+10%§!
§HMountaineers
    Jungle§!
      Attack: §G+5%§!
      Movement: §G+10%§!
§HParatroopers
    Jungle§!
      Attack: §G+5%§!
      Movement: §G+10%§!
translation:
允许进行§H丛林战训练§!
§H海军陆战队
    丛林§!
      进攻：§G+5%§!
      移动：§G+10%§!
§H山地步兵
    丛林§!
      进攻：§G+5%§!
      移动：§G+10%§!
§H伞兵
    丛林§!
      进攻：§G+5%§!
      移动：§G+10%§!

original: India, Burma and Indochina are covered in jungle and special training is recommended to make our soldiers effective in this dangerous terrain.
translation: 印度，缅甸和印度支那境内遍布丛林，因此丛林战的特别训练对于提高士兵在这种危险环境下的作战效率是很有必要的。
大战之诫

original: India colonial soldiers participated in the last world war, and the lessons from this conflict should be brought to bear on the training and organization of the army.
translation: 印度殖民地军队曾经参与上一次大战，应该将这次战争中吸取的教训用于军队的训练和组织。
军队印度化

original: To properly protect India in a total war, the entire population of India should be mobilized. This will mean not just recruiting more widely from the Indian population, but allowing Indian officers to take command at some place in the chain of authority.
translation: 为在全面战争中更好地保护印度，所有印度人民都应该动员起来。这不仅意味着更广泛地从印度人口中征兵，同样允许印度军官能在指挥系统中担当职位。
印籍廓尔喀人

original: The Gurkhas of the Punjabi and Nepalese highlands are legendary for their military skill. They’ve served the Raj loyally for many years, and excel at all kinds of warfare.
translation: 旁遮普和尼泊尔高地的廓尔喀人拥有传奇般的军事能力。多年来他们忠诚地服务于英属印度，在各种战事中表现卓越。
印度桑德赫斯特学院

original: India has been demanding a military school of its own ever since the last war, and at long last we created on in 1932. The Indian Military Academy has been turning out Indian officers for a few years now, giving us a core command group.
translation: 自从上次大战后，印度一直要求建立一个属于自己的军事学院并最终在1932年创建了。印度军事学院已经连年为核心指挥阶层培训出许多印度军官。
大战之狮

original: The Sikhs have a strong military tradition and were highly decorated in the last war. The Lions of the Punjab form a strong regiment on their own, and the region is ripe for further recruitment.
translation: 锡克族有着强大的军事传统，并在上次大战中频频出彩。旁遮普的雄狮已经组建了他们自己的一支军团，该地区也已经准备好进行进一步征兵了。
印度绅士军官

original: The gentlemen who have served the Raj through close co-operation with the Imperial authorities are a ready-made supply of commanders, should we need loyal men to lead the new Indian Army.
translation: 新印度军队需要忠于帝国的领导人，那些曾经服务于英属印度并与帝国当局密切合作的绅士们是现成的指挥官。
鱼雷爆破筒

original: One of British India’s greatest contributions to the art of war is the Bangalore Torpedo, a series of connected pipes that can be used to destroy obstacles while the engineers are under fire. This device has gained great popularity around the world.
translation: 英属印度对战争艺术的一大贡献就是鱼雷爆破筒，它是一串连接起来的雷管，在工兵被火力压制时用于摧毁障碍物。这种装备在全世界大受欢迎。
维克斯-贝蒂埃机枪

original: The Vickers-Berthier is a little unwieldy but has the virtue of being easy to quickly produce. For a nation like India, this is a very important characteristic in a gun.
translation: 维克斯-贝蒂尔机枪有点笨重但优点在于能够快速生产。像印度这样的国家，这样的特质对于枪械来说非常重要。
印属皇家炮兵

original: The Royal Indian Artillery has existed ever since the East India Company formed a battalion of cannon with Indian gunners in 1748. We can draw on these many decades of experience.
translation: 印属皇家炮兵源于在1748年东印度公司建立的一个由印度火枪兵组成的炮兵团。我们能够借鉴这几代传下来的经验。
军队摩托化

original: India is too large to be covered efficiently by train and horse. The army should have motorized divisions and regular truck transport.
translation: 印度面积太大，难以通过铁轨和马匹进行有效运输。陆军应当拥有摩托化部队和常备运输卡车。
重视山炮

original:
Enables §HMountain Gun§!
§HArtillery
    Mountain§!: Movement: §G+15%§!
§HAnti-Tank
    Mountain§!: Movement: §G+15%§!
translation:
允许使用§H山炮§!
§H炮兵
    山地§!：移动：§G+15%§!
§H反坦克炮
    山地§!：移动：§G+15%§!

original: The mountainous terrain of Northern India led to the development of an artillery piece that could be dismantled and carried on muleback to wherever it was needed. This 7 pounder may be a little obsolete, but we shouldn’t ignore its utility.
translation: 印度北方区域的山地地形使得火炮朝向能够前往任何地点的可拆卸背驮式发展。这种7磅炮也许有点过时，但我们不该忽视其效用
印度装甲载具

original: India should focus on developing its own homemade armor and tank division.
translation: 印度应该着重发展自己的装甲车和坦克师。
军队现代化

original: For too long the Indian armed forces were seen as little more than a colonial outpost, with few of the benefits and equipment available to the home army in Britain. It is time to modernize what we have in the Raj.
translation: 长久以来印度武装部队仅被视为殖民地前哨，所得和装备几乎无法和英国本土军队比拟。是时候进行印度现有军队的现代化了。
印度防务研究

original: Now that India is fully a sovereign nation we are no longer receiving access to advanced prototypes and blueprints like we previously did. We must ensure that we alway stay ahead of our enemies, and do not fall behind in technology.
translation: 现在印度是一个完全独立的主权国家了，我们不再像以往一样能够得到先进的设计原型和蓝图了。我们必须确保技术不会落后并始终在敌人之上。
英式飞行员训练

original: The Royal Air Force has agreed to accept Indian pilots to undertake training. This education will be a great help in the development of our own air wing.
translation: 皇家空军同意接纳印度飞行员进行训练。这种培训将成为空军发展中的一大助力。
拓展空军基地

original: India is very large, so patrolling and protecting its air space means we must increase our air capacity at bases across the subcontinent.
translation: 印度地势宽广，为达到巡航和保护空军基地的目的，我们必须提升整个次大陆上空军基地的飞机可容量。
重视空中支援

original: Combined Arms warfare is the new way of war, so we have to focus some energy in the training and production of aircraft that can support ground and sea forces.
translation: 协同作战是新的战争手段，因此我们必须在训练和生产可支援海陆部队的飞机上投入一些精力。
重视战斗机

original: We need fighter aircraft to escort bombers and intercept any enemy planes that threaten our nation.
translation: 我们需要战斗机来为轰炸机护航并拦截任何威胁我国领土的敌方战机。
皇家印度空军

original: The time has come to take our small air division and expand it into its own branch of the armed forces. A national air force with independent command will be better able to serve the Indian people and the Empire.
translation: 是时候将我们的小型空军拓展为武装力量的一个独立分支了。一支拥有独立指挥系统的国家空军将更好地为印度人民和帝国服务。
笑面佛陀

original: Scientists are close to unlocking the secret of atomic energy - and this will lead to the creation of very powerful explosives. We cannot fall behind in the quest for atomic weapons.
translation: 科学家们就要破解原子力的秘密了——这将造成威力巨大的爆炸。我们不能在核武上有任何落后。
大印度半岛铁路

original: Government control of the Great Indian Peninsula Railway in 1925 means that its expansion and improvement falls upon us. A growing population needs better transportation infrastructure.
translation: 1925年政府对大印度半岛铁路的控制意味着它的扩展和改进的责任都落在我们身上了。人口的增长意味着国家需要更好的交通基础建设。
工业扩张

original: Hundreds of millions of people call India home - there is no reason this population should not be the foundation of an industrial giant.
translation: 上亿人将印度作为自己的家园，庞大的人口正好能作为印度成为工业大国的基底。
塔塔钢业

original: Tata Steel is on its way to becoming the largest steel manufacturer in the Empire. Greater production will further fuel the modernization of India.
translation: 塔塔钢业即将成为帝国最大的钢铁制造商。产量的提高将进一步驱动印度的现代化进程。
阿萨姆邦油

original: Assam is the center of Indian oil production, especially the refinery at Digboi. Access to this resource needs to be expanded and exploited.
translation: 阿萨姆是印度石油资源中心产地，临近迪格博伊炼油厂。应对这项资源进行拓展与利用。
印度科学研究所

original: The Indian Institute of Science campus on Bangalore is allowing the best and brightest of India’s population to further our advances.
translation: 在班加罗尔印度科研所让印度人民中最优秀最聪慧的群众为我们的进步添一份力。
基础研究所

original: Some of our leading scientists and industrialists are championing a new Institute of Fundamental Research to take advantage of the latest discoveries in physical sciences.
translation: 一些主要科学家和实业家正在支持一种新型基础研究所以便利用在物理领域中的最新发现。
研究合作

original: The British showed us the advantage of sharing scientific progress between close allies. Our whole faction will be able to conduct wartime R&D more efficiently if we take the steps necessary to coordinate this.
translation: 英国证明了与合作伙伴共享科研进程的好处。如果我们能采取必要行动确保这一点，整个阵营将能够进行更有效的战时科学研究。
扩建马扎冈船坞

original: The Mazagon Dock in Mumbai is our most important shipbuilder on the West Coast. It needs greater capacity in this world crisis.
translation: 孟买的马扎冈船坞是我们西海岸最重要的造船商。在这场世界危机中它需要更大的空间。
建立辛迪亚造船厂

original: We need a dockyard on the East Coast of the country, so establishing the Scindia Shipyard in Visakhapatnam makes sense for our naval future.
translation: 我们需要在东海岸建立一家造船厂，因此在维沙卡帕特南建立辛迪亚造船厂对我国海军的未来是有益的。
皇家印度海军

original: The Royal Indian Navy will need to be rapidly expanded. New tactics and new ships should be a priority.
translation: 皇家印度海军必须要极速扩员。新战术与新船只将是首要目标。
重视屏卫舰

original: India plays a crucial role in defending the southern route to the Suez Canal. Screening and escort missions will help vital supplies and soldiers get to the European and African theaters.
translation: 在到苏伊士运河的南方航路的防卫上，印度将起到至关重要的作用。巡航和护航任务有助于将重要物资和士兵运往欧洲和非洲战区。
重视巡洋舰

original: Cruisers will be sufficient for now in the development and expansion of Indian naval power.
translation: 巡洋舰足以达到现在印度海军的发展和扩张需求了。
重视潜艇

original: With the rise of Japanese naval surface power in Asia, it might make sense to direct our energies under the sea, striking from submarines.
translation: 在亚洲，由于日本海军水面舰队的崛起，将我方海军关注点转到水下让潜艇进行突击也许更有利。
重视主力舰

original: As a British outpost, India has seen the power of capital ships in dominating the sea. We should build our own heavy cruisers and battleships.
translation: 作为英国前哨站，印度已经明白主力舰在主导海域控制权时的力量。我们应该建造自己的重巡洋舰和战舰。
海军现代化

original: Better engines, more crew space, faster speed and larger guns. India’s navy will soon stand with the best on the continent.
translation: 更好的引擎，船员拥有更大空间，高航速和大口径火炮。印度海军很快将成为整个大陆上最优秀的海军。
东印度铁路

original: Government control of the East India Railway leaves all decisions for its expansion and improvement in the hands of our ministers.
translation: 政府对东印度铁路的控制将其扩展和改良的决定权全交到我们各个部长的手里了。
土邦集成铁路

original: Some of the Indian princes have financed their own rail systems, but, till now, they have been poorly integrated with the rail lines built by the Raj. Something must be done to tie the nation’s trains together.
translation: 一些印度土邦出资建造了州内独立铁路系统。但直到现在，这些铁路与英属印度所建铁路几乎不互通。必须将整个印度的铁路连接在一起。
伊莎波尔军工厂

original: The Ishapore Arsenal and Rifle Factory has been in operation since the 18th century. It is responsible for many innovations in gun design, and is the centerpiece of our arms production system.
translation: 伊莎波尔军工厂和步枪制造厂自18世纪起就已经在运营了。它曾经提出许多创新性枪械设计，同时也是我们的武装生产系统的核心。
清除腐败

original: Despite the British industrial efforts to expand India’s rail system, very few of the benefits of the expansion seem to come to India. There is endemic corruption and double dealing in the transportation sector and we must be seen to do something about it.
translation: 尽管英国工业努力拓展印度铁路系统，但扩张带来的利润却很少真正到达印度。交通部门内有着地方性腐败和双向交易，我们必须做些什么。
加深与英国投资者的关系

original: To expand our factories and resources we still heavily rely on British capital. Until we have a vigorous banking sector of our own, we must go on bended knee to London to seek support.
translation: 我们仍在严重依赖英国的资本来扩建工厂和资源区。直到我们拥有一个属于自己的强力银行部门，我们必须躬身屈膝向伦敦寻求支持。
英国铁路产业投资者

original: Civilian and transportation infrastructure in India needs a heavy cash infusion from British financiers.
translation: 印度的平民与交通基础设施需要从英国投资者投入大量资金。
英国武装产业投资者

original: If we want to quickly get our weapons factories moving, we will need to ask British banks to invest in our military infrastructure.
translation: 如果我们想赶快让武器制造厂开始运营，我们需要向英国银行申请投资我们的军工基础设施建设。

original: A §Y4 Skill General§! named §YKodandera Madappa Cariappa§! will appear.\nA §Y3 Skill General§! named §YKodandera Subayya Thimayya§! will appear.\nA §Y3 Skill General§! named §YJayanto Nath Chaudhuri§! will appear.
translation: 一位名为§Y科丹德拉·马达帕·卡里亚帕§!的§Y4级技能§!的将军将会出现。\n一位名为§Y科丹德拉·苏拜亚·蒂迈雅§!的§Y3级技能§!的将军将会出现。\n一位名为§Y加亚托·纳特·乔杜里§!的§Y3级技能§!的将军将会出现。

original: Gain an elite unit of Gurkhas in Delhi.
translation: 在德里获得一个精锐廓尔喀单位。

original: Gain an infantry unit in Delhi.
translation: 在德里获得一个步兵单位。

original: Gain an infantry unit in Delhi.
translation: 在德里获得一个步兵单位。

original: \nA §Y3 Skill General§! named §YLakshmi Sahgal§! will appear
translation: \n一位名为§Y拉克希米·赛加尔§!的§Y3级技能的将军§!将会出现。
海军生产

original: By focusing resources on our shipyards and exempting skilled shipbuilders from military service, we can dramatically reduce production time for ships.
translation: 当集中资源在我们的海军船坞和熟练造船工，我们极大的缩短了造船时间。
空军生产

original: We can reorganize our aviation industry to eliminate waste and streamline production.
translation: 我们能重新组建多余产能到航空工业来避免浪费
建造工程

original: There is still a lot of slack in our construction industry. By focusing our attention on it, we can achieve a significant improvent in construction speed. Unfortunately, the production of machine tools has proven a major bottleneck in the expansion of our heavy industry, so they won't benefit from efforts in this area.
translation: 我们的建筑工业仍有不足.把我们的精力投入到上面可以极大地提高建造建筑速度.不幸的是，机械工具是我们发展大型工业的瓶颈，他们不会因此受益。
部队训练

original: By creating specialized advanced training units within each division, we can deploy even divisions that would previously have been held back to finish training to the front.
translation: 靠跟针对性的专业先进训练每个师团，我们能够把原来可能要中断训练部署的部队正常训练好。
镇压抵抗

original: By infiltrating the major resistance groups in occupied territory and turning their leaders, we can significantly reduce the amount of damage they can do.
translation: 靠渗透占领区域的抵抗组织策反他们的领导人，我们能够大幅减少抵抗组织造成的伤害。
建筑修理

original: We will form specialized repair teams from factory and construction workers and centrally control their deployment to improve reconstruction of damaged infrastructure.
translation: 我们能够组建专业化修理队.提高工厂，基建的再造速度
科技共享

original: We will encourage our research institutes and universities to reach out to their counter parts in allied countries. This will gain us a tech sharing bonus.
translation: 我们能鼓励我们的科研所去盟友的国家.提高我们的科研共享奖励
提高自治

original: By reorganizing our colonial bureaucracy and recruiting native administrators, we will, in time, be able to take charge of our own affairs.
translation: 重新构造我们的殖民地政府和雇佣原住民官员，我们有能力专注于我们自己的政务
压制附庸

original: Our colonial subjects have gotten rather silly ideas about things like "self-determination" or "national independence". It is time to disabuse them of these notions.
translation: 我们的附庸有一些愚蠢想法像"自主"或是"独立".是时候纠正一下他们的想法了。
解锁决议：
